NK031(ki)004:1: // rdzogs chen sems sde'i khrid yig bzhugs so //
NK031(ki)004:3: na mo gu ru b+h+yah khyab bdag thog ma'i ston pa kun tu bzang //
NK031(ki)004:4: gdul bya'i don du tha mal tshul bzung nas //
NK031(ki)004:5: skal ldan byang chub lam la 'god mdzad pa //
NK031(ki)004:6: bla chen chos kyi rgyal po'i zhabs la 'dud //
NK031(ki)004:7: rang sems gdod nas dag pa'i sangs rgyas de //
NK031(ki)004:8: blo bur 'khrul pa'i dri mas 'khor bar 'khyams //
NK031(ki)004:9: sdug bsngal 'khor ba'i mtsho las thar slad du //
NK031(ki)004:10: gsang chen khrid kyi rim pa 'dir brjod bya //
NK031(ki)004:11: de la 'o skol rnams kyi sems zhes bya ba'i rig rig tur tur po 'di /
NK031(ki)004:12: kun tu bzang po dang dus mnyam du dang po nyid du byung ba yin kyang /
NK031(ki)004:13: kun tu bzang pos rang du mkhyen pas grol /
NK031(ki)004:14: rang re sems can rnams kyis ngo ma shes par 'khor ba mtha' med du 'khyams /
NK031(ki)004:15: rigs drug gi lus grangs las 'das pa blangs /
NK031(ki)004:16: byas pa thams cad don med du song /
NK031(ki)004:17: da res mi lus brgya la lan gcig thob pa'i
NK031(ki)004:18: dus 'dir 'khor ba ngan song du mi skye ba'i
NK031(ki)004:20: shi nas gar skye nges pa med cing /
NK031(ki)004:21: 'gro ba rigs drug gang du skyes kyang sdug bsngal las ma 'das te /
NK031(ki)004:22: dmyal ba la tsha grang gi sdug bsngal /
NK031(ki)004:23: yi dwags la bkres skom gyi sdug bsngal /
NK031(ki)004:24: dud 'gro la bkol spyod dang glen zhing rmongs pa'i sdug bsngal /
NK031(ki)004:25: mi la skye rga na 'chi dang yod po 'tsho skyong /
NK031(ki)004:27: dgra sdang ba dang 'phrad kyi dogs pa /
NK031(ki)004:28: gnyen byams pa dang bral gyi dogs pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal bsam las 'das shing /
NK031(ki)004:29: lha ma yin la'ang 'thab rtsod kyi sdug bsngal /
NK031(ki)004:30: lha la 'pho ltung gi sdug bsngal te rgyas par bla mas zhib tu 'chad /
NK031(ki)004:32: 'khor ba khab kyi rtse tsam la //
NK031(ki)004:33: bde ba nam yang yod ma yin //
NK031(ki)004:35: mi lus 'di yang thob pas mi chog ste /
NK031(ki)004:37: da lta nyid du chos gsha' ma gcig byed dgos la /
NK031(ki)004:39: 'chi khar mi 'gyod pa rang gis rang la mi
NK031(ki)004:40: khrel ba rje btsun mi la lta bu gcig dgos
NK031(ki)004:41: te / nga mi la ras pa'i chos lugs la //
NK031(ki)004:42: rang gis rang la ma khrel ba //
NK031(ki)004:45: mi snying can kun rang la phyi thag srings //
NK031(ki)004:46: rang mi bslu na snying nas chos gcig gyis //
NK031(ki)004:48: nam 'chi cha med dran pas dgra 'dul gnyen skyong
NK031(ki)004:49: la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi bya ba la zhen
NK031(ki)004:50: pa log pa / lto gos gtam gsum 'jig rten
NK031(ki)004:51: chos brgyad sogs la ma chags pa rtse gcig tu
NK031(ki)004:52: chos la blo sgril ba gcig dgos te /
NK031(ki)004:53: 'chi ba snying zug gi dben gnas su //
NK031(ki)004:54: zhen pa gting log gi sgrub pa po //
NK031(ki)004:55: tshe 'di blos btang gi sku mtshams bcad //
NK031(ki)004:56: sems chos brgyad kyi mi dang mjal 'phrad med //
NK031(ki)004:57: ces rgyal ba yang dgon pa lta bu zhig byed dgos /
NK031(ki)004:58: de byed pa la khrid sgom byed dgos /
NK031(ki)004:59: khrid de yang tshig shes pa'i tshig khrid /
NK031(ki)004:61: nyams myong skyes pa yon tan gyi khrid /
NK031(ki)004:62: mthar phyin pa 'bras bu'i khrid dang bzhi yin la /
NK031(ki)004:63: mthar phyin pa 'bras bu ni sangs rgyas yin pas /
NK031(ki)004:64: de ma thob kyi bar du bsgom dgos /
NK031(ki)004:65: de sgom par byed pa la don gsum ste /
NK031(ki)004:66: gzhi sems bskyed kyis bzung nas skyabs 'gro la 'bad dgos te /
NK031(ki)004:67: skyabs yul mdun gyi nam mkhar dmigs nas /
NK031(ki)004:68: rang dang sems can thams cad kyis skyabs 'gro byed
NK031(ki)004:69: par bsam nas skyabs 'gro stong dang khri la sogs
NK031(ki)004:70: pa byas / mthar dbang bzhi blangs te de rnams 'od du zhu nas rang la thim par bsam /
NK031(ki)004:71: de'i ngang la rnam rtog gang shar de spang yang ma spang /
NK031(ki)004:73: kho rang gi thog tu klod la bzhag pas yal 'gro zhing /
NK031(ki)004:76: de la yang gong ltar bya /
NK031(ki)004:77: mdor na rnam rtog gang skyes kyang de kha'i thog tu bzhag /
NK031(ki)004:78: gzhan nas gzhug rgyu rang med /
NK031(ki)004:79: de rang ngo shes tsam gyi ngang la klod de 'jog go //
NK031(ki)004:80: skyabs 'gro dang klod nas 'jog pa 'di gnyis res mos su byas la zhag gsum mam lnga'am /
NK031(ki)004:81: bdun la sogs pa gnad dang bstun par bya'o //
NK031(ki)004:82: de nas sdig sgrib 'dag par byed pa yi ge brgya pa'i bzlas sgom gyi khrid ni /
NK031(ki)004:83: rdo rje sems dpa' spyi bor bsgom pa'i zhabs kyi
NK031(ki)004:84: mthe bong nas bab pa'i bdud rtsis rang gi sdig
NK031(ki)004:85: sgrib thams cad ded nas sa rim pa dgu'i 'og
NK031(ki)004:86: tu song / lus bdud rtsi dkar pos gang /
NK031(ki)004:87: yi ge brgya pa brgya rtsa sogs song nas /
NK031(ki)004:88: rdo rje sems dpa' la dbang bzhi blangs te /
NK031(ki)004:89: 'od du zhu rang la bstims nas /
NK031(ki)004:90: gong ltar ngal gso zhing rnam rtog la blta lugs dang zhag grangs gong dang 'dra /
NK031(ki)004:91: gsum pa tshogs bsags man+dala gyi khrid ni /
NK031(ki)004:92: mdun gyi nam mkhar bla ma yi dam dkon mchog
NK031(ki)004:93: rnams skyabs 'gro'i skabs ltar gsal btab la man+dala tshom
NK031(ki)004:95: sa gzhi spos byugs sogs dang /
NK031(ki)004:98: rin po che'i man+dala la sogs pa phyi kun rdzob rdzas kyi man+dala /
NK031(ki)004:99: nang don dam rdo rje lus kyi man+dala /
NK031(ki)004:100: gsang ba zung 'jug sems kyi man+dala /
NK031(ki)004:101: yang gsang sku gsum gyi man+dala la sogs pa gang shes khams kyis lcogs tshad phul la /
NK031(ki)004:102: thun mtshams su dbang bzhi blangs nas ngal gso zhing rnam rtog la blta ba gong ltar bya /
NK031(ki)004:104: bzhi pa byiin rlabs 'jug par byed pa bla ma'i rnal 'byor gyi khrid ni /
NK031(ki)004:105: rang yi dam gang yin gyi spyi bor seng khri dang pad zla'i steng du /
NK031(ki)004:106: ngo bo chos 'di ston pa'i bla ma yiin pa la rnam pa o rgyan yab yum mam /
NK031(ki)004:107: kun tu bzang po la sogs pa rang gang mos
NK031(ki)004:108: shig bsgoms la de'i thugs ka nas 'od zer 'phros
NK031(ki)004:109: pas / rang gi sngar 'das pa'i bla ma thams cad dang /
NK031(ki)004:110: da lta chos 'brel zhus shing mos gus tshugs pa rnams dang /
NK031(ki)004:111: ma 'ongs pa na rang nyid sangs ma rgyas kyi
NK031(ki)004:112: bar du 'byon rgyu'i bla ma thams cad spyan drangs
NK031(ki)004:113: nas / de la bstims pas bla ma kun 'dus kyi ngo bor bsam /
NK031(ki)004:115: yi dam dkyil 'khor lha tshogs sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad spyan drangs nas /
NK031(ki)004:116: de la bstims pas yi dam kun 'dus kyi ngo bo bsam /
NK031(ki)004:117: yang 'od zer 'phros mkha' 'gro chos skyong thams cad spyan drangs /
NK031(ki)004:118: de la bstims pas bla ma kun 'dus yid bzhin
NK031(ki)004:119: nor bu rin po cher bsam nas mos gus mchi
NK031(ki)004:120: ma 'khrugs pa ma byung bar du byas la bla
NK031(ki)004:121: ma de rang gi sku bstod dam /
NK031(ki)004:122: med na bla ma sku gsum ma lta bu'i sham bur /
NK031(ki)004:123: ka dag gnas lugs rtogs par byin gyis rlobs //
NK031(ki)004:124: gang shar rang ngo shes par byin gyis rlobs //
NK031(ki)004:125: 'khrul snang rang sar grol bar byin gyis rlobs //
NK031(ki)004:126: rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin skye bar byin gyis rlobs //
NK031(ki)004:127: tshe 'dir sangs rgyas thob par byin gyis rlobs //
NK031(ki)004:128: zhes ma yengs pa'i ngang nas brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar du gsol ba btab /
NK031(ki)004:129: mthar bla ma las dbang bzhi blang /
NK031(ki)004:130: bla ma 'od du zhu nas bstims te gong ltar mnyam par bzhag /
NK031(ki)004:132: bla ma'i rnal 'byor 'di ni sngon 'gro'i dus su zhag grangs gong ltar bya /
NK031(ki)004:133: dngos gzhi nas thun gyi mgo dang khrid thon nas
NK031(ki)004:134: kyang dus rnam kun tu ma chags pa grangs su
NK031(ki)004:135: bcad nas byed pa gal che ste /
NK031(ki)004:136: sgom rgyud la ma skyes pa'i mi des kyang /
NK031(ki)004:137: bla ma'i rnal 'byor zhag re la tshar lnga ma chags par byas na /
NK031(ki)004:138: 'pho ba 'debs mi dgos te rang shugs la thebs yong /
NK031(ki)004:139: zhes rgyal ba rgod tshang pas gsungs /
NK031(ki)004:140: bla ma'i rnal 'byor mos gus dang 'brel bar ma byas na sgom skye ba bul /
NK031(ki)004:141: cung zad skyes kyang gegs ldang /
NK031(ki)004:142: rtogs pa rgyud la skye mi btub pas bcos min gyi mos gus byung na rab /
NK031(ki)004:143: med na nga'i bla ma 'di sangs rgyas dngos yin
NK031(ki)004:144: snyam du zhe thag pa nas bsam la ngag tu
NK031(ki)004:145: yang brjod / lus grims kyis bsgrim /
NK031(ki)004:147: gdung shugs drag pos gsol ba btab pas /
NK031(ki)004:148: ji zhig nas bcos min gyi dad pa rang shugs la skye'o //
NK031(ki)004:149: de'ang mos gus rab la byin rlabs rab /
NK031(ki)004:151: mos gus tha ma la byin rlabs tha ma /
NK031(ki)004:152: mos gus gtan nas med na byin rlabs kyang mi 'byung bas mos gus kho na gal che ste /
NK031(ki)004:153: pha dam pa byin rlabs shig zhu dang zhus pas /
NK031(ki)004:154: bu lhod po mos gus gcig zhu dang gsungs skad /
NK031(ki)004:155: de ltar gnas skabs thams cad du byas pa'i yon
NK031(ki)004:156: tan gyis rtogs pa khyad par can tshig gis brjod
NK031(ki)004:157: du mi nus pa rang gi nang nas skye ste
NK031(ki)004:158: / bla ma zhang rin po ches /
NK031(ki)004:161: ting nge 'dzin bskyang ba la sogs pa mang bar gda' ste /
NK031(ki)004:162: mos gus kyi stobs las bla ma'i byin rlabs kyis nang nas skye ba 'di dkon par gda' /
NK031(ki)004:165: spyi bo'i rgyan du nga nyid rgyun du bsgom //
NK031(ki)004:166: bslus na pad 'byung zhan no rje 'bangs rnams //
NK031(ki)004:167: zhes gsungs pas rang gis sgom nus na bla mas mi bslu nges te /
NK031(ki)004:168: rgan mo'i mos gus kyis khyi so las 'od byung ba bzhin no //
NK031(ki)004:169: de ltar sngon 'gro nan tan gal che ste /
NK031(ki)004:170: rdzogs pa chen po'i don rgyud la skye ba sngon 'gro la rag las pa yin no //
NK031(ki)004:171: rje 'bri gung pas chos gzhan dngos gzhi zab par byed de /
NK031(ki)004:173: ces gsungs pa'i dgongs pa yang de ltar yin par gada'o //
NK031(ki)004:174: rang rgyud la nang nas ma skyes na /
NK031(ki)004:175: bla mas bstan pa'i chos rnams tshig gi lta sgom yin pas don spyi tsam las ma 'das /
NK031(ki)004:176: nang nas rang rgyud la skye ba ni /
NK031(ki)004:177: sgom thog nas lta ba 'tshol ba zhes bya ste /
NK031(ki)004:178: rdzogs pa chen po'i khyad chos yin /
NK031(ki)004:179: gsang sngags kyi lta ba bde stong yin zhes jo bo rjes gsungs pa de yang 'di yin /
NK031(ki)004:180: phyag chen man chad lta thog nas sgom 'tshol ba yin /
NK031(ki)004:181: de bas na bla ma'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa shin tu gal che /
NK031(ki)004:182: spyir deng sang snyigs ma lnga bdo'i dus 'dir /
NK031(ki)004:183: gang zag bcu tshun chad la chos ston cing /
NK031(ki)004:184: don byed pa'i bla ma de sangs rgyas byang sems kyi sprul pa yin /
NK031(ki)004:185: zhes o rgyan chen pos gsung gu ru rnon rtse'i gter lung du 'dug go //
NK031(ki)004:186: sgom gyi skal ba med pa gcig gis kyang /
NK031(ki)004:187: mos gus kyis gsol ba 'debs nus na /
NK031(ki)004:188: skye ba dang tshe rabs su ngan song gsum du mi 'khyams te /
NK031(ki)004:190: gdams pa rgya mtsho khong du ma chud kyang //
NK031(ki)004:191: spyi bor bla ma bsgom zhing dad pa yis //
NK031(ki)004:192: mig nas mchi ma 'khrugs shing gsol 'debs pa //
NK031(ki)004:193: ngan 'gro'i skye sgo gcod pa'i sgom chen yin //
NK031(ki)004:194: zhes sa skya pan chen gsungs /
NK031(ki)004:195: bla ma ni mi rang du 'dug /
NK031(ki)004:196: mi yis mi la gsol ba btab pas byin rlabs i yong ngam snyam pa mi 'tshal te /
NK031(ki)004:197: sngags gsar ma'i gzhung las kyang /
NK031(ki)004:198: bla ma las ni yon tan dang //
NK031(ki)004:199: mtho ris bde ba thams cad thob //
NK031(ki)004:200: bla mas dman pa'i skye bo las //
NK031(ki)004:201: dngos grub mchog ni 'byung ba min //
NK031(ki)004:203: bla ma mi tha mal par 'dug kyang /
NK031(ki)004:204: gsol ba btab na mchog gi dngos grub sangs rgyas myur du thob par gsungs la /
NK031(ki)004:205: lam zab mo bla ma'i rnal 'byor zhes gsang sngags bla med las gzhan du ma grags so //
NK031(ki)004:206: da ni dngos gzhi la gang zag gi rigs brtags dgos te /
NK031(ki)004:207: dbang po rab 'bring tha gsum las /
NK031(ki)004:212: tha ma la yang gsum ste dagu'o //
NK031(ki)004:213: de dag la yang gcig car ba ni /
NK031(ki)004:214: sgom bstan pa tsam gyis rtogs grol dus mnyam pa yin te /
NK031(ki)004:215: rgya gar du sa ra ha dang /
NK031(ki)004:216: bod du gling ras las ma byung zhes grags /
NK031(ki)004:218: shang stod bya ru gsum mdo nas /
NK031(ki)004:219: klung shod 'bri gung yan chad du gzigs kyang ma rnyed /
NK031(ki)004:220: yod ni los yod zhes gsungs /
NK031(ki)004:221: de 'dra'i rigs la sgom btab ma thag rgyud la skye /
NK031(ki)004:222: gegs sel bogs 'don kyang mi dgos pa yin par gda' /
NK031(ki)004:223: thod rgal ba ni res sgom rang shugs la yong /
NK031(ki)004:225: ya 'ud can yin pas 'di las rim skyes pa dga' zhes rgyal ba yang dgon pas gsungs /
NK031(ki)004:226: 'on kyang bar du 'di sa chod che bar bshad /
NK031(ki)004:227: rim skyes pa ni nas kyi myu gu ltar rim par skye ba yin /
NK031(ki)004:228: de gsum dang gang zag rigs dgu yang yin par
NK031(ki)004:229: ngo shes na so so'i rigs dang go lugs bstan
NK031(ki)004:230: nas bshad / 'on te ngo shes par dka' bas
NK031(ki)004:231: sngon 'gro'i skabs kyi mnyam bzhag gi sems kyi gnas
NK031(ki)004:232: cha che na zhi gnas yin pas de thog tu
NK031(ki)004:233: nas bshad / lhag mthong bstan / gnas cha chung zhing 'phro rgod che na /
NK031(ki)004:234: de yang sgom skyes pa yin te /
NK031(ki)004:235: 'phro rgod mang po de de snga nas yod kyang /
NK031(ki)004:236: mnyam par ma bzhag pas ma tshor ba yin /
NK031(ki)004:237: da mnyam par bzhag pas tshor ba yin /
NK031(ki)004:238: nyams dang po ri gzar gyi chu bya ba de yin /
NK031(ki)004:239: da gnas pa'i dus dang 'gyur ba'i dus gnyis kyi
NK031(ki)004:240: sems kyi ngo bo gcig las 'dug gam mi 'dug
NK031(ki)004:241: ltos dang byas la zhag gsum la sogs pa blta
NK031(ki)004:242: ru bcug / de gnyis mi gcig par 'dug zer na /
NK031(ki)004:243: yang bskyar la zhib tu bltar bcug /
NK031(ki)004:244: gcig par 'dug zer na byung gnas 'gro gsum rtsad
NK031(ki)004:245: gcod du bcug nas ngo sprad de rgyun bskyang bar
NK031(ki)004:246: bya'o // gal te de ltar ma byung ba'am gang zag blo rig gang yin yang rung ste /
NK031(ki)004:247: so so'i blo tshod dang bstun nas bla ma nyams
NK031(ki)004:248: myong can gyis khrid shes par bya ba ni kun
NK031(ki)004:249: tu gces so // da ni dbang po rab la
NK031(ki)004:250: khrid tshul mdo tsam smos na khyod rang sngon 'gro'i
NK031(ki)004:251: mnyam bzhag ltar du rnam rtog gang shar de la
NK031(ki)004:252: rtse gcig tu ma yengs pa rang gyis la sgoms
NK031(ki)004:253: tu gces so // / gal te yengs 'gro yi
NK031(ki)004:254: 'dug na rnam rtog thol te skyes pa dang rbad
NK031(ki)004:255: de chod la ma yengs par gyis la rnam rtog
NK031(ki)004:256: gang yang skye ru ma bcug par rig pa sgrims
NK031(ki)004:257: tu gces so // / / sems kyi mkhar sgo
NK031(ki)004:258: 'dir gnyen po'i mdung thung gcig bzung nas kho sgrim
NK031(ki)004:259: tu gces so // / / na nga sgrim / kho lhod na nga lhod bya ba de yin /
NK031(ki)004:260: 'on kyang sngar rnam rtog mang drags pa'i skyon byung 'dug pas /
NK031(ki)004:261: rnam rtog dgag gang thub gyis /
NK031(ki)004:263: glang chen lob nas sems tshags tshud pa ltar //
NK031(ki)004:264: 'gro 'ong bcas na ngang gis dal ba ste //
NK031(ki)004:265: 'di ltar rtogs su nga la chos ci dgos //
NK031(ki)004:267: tha mal rnam rtog ma rtogs pa //
NK031(ki)004:268: de ltar 'di ni mngon dgag ste //
NK031(ki)004:269: zhes gsungs pas rnam rtog dgag gang thub kyis /
NK031(ki)004:270: rnam rtog dgag ma thub na sgom mi yong ba 'dug go byas la sdig ri bskur /
NK031(ki)004:271: zhag gsum la sogs pa sha thang chad chad nan
NK031(ki)004:272: tan byed du bcug pas rnam rtog dgag ma thub
NK031(ki)004:273: pa dang / da 'o na rnam rtog gang skyes
NK031(ki)004:274: de 'phro bas mi chog 'phro ba de mu la
NK031(ki)004:275: mu mthud kyis 'phro ba rgya che ru rang chug
NK031(ki)004:276: pa dang / la / 'phro gang thub ma gtogs
NK031(ki)004:277: rnam rtog med pa skad cig tsam yang ma byed
NK031(ki)004:279: sems la dal ba skad cig kyang ma sdod par
NK031(ki)004:280: blos 'chos kyin 'phro ru chug byas la sngar ltar
NK031(ki)004:281: zhag gsum bya / des 'phro ba 'phro ru ma
NK031(ki)004:282: btub par gang shar du rtog med du gnas pa
NK031(ki)004:283: zhag gsum bya / gcig 'ongs kyang / 'di yin ngos bzung rgyu med pa gcig 'ong /
NK031(ki)004:284: da de gnyis gcig gam mi gcig bsgrim ste ltos la shog byas la /
NK031(ki)004:285: gcig mi gcig gang du yang 'dzin ngo ma shes
NK031(ki)004:286: pa'i had had po ti chal ba zhig lhag 'ong
NK031(ki)004:287: / de ltar byung ba dang de nas sems 'tshol bya ste /
NK031(ki)004:289: dang po sems kyi byung sa btsal //
NK031(ki)004:291: khyod rang gi sems 'di dang po kun tu bzang
NK031(ki)004:292: po dang dus mnyam pa nas bzung da lta phan
NK031(ki)004:294: sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong mkhan mi byed dgu byed
NK031(ki)004:295: mi dran dgu dran 'di la dang po byung sa
NK031(ki)004:296: gcig yod nges pas ga 'dra zhig nas byung tshol
NK031(ki)004:297: cig / kun tu bzang po dang mnyam du byung na //
NK031(ki)004:298: byung ba'i byung lugs ga 'dra zhig 'dug /
NK031(ki)004:299: yang de'i sngon du e byung yang tshol phyi nas byung ngam nang nas byung /
NK031(ki)004:300: steng 'og bar gsum phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhi gang nas
NK031(ki)004:301: byung tshol la shog byas la nan tan byed du
NK031(ki)004:302: 'jug / de ltar tshol du phyin pa dang /
NK031(ki)004:303: 'di yin gang du yang brjod mi shes pa'i hon ne ba gcig 'dug zer na des chog /
NK031(ki)004:304: gzhan zer na phug ma chod pas yang yang bskyar nas don la phebs pa dang /
NK031(ki)004:306: lus kyi nang na gnas sam phyi dang bar ga na gnas 'dug /
NK031(ki)004:307: de bzhin steng 'og phyogs mtshams ga na gnas ltos la shog byas la nan tan byed du bcug /
NK031(ki)004:308: nang na 'dug zer na nang gi ga na 'dug blta /
NK031(ki)004:309: snying gi nang na 'dug zer na /
NK031(ki)004:310: 'o na snying la bug pa med pas /
NK031(ki)004:311: shi nas snying ma zhig bar du de ka ru yod dgos te /
NK031(ki)004:312: ro la sems med pas de 'dra ma yin da dung ltos shig /
NK031(ki)004:314: phyi'i steng 'og phyogs mtshams ga na 'dug /
NK031(ki)004:315: dbyibs dang kha dog ci 'dra gcig 'dug pa ltar bcug /
NK031(ki)004:318: lar nas la mi 'dug zer na /
NK031(ki)004:319: 'o na mi 'dug zer mkhan cig 'dug pa tshol shog byas pas /
NK031(ki)004:320: 'di 'dra zhig 'dug zer na de ltar ma yin pa'i tshul zhib tu bshad /
NK031(ki)004:321: zer rgyu ci 'dug kyang de'i ngo bo rtsad bcad
NK031(ki)004:322: la ngos bzung med pa'i sangs sangs yal yal lar
NK031(ki)004:323: brjod mi shes pa gcig 'dug zer na des chog
NK031(ki)004:324: / da khyod rang gi sems de sna tshogs su
NK031(ki)004:325: 'char zhing 'gyu ba gcig 'dug pa'i mtha' phug ga
NK031(ki)004:328: 'gro sa de yang ga 'dra zhig 'dug zhib tu rtog la shog byas la btang /
NK031(ki)004:330: 'dug pa'i 'dug lugs rtsad bcad du bcug /
NK031(ki)004:331: mi 'dug zer na dge ba byas pas mtho ris su 'gro /
NK031(ki)004:332: sdig pa byas pas ngan song du 'gro /
NK031(ki)004:333: 'gro mkhan ni sems yin pas 'gro ba'i 'gro lugs
NK031(ki)004:334: ga 'dra zhig 'dug 'gro mkhan rang ga 'dra zhig
NK031(ki)004:336: de ltar 'gro sa dang 'gro mkhan yod thang pa
NK031(ki)004:337: la blta ru phyin nas yal 'gro bas gang yang
NK031(ki)004:338: med pa zhig 'dug zer na ngo sprad pa ni
NK031(ki)004:339: / 'o de ltar yin te khyod kyi sems la byung sa ma rnyed pa de /
NK031(ki)004:340: skye ba med pa chos kyi sku bya ba yin /
NK031(ki)004:341: sems la ngo bo dang ngos bzung gang yang med pas stong pa yin /
NK031(ki)004:342: de la byung sa ga la 'ong /
NK031(ki)004:343: de skye ba med pa chos kyi sku bya ba yin /
NK031(ki)004:344: de nas sems kyi gnas sa ma rnyed pa ni /
NK031(ki)004:346: rab 'byor sems ni phyi na yang mi gnas /
NK031(ki)004:348: gang du'ang gnas pa ma yin no zhes gsungs pa de yin te /
NK031(ki)004:349: sangs rgyas longs spyod rdzogs sku'i gzhi yin /
NK031(ki)004:350: tha ma 'gro sa ma rnyed pa ni /
NK031(ki)004:352: bar du gnas sa med pa la /
NK031(ki)004:353: tha ma 'gro ba ga la yod /
NK031(ki)004:354: de ni sprul pa'i sku'i gzhi ru brjod pa tsam yin /
NK031(ki)004:355: de ltar sems dngos po dang mtshan ma gang du yang ma grub pas /
NK031(ki)004:356: ye gdod ma nas stong zhing bdag med pa yin no //
NK031(ki)004:358: dang po sems kyi byung sa btsal //
NK031(ki)004:359: ma rnyed chos kyi sku dang 'phrad //
NK031(ki)004:360: bar du sems kyi gnas sa btsal //
NK031(ki)004:361: ma rnyed longs spyod sku dang 'phrad //
NK031(ki)004:362: tha ma sems kyi 'gro sa btsal //
NK031(ki)004:363: ma rnyed sprul pa'i sku dang 'phrad //
NK031(ki)004:364: ces gsungs pa ltar yin la /
NK031(ki)004:365: de ltar sems de glo bur gyi dri mas bsgribs pa ma gtogs /
NK031(ki)004:366: ye gdod ma nas sangs rgyas pa yin te /
NK031(ki)004:368: ye sangs rgyas shig yiin pa la //
NK031(ki)004:371: de ltar glo bur gyi dri ma dang bral ba'i sems de ngo bo stong pa yin kyang /
NK031(ki)004:373: dmigs pa med pa'i thugs rje dang ldan pas chos
NK031(ki)004:374: sku de yang stong pa cang med ri bong gi
NK031(ki)004:375: rwa lta bu'am / mu stegs chad lta ba lta bu ni ma yin pas /
NK031(ki)004:377: chos sku ci yi ngo bor ma grub pa //
NK031(ki)004:378: sems can shes rab chung bas med par go //
NK031(ki)004:380: dngos po gdos bcas su ma grub kyang /
NK031(ki)004:381: stong pa'i gdangs ma 'gags pa las /
NK031(ki)004:384: thugs rje zer gyi tshul du bzhugs pa'o //
NK031(ki)004:385: de'i rtsal las longs spyod rdzogs skur shar te /
NK031(ki)004:386: sar gnas kyi byang chub sems dpa'i don mdzad /
NK031(ki)004:387: sprul pa'i skus sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa'o //
NK031(ki)004:388: de ltar de ring nas sems sangs rgyas su ngo sprad pa yin kyang /
NK031(ki)004:389: mthar phyin nas brtan pa thob pa la ma shi bar bskyang dgos te /
NK031(ki)004:391: gong du brdar sha bcad pa bzhin /
NK031(ki)004:392: sems kho rang gnas rung sems yin /
NK031(ki)004:394: sems stong par thag chod phyin chad /
NK031(ki)004:395: gnas 'gyu gnyis la khyad par ci yang ma byung bas /
NK031(ki)004:396: rnam rtog gang shar gang byung gang snang thams cad
NK031(ki)004:397: ye shes kyi rol pa rgyal ba'i dgongs pa zab
NK031(ki)004:399: de la bcos bslad gang yang ma byed par de ka'i ngang la zhog /
NK031(ki)004:400: gnas skabs su rnam rtog rang ga mar 'dug na'ang /
NK031(ki)004:401: ngam ngam shugs kyis grol yod pas ting nge 'dzin 'ba' zhig yin /
NK031(ki)004:405: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyiin pa yin /
NK031(ki)004:406: dpe thag pa mes tshig pa dang 'dra /
NK031(ki)004:408: de bzhin du kho rang gi ngo bo stong pa yin /
NK031(ki)004:409: rnam rtog ltar snang ba de bzhin ni /
NK031(ki)004:410: stong pa'i gdangs shar ba yin /
NK031(ki)004:411: rnam rtog dang stong pa la khyad mi 'dug pa 'di la o rgyan chen pos /
NK031(ki)004:412: rnam rtog ngo bo stong pa'i chos skur go //
NK031(ki)004:414: bsgom na blo yin pas bsgom rgyu ci yang med /
NK031(ki)004:415: rnam rtog rang ga mar zhog /
NK031(ki)004:416: de la bcos bslad byas na rnam rtog rang rgyud
NK031(ki)004:417: pa 'khrul pa lu gu rgyud yin pas bcas bcos
NK031(ki)004:419: rang thog tu 'jog pa de las yengs nas 'khrul
NK031(ki)004:420: pa dngos yin pas ma yengs pa dgos te de
NK031(ki)004:421: gcig pos chog / sngon rje zur chung pa la rma thog byang 'bar gyis rtsod pa na /
NK031(ki)004:422: khyod rdzogs chen pa bya ba sgom rang byed kyi yod pa 'dra byas pas /
NK031(ki)004:423: 'o nga dmigs pa gang la gtad 'dug gsungs /
NK031(ki)004:424: 'o na mi sgom mam byas pas /
NK031(ki)004:426: de lta bu gcig dgos pa lags /
NK031(ki)004:427: rdzogs chen gu ru bzhi pa las /
NK031(ki)004:428: sgom ma myong dang 'bral ma myong //
NK031(ki)004:429: mi sgom don dang mi 'bral ba //
NK031(ki)004:430: zhes pa gang shar sgom yin pas na /
NK031(ki)004:431: blo bcos pa'i bsgom rgyu med pas sgom ma myong /
NK031(ki)004:432: yengs na don med 'chal pa yin pas rang thog tu 'jog pa de dang 'bral ma myong /
NK031(ki)004:433: mi sgom pa'i don de lta bu dang rgyun du mi 'bral ba gyis zhes pa'i don te /
NK031(ki)004:434: 'di la dbang po'i khyad par gyis zhag bdun bcu
NK031(ki)004:435: bzhi dang zla ba gcig nas ched 'dzin gyis ma
NK031(ki)004:436: yengs pa de mi dgos par gang shar rtsol med
NK031(ki)004:438: 'di la rdzogs chen pa ye grol klong yangs kyi dgongs pa zer /
NK031(ki)004:439: phyag rgya chen po rang gsal gyi dran pa zer bar gda' /
NK031(ki)004:440: de'i rgyun bar ma chad par bskyangs pas /
NK031(ki)004:441: rnam pa tha mal gyi shes pa 'jig rten pa'i
NK031(ki)004:442: rnam rtog rang ga ma dang khyad par spu tsam
NK031(ki)004:443: yang med la / ngo bo der 'dzin med pa'i sa le hrig ge ba mnyam bzhag yul phud /
NK031(ki)004:445: bag chags g.ya' dag pa'i shes pa ngos bzung dang bral kyang rnam rtog ltar snang ba zhig yod /
NK031(ki)004:448: rnam rtog mi mnga' ci yang sa ler mkhyen //
NK031(ki)004:450: deng sang ni sgom chen pa tsho 'di'i zur thos
NK031(ki)004:451: na snying 'gas la thug pa tsam byed kyin gda'
NK031(ki)004:452: ste / grub chen mi tra dzo kis /
NK031(ki)004:453: cir snang rang sor bzhag na bya bral lhun gyis grub //
NK031(ki)004:455: de ltar 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog rang gis rang grol bas na /
NK031(ki)004:456: phyi gzung ba'i yul gzugs sgra la sogs pa dag
NK031(ki)004:457: kyang rang grol la shugs kyis 'gro la mig gi
NK031(ki)004:459: rna ba'i yul du sgra snyan mi snyan /
NK031(ki)004:460: sna la dri zhim mi zhim /
NK031(ki)004:466: sa chu me rlung la sogs pa mdor na gang
NK031(ki)004:467: shar gang snang de kha la bzo bcos med par
NK031(ki)004:470: sgo lnga'i rnam shes gsal ba la //
NK031(ki)004:471: yid kyi zhen rtog ma zhugs na //
NK031(ki)004:472: rgyal ba'i dgongs pa de ka rang //
NK031(ki)004:475: don go rtog pa'i mtshang rig na //
NK031(ki)004:476: rnam rtog shar che gnas pa che //
NK031(ki)004:477: nyon mongs rags che ye shes gsal //
NK031(ki)004:479: de bas na rdzogs chen gyi dgongs pa ni /
NK031(ki)004:480: gang shar de spong yang mi spong /
NK031(ki)004:482: de ka la bcas bcos mi byed par 'jog pa 'di ka yin no //
NK031(ki)004:483: de yin pas de la spang bya med /
NK031(ki)004:485: dgag sgrub blang dor la sogs pa blos byas kyi chos gang yang med pas na /
NK031(ki)004:486: blo 'das chos sku de bzhin nyid //
NK031(ki)004:488: de dag ni dbang po rab kyi dbang du byas pa yin pas /
NK031(ki)004:489: rab kyi rab 'bring tha gsum la so so'i blo nus dang sbyar te khrid par bya'o //
NK031(ki)004:490: da ni dbang po 'bring gsum zhi lhag zung 'brel gyi sgo nas khrid par bya ste /
NK031(ki)004:491: de yang kun bzang dgongs 'dus las /
NK031(ki)004:492: zhir ma gnas na lhag mi mthong //
NK031(ki)004:493: lhag ger ma mthong zhi mi gnas //
NK031(ki)004:495: de gnyis dus mnyam du 'ong ba zhig byed dgos la /
NK031(ki)004:497: bya med sgo nga gang las byung //
NK031(ki)004:498: sgong med bya de gang las byung //
NK031(ki)004:499: bya dang sgo nga gang snga'o //
NK031(ki)004:501: snga phyi med pas dus mnyam pa dgos pa byung /
NK031(ki)004:502: de la rgyal ba yang dgon pa'i mgur las /
NK031(ki)004:503: chos rdzogs chen zer ba'i sgra bo che //
NK031(ki)004:504: sprang go ba'i len phyogs kyang de la bgyis //
NK031(ki)004:505: gcig char gyi rtogs pa'ang de las 'khrungs //
NK031(ki)004:506: zhes khong gi rtogs pa rdzogs chen las 'khrungs par bzhed la /
NK031(ki)004:507: rje des ji ltar bsgom pa ni /
NK031(ki)004:509: ye bsgom la blo yis ma bsgom mdzod //
NK031(ki)004:510: rang bab la bzo yis ma bcos mdzod //
NK031(ki)004:511: blo rtog pa la skyon du mi blta zhing //
NK031(ki)004:512: mi rtog pa ched du ma bsgom par //
NK031(ki)004:513: sems rang lugs su zhog la rgyang so tshugs //
NK031(ki)004:514: sgom zhi gnas kyi mthil du phebs 'di la dran pa sleb na zhi lhag zung 'brel yin /
NK031(ki)004:517: de ka ltar goms 'dris byed du bcug la gnyug
NK031(ki)004:518: bsrings pas ji zhig na 'gyu ba je nyung la
NK031(ki)004:519: song / sems kyi gnas pa je brtan la 'gro /
NK031(ki)004:520: zhi gnas 'thug po 'dod na de ka'i rgyun bskyangs nas bsgoms pas /
NK031(ki)004:521: rnam rtog phra rags 'gag ste ting nge 'dzin gyi
NK031(ki)004:522: ngo bo gang du yang ma grub pa'i stong pa
NK031(ki)004:523: / gsal la rtog pa med par lus sems yod du mi tshor la /
NK031(ki)004:524: ting nge 'dzin de dang 'bral mi phod pa'i bde nyams can cig 'char /
NK031(ki)004:525: mu mthud nas bsgoms pas spyan lnga dang /
NK031(ki)004:526: mngon par shes pa'i yon tan kyang 'byung ste bsam gtan zer ba yin /
NK031(ki)004:527: sgom na 'phar bas bsam gtan bzhi dang skye mched mu bzhi'i sems gnas rtse gcig pa ste /
NK031(ki)004:528: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zer /
NK031(ki)004:529: dgu po 'di mu stegs la'ang yod pas phyi nang
NK031(ki)004:530: thun mong gi lam yin kyang rnam rtog 'phro drags
NK031(ki)004:531: nas kha phri ma thub pa de la zhi gnas
NK031(ki)004:533: zhi gnas rab tu ldan pa'i lhag mthong gis //
NK031(ki)004:534: nyon mongs rnam par spong ba shes byas nas //
NK031(ki)004:535: thog mar zhi gnas btsal bya zhes sogs gsungs pa yin /
NK031(ki)004:536: lhag mthong med na 'dis sa lam mi bgrod pas
NK031(ki)004:537: sems kyi gnas pa cha tsam rnyed dam rnam rtog
NK031(ki)004:538: 'di ma 'phros na dga' ba snyam pa'i dus der
NK031(ki)004:539: / rnam rtog de rang ngo shes tsam byas la
NK031(ki)004:540: kho rang gi ngo bo la bltas pas yal te
NK031(ki)004:541: / / gnas pa dang gcig tu song ba ni zhi lhag zung 'brel bya ba yin /
NK031(ki)004:542: dwags po bka' brgyud pa gnas 'gyu'i bar lag 'gyel ba zer /
NK031(ki)004:543: ngo bo blos byas pa'i sgom yin /
NK031(ki)004:544: 'di la ngo shes kyi dran pa dang ma bral
NK031(ki)004:545: ba dgos pas bka' brgyud pa stong nyid gzung dran
NK031(ki)004:546: zer / 'di ka rgyun bskyangs nas bsgoms pas /
NK031(ki)004:547: gzung dran de rang gsal gyi dran pa ru 'gro /
NK031(ki)004:548: ma yengs pa rang byas na 'di yang kha gze mo zhig yin te /
NK031(ki)004:549: zla ba gcig tsam nas nyin snang 'dres thub /
NK031(ki)004:551: snang ba thams cad stong par yang mi bsgom /
NK031(ki)004:552: mi stong par yang mi bsgom /
NK031(ki)004:553: gang shar de la dran pas gzung na zla ba gcig rang gis chog ste /
NK031(ki)004:554: spros bral dang po rang gnas 'ong //
NK031(ki)004:557: sngar gyi zhi gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin de rang ngo shes pas zhi lhag zung 'brel lam /
NK031(ki)004:559: rdzogs pa chen po zhes zer te /
NK031(ki)004:561: blo rtog pa 'gyu ba gnas lugs kyi sgo //
NK031(ki)004:562: rang ngo shes pa nyams len gyi gnad //
NK031(ki)004:565: tha ma gnyis kyis rnam rtog rang ga ma de sgom yin par yid la ma 'byed na /
NK031(ki)004:566: rnam rtog gang shar de la bltas pas /
NK031(ki)004:567: gang shar thams cad stong par yal /
NK031(ki)004:568: yal ba de'i ngang nas gcig steng la gcig 'char /
NK031(ki)004:569: de la yang bltas pas sngar ltar yal /
NK031(ki)004:570: de ka rgyun skyong ba yin te /
NK031(ki)004:572: sems ngos bzung med pa stong pa'i dbyings //
NK031(ki)004:573: sna tshogs su 'char ba rig pa'i sgo //
NK031(ki)004:574: blo bral gyi gsal stong rjen pa 'di la //
NK031(ki)004:575: ngang la bzhag gin dbyings la ltos dang //
NK031(ki)004:576: sgom lhag mthong gi mthil du phebs pa zhig 'ong gi //
NK031(ki)004:577: zhes gsungs pa bzhin byed du 'jug /
NK031(ki)004:578: 'di na mi tra dzo ki'i gsung gis /
NK031(ki)004:579: gang shar ngo yis bzung na rig par rang sar grol //
NK031(ki)004:581: las sla la 'chun che ba zhig yin no //
NK031(ki)004:582: rab 'bring gsum ga'i thun mong du bsgom lugs ni /
NK031(ki)004:584: ma yengs pa'i dran pa so ma shor //
NK031(ki)004:585: ma bsgom pa'i gnas lugs bzo ma byas //
NK031(ki)004:586: bsam med kyi rig pa smra ma 'dod //
NK031(ki)004:587: rtag chad kyis ma bslad kha yan du skyong dang //
NK031(ki)004:588: sgom zhi lhag zung du chug pa zhig 'ong gi //
NK031(ki)004:589: zhes gsungs pa go sla yang /
NK031(ki)004:590: dran pa ma yengs pas gang shar la bzo bcos mi byed /
NK031(ki)004:591: shar yang yod par mi blta /
NK031(ki)004:593: rnam rtog gi sna mi bskyil bar 'phro ru bcug nas ngo shes tsam byed pa'o //
NK031(ki)004:595: gdod nas dag pa dbyings kyi ngang nyid nas //
NK031(ki)004:596: rig pa thol skyes skad cig dran pa de //
NK031(ki)004:597: rgya mtsho'i gting nas nor bu rnyed pa 'dra //
NK031(ki)004:598: sus kyang ma bcos ma byed chos kyi sku //
NK031(ki)004:599: zhes gsungs pa ltar ngo sprad do //
NK031(ki)004:600: da ni dbang po tha ma gsum la phal cher lhag mthong la yid mi ches /
NK031(ki)004:601: zhi gnas gsha' ma yang skyer mi btub ste /
NK031(ki)004:603: res rgod nas bsgom mi 'char bas /
NK031(ki)004:605: stan bde ba la rab rdo rje skyil krung /
NK031(ki)004:606: de min skyil krung phal pa bca' /
NK031(ki)004:607: sgal tshigs bsrang la lag pa mnyam bzhag bya /
NK031(ki)004:608: dpung pa yid tsam phyir dgye /
NK031(ki)004:611: mig gnyis sna rtse la lta ba ste rnam snang chos bdun bya /
NK031(ki)004:612: rlung ro sna bug g.yas g.yon gnyis nas gsum gsum dang /
NK031(ki)004:613: gnyis ka nas gsum ste dgu rgyang ring du bus /
NK031(ki)004:614: spyi bo'am snying gar bla ma bsgoms nas gsol ba btab /
NK031(ki)004:615: lus sems lhod cing lhod pa'i ngang nas /
NK031(ki)004:616: rnam rtog gang shar de ka la bltas nas de rang gi thog tu lhod kyis glod /
NK031(ki)004:617: yang shar ba de'i thog tu sngar ltar glod /
NK031(ki)004:618: yal nas stong par song ba des dga' brod mi bya /
NK031(ki)004:619: rnam rtog mang por song ba la skyon du mi blta /
NK031(ki)004:620: bsgom yong du re ba dang /
NK031(ki)004:621: ma byung gi dogs pa gnyis ka mi bya /
NK031(ki)004:622: gang shar gyi steng du lhod de 'jog /
NK031(ki)004:623: glod drags pa rnam rtog med pa'i mi rtog pa
NK031(ki)004:624: 'dra mo 'gyu dran gang yang med pa zhig 'ong
NK031(ki)004:625: bas / de dran pas hril gyis bsgrims te ngo shes pa ma byas na /
NK031(ki)004:626: rang gis mi tshor la rtog pa 'og 'gyu phub ma'i 'og gi chu dong lta bu gcig yong /
NK031(ki)004:627: des 'phral du mi gnod pa ltar la phugs su
NK031(ki)004:628: kho rgyas nas bsgom yong du mi ster bas bsgrim
NK031(ki)004:629: dgos / rtog pa kha 'gyu ni ngos zin pa'i
NK031(ki)004:630: 'gyu dran gtso bo yin pas de'i thog tu glod
NK031(ki)004:631: dgos / nas 'jog / ji zhig nas rnam rtog mang du song bas rang tshig pa za /
NK031(ki)004:632: nga la bsgom mi 'ong ba 'dug snyam du 'ong ste skyon med /
NK031(ki)004:633: nyams dang po ri gzar gyi chu lta bu bya ba de de yin /
NK031(ki)004:634: bka' brgyud pa rtse gcig rtog pa'i rba la g.yeng zer te rtse gcig chung ngu'i skabs yin /
NK031(ki)004:635: de ka la bsran skyed de mthud pas skabs re 'dug /
NK031(ki)004:636: skabs re mi gnas pas na bye'u tsi ti mu chu la res 'dzul res thon /
NK031(ki)004:637: skabs re rdo steng du bag re sdod pa dang 'dra /
NK031(ki)004:638: nyams gnyis pa'i skye lugs yin /
NK031(ki)004:639: yang mu mthud pas re zhig na skabs re 'phro /
NK031(ki)004:641: dpe rgan po dang 'dra ste gnas pa shas che /
NK031(ki)004:642: nyams gsum pa'i skye tshul yin /
NK031(ki)004:643: yang rgyun mthud pas re zhig na sbubs nang ngam
NK031(ki)004:644: yur ba'i chu ltar 'gro ba mi mngon par 'ong
NK031(ki)004:645: / 'di dus kyang dran pa cung zad bsgrim dgos /
NK031(ki)004:646: nyams bzhi pa'i skye lugs yin /
NK031(ki)004:648: ji zhig na nying sems gang du'ang mi 'phro bar
NK031(ki)004:649: nyin mtshan kun tu gnas pa zas skom dang gos
NK031(ki)004:650: kyi sred pa yang mi 'byung zhing /
NK031(ki)004:651: g.yo 'gul med par zhag dang zla ba sbrel bar gnas pas dpe ri bo lta bu ste /
NK031(ki)004:652: 'di nyes nas kha thal na nyan thos 'gog par 'gro /
NK031(ki)004:653: legs na lus shin tu sbyangs pa thob nas zhi gnas phul du phyiin pa yin /
NK031(ki)004:654: nyams lnga pa'i skye lugs yin no //
NK031(ki)004:655: 'di dag kyang phal che ba'i dbang du byas kyis /
NK031(ki)004:656: gang zag so so'i rtsa khams dang dbang po'i rim
NK031(ki)004:657: pas mtha' gcig tu ma nges pa yang srid do
NK031(ki)004:658: // de tsho dbang po tha ma'i rab la rim
NK031(ki)004:659: pas yong mod kyi 'bring tha gnyis la gnas pa
NK031(ki)004:660: // skye dka' bas / lus gnad sngar ltar la mdun du smin mtshams kyi thad /
NK031(ki)004:661: 'dom gang tsam gyi sar shing bu gcig btsugs la /
NK031(ki)004:662: de la yid mig rlung gsum dril la gtad de /
NK031(ki)004:663: sems mi 'phro ba'i rten tsam du byas la /
NK031(ki)004:665: lhod drags na sgom 'chor bas thun chung la grangs mang ba bya /
NK031(ki)004:666: de nas rim pas thun che la grangs nyung du btang /
NK031(ki)004:667: sems gnas su song ba dang shing bu de'i rtse
NK031(ki)004:668: mor a dkar po gcig bsam la sngar bzhin bsgom
NK031(ki)004:669: / de nas thig le dkar po dang ser po
NK031(ki)004:670: la sogs pa rim pas spo zhing dmigs rten re
NK031(ki)004:671: la zhag gcig gam gsum la sogs pa ma sun
NK031(ki)004:672: par byas la ci rigs su bsgom /
NK031(ki)004:673: shing bu'i mal na rde'u gcig bzhag la sngar ltar rim pas bsgom /
NK031(ki)004:674: de nas rang gi lus kyi gnas gsum dang /
NK031(ki)004:676: snying kha la sogs pa yig 'bru dang thig le
NK031(ki)004:677: sogs gang red la dmigs rten bcas te bsgoms pas
NK031(ki)004:678: / rim gyis gnas pa brtan par 'gyur ro //
NK031(ki)004:679: hril dril bas rim pas goms su 'jug rgyu yin pas /
NK031(ki)004:680: dpon slob gnyis kas ngang bsring nas /
NK031(ki)004:681: dal bus slob cing ma sun par byed pa gnad che'o //
NK031(ki)004:683: sdug btsir du ma song bar sngar gyi 'jog lugs
NK031(ki)004:684: la ma yengs pa ral skor mkhan g.yul du zhugs
NK031(ki)004:687: rgyal po'i mda' mkhan dang ral skor mkhan gnyis kyi
NK031(ki)004:688: bar du dngos po spungs nas da ste nyi ma
NK031(ki)004:689: gsum gyi bar du ral skor gyis la mda' rgyob
NK031(ki)004:690: cig / mda' phog na dngos po 'di rnams mda' mkhan khyer /
NK031(ki)004:691: ma phog na ral skor mkhan khyer cig byas pas
NK031(ki)004:692: nyi ma dang po la mda' 'phangs tshad ral skor
NK031(ki)004:693: mkhan gyi ral gri la phog nas khyer song /
NK031(ki)004:694: mda' mkhan gyi chung mas mda' phog gam byas pas /
NK031(ki)004:695: mda' 'phangs tshad ral gris blangs nas ma phog zer /
NK031(ki)004:697: thabs yod kyis sang mda' 'phangs shig zer nas sang nyin mos khrus byas /
NK031(ki)004:699: khong gnyis kyi thad nas phar 'gro tshur 'gro mang
NK031(ki)004:700: po byas pas ral bskor mkhan mo la mig yengs
NK031(ki)004:702: der ral bskor mkhan na re /
NK031(ki)004:703: mda' yis ma len yengs pas len //
NK031(ki)004:704: phyin chad ral skor mkhan po kun //
NK031(ki)004:705: skad cig tsam yang ma yengs shig /
NK031(ki)004:706: yengs na nga bzhin srog dang 'bral //
NK031(ki)004:708: dpe de bzhin ma yengs par rang gal che'o //
NK031(ki)004:709: da ni lhag mthong bstan te /
NK031(ki)004:710: lhag mthong ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de yin pas /
NK031(ki)004:711: 'di med na sa lam mi bgrod pa ni /
NK031(ki)004:712: shes rab med na mig med pha rol phyin lnga 'dis //
NK031(ki)004:713: dmigs bu med pas byang chub reg par nus ma yin //
NK031(ki)004:716: rje sgam po pas bdag gis mnyam bzhag gis zhag bdun thub pa byung /
NK031(ki)004:717: de la bka' gdams pa kun sgom bzang po byed kyin gda' zhus pas /
NK031(ki)004:718: ha ha zhes bzhad mo chen po mdzad de /
NK031(ki)004:720: bsam gtan bzhi po'i lha tsho'i de yang yin te /
NK031(ki)004:723: ma 'phrad na lha ru skye ba yin gsungs /
NK031(ki)004:725: ma gi shed yi dwags bse rag pa //
NK031(ki)004:726: tshe sngon sbyin pa ma btang bas //
NK031(ki)004:727: zhim mngar gyi zas la dgra ru blta //
NK031(ki)004:730: lhag mthong de la yang gsum ste /
NK031(ki)004:731: chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i lhag mthong zhes
NK031(ki)004:732: pa ni mdo sngags thams cad kyi dgongs don gang
NK031(ki)004:733: yin pa'i lhag mthong phyin ci ma log pa shes
NK031(ki)004:734: pa la zer / sems rang bzhin gyis rnam par
NK031(ki)004:735: dag pa'i gnas lugs ji lta bar shes pa'i lhag
NK031(ki)004:736: mthong zhes pa da lta rang re tshos bstan nas
NK031(ki)004:738: 'di goms pas sems rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag
NK031(ki)004:739: pa'i gnas lugs phyin ci ma log par mngon du
NK031(ki)004:740: gyur pa'i lhag mthong 'bras bu sangs rgyas thob pa'i
NK031(ki)004:741: dus der 'byung ba yin par gda' /
NK031(ki)004:742: da zhi gnas kyi skabs ltar rnam rtog mnyam bzhag tu 'dug kyang /
NK031(ki)004:743: de ngo shes tsam la bzhag pas chog /
NK031(ki)004:744: rnam rtog sna tshogs su 'gyu na yang de ngo shes tsam gyi ngang du 'jog /
NK031(ki)004:745: mdor na gang shar gang byung ngo shes tsam gyi ngang la 'jog pa 'di ka yin /
NK031(ki)004:746: bsgom nas bsgom rgyu ci yang med do //
NK031(ki)004:747: sems phyogs kyi lung rab gsal las kyang /
NK031(ki)004:749: ji ltar 'bad rtsol brtson byas kyang //
NK031(ki)004:751: rang gshis gnas su ma phyin pas //
NK031(ki)004:752: rtsol bas thang chad sdug bsngal la //
NK031(ki)004:753: bde chen snying po srog dang bral //
NK031(ki)004:754: de las nges par skyobs pa'i thabs //
NK031(ki)004:755: grangs dang rtsol ba'i srung thabs min //
NK031(ki)004:756: dri thom ngang du gso ma shor //
NK031(ki)004:757: yin don rtogs so ma 'das tsam //
NK031(ki)004:759: mi mthun pa nyid gnyen por rdzogs //
NK031(ki)004:761: ting nge 'dzin gyi mi mthun phyogs ni rnam rtog yin /
NK031(ki)004:762: de spangs mi dgos pa kho re'i thog tu kho
NK031(ki)004:763: rang bzhag pas rang dag la 'gro ba yin no
NK031(ki)004:764: // dbang po tha ma'i tha mas de ltar byang
NK031(ki)004:765: kyang sems las su ma rung na rnam rtog gang
NK031(ki)004:766: skyes de ngos bzung nas de ji ltar 'dug dang
NK031(ki)004:767: ga ru 'gro ba bltas pas rang dag la 'gro
NK031(ki)004:768: // zhing / de'i rgyun bskyangs pas phyis ched du
NK031(ki)004:769: rtsad gcod mi dgos par rnam rtog kho res kho
NK031(ki)004:770: rang grol bar byed de rang byung gi ye shes
NK031(ki)004:771: // zhing / zhes bya'o // 'gyu ba'i rtsa brdar bcad na dran rtog thog dbyings su yal /
NK031(ki)004:773: spyir na tha mal gyi shes pa zhes bya ba
NK031(ki)004:774: rnam rtog gang shar gyi ngo bo la bzo bcos
NK031(ki)004:775: mi byed pa 'di la ma yengs na de gcig
NK031(ki)004:776: pos chog ste / dbang po tha mas de ltar
NK031(ki)004:777: mi yong bas rtsol bcas kyi mnyam bzhag skyong ba
NK031(ki)004:778: pos chog ste / yin / rnam rtog gang shar
NK031(ki)004:779: la bltas kyang zhi ma nus par 'phro drags na
NK031(ki)004:780: lus gnad bshig 'phro mkhan kho 'phro ru rang bcug
NK031(ki)004:781: nas kho'i ngang de la bltas pas zhi mal gyis
NK031(ki)004:783: dang gnas pa gnyis ka sems yin pas rang mal
NK031(ki)004:785: bsgom bsran bskyed pas gding tshugs par 'gyur ro //
NK031(ki)004:787: ji ltar gzing nas phur ba'i bya rog bzhin //
NK031(ki)004:788: bskor zhing bskor zhing slar yang de ru bab //
NK031(ki)004:789: zhes pa'i dpe yis ston pas /
NK031(ki)004:790: rgya mtsho'i gzing gi bya rog de ri dang chu srin brtag pa'i phyir du gso dgos la /
NK031(ki)004:791: de 'dzam bu'i gling dang thag nye sar rkang par
NK031(ki)004:792: lcags thag phra mos ma btags na bros 'gro zhing
NK031(ki)004:793: / rgya mtsho'i dbus su slebs pa na gang yang mi dgos te /
NK031(ki)004:794: yar 'phur bas ni gnam las ma 'das /
NK031(ki)004:795: phar tshur la ni bar snang las ma 'das /
NK031(ki)004:796: mar la ni chu las ma 'das pas yas mar
NK031(ki)004:797: phyogs mtshams gang la 'phur kyang 'gro sa dang sleb
NK031(ki)004:799: gzing la sngar shul du 'bab pa bzhin du /
NK031(ki)004:800: rnam rtog kho rang 'phro rung stong pa /
NK031(ki)004:802: gnas rung 'gyu rung stong pa las ma 'das pas /
NK031(ki)004:803: kho rang gang zag de ka'i ngang du babs pas
NK031(ki)004:804: dbang po tha mas kyang rab kyi sor 'jog tu
NK031(ki)004:805: 'gyur bas nan tan ltar zab pas na 'di la
NK031(ki)004:807: de ltar dbang po rab 'bring tha gsum dgu phrugs
NK031(ki)004:808: su phye nas nyams su len tshul bstan pa ste
NK031(ki)004:809: / slob dpon rdo rje bzhad pas mdzad pa'i rdzogs chen snyan brgyud thugs kyi nying khu las /
NK031(ki)004:810: rab dbang po lta thog nas sgom nus /
NK031(ki)004:811: 'bring sgom thog nas sgom nus pa /
NK031(ki)004:812: tha ma spyod thog nas sgrub nus pa'o //
NK031(ki)004:814: 'di dag gi lung rgyab dgos na /
NK031(ki)004:817: bdag gis byas pa'i khrid rgyab che chung gnyis bshad /
NK031(ki)004:818: sgom la snying rus byed du bcug ste /
NK031(ki)004:819: chos zab kyang ma bsgoms na gdams ngag zab mo
NK031(ki)004:820: dpe cha'i logs la lus zer ba de yin mod
NK031(ki)004:821: / da res sgom rgyud la thebs kyang dus rgyun
NK031(ki)004:822: du ma bsgoms na blo dred chos dred nyams len
NK031(ki)004:823: dred nas 'chi dus su mi phan pas gzab dgos
NK031(ki)004:824: / / rgyal ba rgod tshang pas phyi mtshams ri khrod du sdod tshugs pa /
NK031(ki)004:825: nang mtshams spyil por sdod tshugs pa /
NK031(ki)004:826: gsang mtshams mal du sdod tshugs pa /
NK031(ki)004:827: gnyis med lta ba'i steng du sdod tshugs pa /
NK031(ki)004:828: yengs med sgom pa'i steng du sdod tshugs pa /
NK031(ki)004:829: chags med spyod pa'i steng du sdod tshugs pa dang drug tshang dgos gsungs /
NK031(ki)004:830: spyir sgom la phar 'jus dang tshur 'jus gnyis yin /
NK031(ki)004:831: sems las su ma rung ba la phar 'jus byed dgos pas dran pa dang mi bral /
NK031(ki)004:832: de nas rnam rtog kho rang gi tshur 'jus gang shar thams cad sgom du 'gro ba yin /
NK031(ki)004:833: de yang tha mal gyi shes pa kho res kho
NK031(ki)004:834: rang la 'dzin pa med pa'i ngang la 'gro ba
NK031(ki)004:835: yin no // sgom chen pas bsgom btang yang /
NK031(ki)004:836: sgom gyis sgom chen pa mi gtong ba'i dus zer /
NK031(ki)004:837: de yong ba la bar ma chad du bsgom dgos /
NK031(ki)004:838: ma bsgom na da lta nyams myong phran bu skyes
NK031(ki)004:839: kyang yal 'gro bas sgom 'ja' tshon ma bya ba
NK031(ki)004:840: yin / lcags kyu ma bya ba dran pas zin dus yod la /
NK031(ki)004:841: ma zin na med pa yin /
NK031(ki)004:842: de la ma yengs pa'i bya ra bsgrim dgos /
NK031(ki)004:843: ya bral ma bya bar dran pa yod la snying rje dang ma 'brel ba yin /
NK031(ki)004:844: de la thun mgor sems can gyi don du bsgom mo snyam par bya /
NK031(ki)004:845: thun mthar dge ba sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas thob par gyur cig par bsngo /
NK031(ki)004:847: snying rje med na chos kyi rtsa ba rul //
NK031(ki)004:848: zhes gsungs pas gal shin tu che /
NK031(ki)004:849: bdag med ma bya ba bsgom skyes nas ma bskyangs par bor ba la zer /
NK031(ki)004:850: blo nang du bkug nas bsgom du bcug /
NK031(ki)004:851: res 'jog ma bya ba res bsgom yong /
NK031(ki)004:853: de la byung ma byung khyad med pa'i thog tu 'jog cing nyams su blang /
NK031(ki)004:854: 'khor yug ma bya ba nyin mo'i dran pa mtshan mo yang yong ba de yin /
NK031(ki)004:855: 'di sgom gyis tshur 'jus pa'i dus de yin /
NK031(ki)004:856: rnal 'byor mchog ces pa rdzogs pa chen po bya
NK031(ki)004:857: rtsol dang bral ba'i dus zhes bya ba de yin
NK031(ki)004:858: / phyag rgya chen po sgom med zer ba yin no //
NK031(ki)004:859: yang gang zag rigs chad ces pa khregs chod dang
NK031(ki)004:860: thod rgal gyi snod du ma gyur pa dag kyang
NK031(ki)004:861: yod pas / de 'dra'i rigs la dbang bskur rtsa rlung sbyangs nas las kyi phyag rgya gtad /
NK031(ki)004:862: dbang po gnyis sbyor gyi dga' bzhi'i 'gros 'ded kyis
NK031(ki)004:863: bde ba'i ngo bo stong par ngo sprad de gong
NK031(ki)004:864: bzhin sems khrid la 'jug par gsungs la /
NK031(ki)004:865: de ltar mi nus pa dag ni btags grol mthong
NK031(ki)004:866: grol dang myang grol la sogs pa'i thabs kyis rim
NK031(ki)004:867: gyis grol bar 'gyur pa'i tshul la 'jug par bya'o
NK031(ki)004:868: // spyir sems phyogs dang phyag rgya chen po ni /
NK031(ki)004:869: ye shes spyir gsal zhes bya ste /
NK031(ki)004:870: brtan pa ma thob bar du yid dpyod 'dzin pa'i lta ba zhes bshad /
NK031(ki)004:871: 'on kyang rdzogs chen de ngo sprod nas bsgom na phyi snang ba'i yul dang /
NK031(ki)004:872: nang 'dzin pa'i sems kyi 'phro gnas thams cad ye shes su 'char bas /
NK031(ki)004:873: rdzogs chen rang snang ris med kyi dgongs pa zer te g.yer po cher byed /
NK031(ki)004:875: sems ngo 'phrod phyin chad nas nang gi thog tu nyams len skyong ba las /
NK031(ki)004:876: thod rgal la zhugs te mun khrid dam /
NK031(ki)004:877: snang khrid byas nas 'od gsal stong gzugs kyi thog
NK031(ki)004:878: tu nyams len bskyang na rang byung gi ye shes
NK031(ki)004:880: chos nyid kyi bar do la grol ba thob pa la the tshom med do //
NK031(ki)004:882: bdag lta bu sgom pa'i nyams myong ni med /
NK031(ki)004:883: phyag rdzogs kyi chos mang po thob kyang brjed /
NK031(ki)004:884: gong 'og gi tshig ris rnams kyang myog se ba zhig las ma byung bas na /
NK031(ki)004:886: sgom pa'i nyams myong med pa'i //
NK031(ki)004:887: yig nag dpe cha'i steng nas //
NK031(ki)004:889: lam log gol sar bskyur ro //
NK031(ki)004:890: zhes gsungs pas sngon chad yi ger 'god ma nus /
NK031(ki)004:891: 'on kyang sngar gyi lung de'i 'phro las /
NK031(ki)004:892: sa thob yon tan med kyang //
NK031(ki)004:894: snying rje'i rtsa ba brtan nas //
NK031(ki)004:895: gzhan don byas pas chog go //
NK031(ki)004:897: bzod pa ma thob kyang rgyud la snying rje cung zad cig mchis pa dang /
NK031(ki)004:898: khyad par du sems dang chos su 'dres shing /
NK031(ki)004:899: ting 'dzin las su rung ba dang /
NK031(ki)004:900: rig pa klong nas shar ba /
NK031(ki)004:902: thugs sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa dang ldan pa'i bla
NK031(ki)004:903: ma dam pa rnams kyi gsung rgyun cung zad dran
NK031(ki)004:904: pa rnams yi ger bkod de rig pa klong du
NK031(ki)004:905: gyur pas 'khor 'das rang sar grol ba rdzogs chen
NK031(ki)004:906: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug rje rin po che phyag
NK031(ki)004:907: rdor ba'i bka' nan ches pas phul ba lags /
NK031(ki)004:908: gang gis brten na lo zla zhag tsam gyis //
NK031(ki)004:909: sangs rgyas zhing du nges par bgrod nus pa'i //
NK031(ki)004:910: theg mchog rtse mo'i rdzogs pa chen po'i khrid //
NK031(ki)004:911: ji bzhin bkod pas 'gro rnams grol bar smon //
NK031(ki)004:912: 'on kyang nongs na bla ma lha la bshags //
NK031(ki)004:913: rgya bod pan grub bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam //
NK031(ki)004:914: 'di phyi bar do gsum du grol byed pa'i //
NK031(ki)004:915: zhig po bdud rtsi'i lugs bzang 'di sog zlog pa blo gros rgyal mtshan /
NK031(ki)004:917: 'gro kun rnam dag lam du 'jug par shog /
NK031(ki)004:919: yang slob dpon chen po sh+r+ai si has /
NK031(ki)004:923: zhes snyan brgyud rdo rje'i tshig rkang gsum gsungs pa las /
NK031(ki)004:924: dang po thug sar gtugs pa ni /
NK031(ki)004:925: khrid ston shes pa'i bla ma mtshan nyid dang ldan pa gcig la gtugs nas /
NK031(ki)004:926: sems kyi byung gnas 'gro gsum rtsad brdar bcad de zhu gtugs byed pa'o //
NK031(ki)004:927: bar du gzhog sar bzhag pa ni /
NK031(ki)004:928: gang shar la bzo bcos med par 'jog pa'o //
NK031(ki)004:929: tha ma 'gro sar gtong ba ni /
NK031(ki)004:930: nyams myong ting nge 'dzin gyi ro la zhen pa med par 'dzin med du gtong ba'o //
NK031(ki)004:934: snyan brgyud rin po che'i khrid kyi man ngag mkha' dbyings snying po'i bde khrid bzhugs so //
NK031(ki)004:935: rdzogs pa chen po sems sde a ro lugs so //
NK031(ki)004:936: rgyal ba sku gsum gyi rang bzhin dpal ldan bla ma'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su mchi'o //
NK031(ki)004:937: 'di ni bla med theg pa'i gsang chen gnad //
NK031(ki)004:938: zhal las snyan brgyud bde gshegs kun gyi thugs //
NK031(ki)004:939: gegs med nye lam gnyug ma'i de kho na //
NK031(ki)004:940: nye bar snang gi bsgrub la mos pa dag /
NK031(ki)004:941: tshe 'dir chags pa'i rnam bzhag rnams dor nas //
NK031(ki)004:942: rgyal ba dgongs pa'i gsang ba snying po'i don //
NK031(ki)004:943: yi ge med pa'i snyan brgyud 'di zungs la //
NK031(ki)004:944: gdod nas gnas pa gdod ma'i sar brnyes mdzod //
NK031(ki)004:945: de la re zhig rje btsun rnam par snang mdzad
NK031(ki)004:946: zhabs kyi man ngag gi snying po snyan brgyud rin
NK031(ki)004:947: po che'i lag khrid la dang po'i ting nge 'dzin
NK031(ki)004:949: tha ma'i ting nge 'dzin zhes sgom rim gsum las /
NK031(ki)004:955: stan la ci bder gnas pas mi rtag pa dran pa sogs 'jug rim sngon du btang la /
NK031(ki)004:956: skyabs sems dang ldan pas phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o //
NK031(ki)004:957: 'di ltar rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i dbyings tshad
NK031(ki)004:958: med par bee d+aur+ya'i man+dala dri ma med pa lta
NK031(ki)004:959: bu / chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag
NK031(ki)004:960: pa ye shes kyi rang bzhin rtsibs stong dang ldan
NK031(ki)004:962: me long ye shes kyi ngo bo bee d+aur+ya'i rdo rje dang /
NK031(ki)004:963: mnyam pa nyid kyi rang bzhin nor bu rin po che dang /
NK031(ki)004:964: so sor rtog pa'i rang bzhin pad+ma 'dab ma brgya pa dang /
NK031(ki)004:965: bya ba grub pa'i rang bzhin sna tshogs rdo rje
NK031(ki)004:966: dang re re zhing yang rgya khyon tshad med pa
NK031(ki)004:967: / lha dang mi'i skye bo du ma dag gis
NK031(ki)004:968: brten gnas su gyur pa mchod pa'i yo byad bsam
NK031(ki)004:969: gyis mi khyab pa'i bkod pas /
NK031(ki)004:970: phyogs kyi khong ma lus pa kun tu gang ba gsal bar dmigs la /
NK031(ki)004:971: der rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus pa spyan drangs /
NK031(ki)004:972: de yang nam mkha'i mthil du rgyal ba kun bzang ye shes kyi sku /
NK031(ki)004:973: shar du rang byung rig pa'i sku /
NK031(ki)004:974: lhor chos dbyings stong pa'i sku /
NK031(ki)004:975: nub tu lhun gyis grub pa'i sku /
NK031(ki)004:976: byang du 'gag med gsal ba'i sku rnams yang dag par bkod la /
NK031(ki)004:977: sngar bkod pa'i rdzas de dag dbul zhing bsod nams
NK031(ki)004:978: su bya ba mtha' dag zhib tu bsgom zhing dmigs
NK031(ki)004:980: slar yang spyi mgrin snying khar +aahmh'u zhes rab tu bkod de sems bzung la /
NK031(ki)004:981: h'u gi 'od kyis phyi nang thams cad nam mkha'
NK031(ki)004:982: ltar byas nas yi ge gsum gyi lus su blta'o
NK031(ki)004:983: // de bzhin du +aahyi 'od kyis brtan pa dang
NK031(ki)004:984: g.yo ba mtha' dag rab tu gsal bar gyur pa
NK031(ki)004:985: // dang / gyi 'od kyis shin tu rnam par dag pa'i dngos nyid du byas la /
NK031(ki)004:986: badz+ra sa t+wa zhes rang nyid rdo rje sems dpa' /
NK031(ki)004:987: spyi bo'i nang khongs su'ang de dang ldan par blta'o //
NK031(ki)004:988: badz+ra sat+wa +aahzhesa 'jig rten mtha' dag sngags kyi sgras bkang ste /
NK031(ki)004:989: mgrin par rdo rje sems dpa' dmar po dang /
NK031(ki)004:990: badz+ra sa t+wa h'u zhes snying gar rdor sems sngon po dang /
NK031(ki)004:991: zla ba rdo rje sngon po h'u lnga ldan bsgoms la /
NK031(ki)004:992: de so so'i 'od kyis 'gro ba ma lus pa'i
NK031(ki)004:993: lus ngag yid gsum gyi dri ma sbyangs te rigs
NK031(ki)004:994: gsum rdo rje sems dpar gyur pa dang /
NK031(ki)004:995: yi ge brgya pa'i sgra dbyangs kyi dang /
NK031(ki)004:996: dbyings ye shes ro mnyam nyid kyi don la sems bzhag rnams bya zhing sngags bzla /
NK031(ki)004:997: bsdu ba'i rim pas sdud pa'o //
NK031(ki)004:998: de nas mdun gyii nam mkhar 'dab rgyas pad+mo'i ze'u 'brur zla ba nyi ma la /
NK031(ki)004:999: bla ma yi dam rje btsun rnam par snang mdzad
NK031(ki)004:1000: kun tu bzang po nya rgyas zla ba las lhag
NK031(ki)004:1002: mnyam bzhag byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya can rgyan
NK031(ki)004:1003: du ma dang ldan pa la rigs bzhi'i kun bzang
NK031(ki)004:1004: sogs bder gshegs du mas bskor ba dmigs la mchod
NK031(ki)004:1005: pas mchod de gsol ba drag tu gdab par bya'o
NK031(ki)004:1006: // de'i smin mtshams nas 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig bsam gyis mi khyab pa byung /
NK031(ki)004:1007: rang gi lus mtha' dag tu thim /
NK031(ki)004:1011: zer zer phran 'jig rten mtha' dag khyab /
NK031(ki)004:1012: thams cad mchog tu dri ma med par byas zhes nges pa rab tu brtan par bkod de /
NK031(ki)004:1013: bsngo ba smon lam byas la /
NK031(ki)004:1014: ci bder mchod do zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gcig la /
NK031(ki)004:1015: nges pa brtan pa nyid kyis ting nge 'dzin phyi
NK031(ki)004:1016: ma la 'jug go zhes bya ba ni gzhan no
NK031(ki)004:1017: // mdor na de dag ni dang po'i ting nge 'dzin te /
NK031(ki)004:1018: rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub pa rgyas pa dang /
NK031(ki)004:1019: pad+ma dbyings phyug ma sgrub pa dang /
NK031(ki)004:1020: las rgya mtsho'i rim pa rnams gzhan du rtogs par bya yi /
NK031(ki)004:1021: las dang po pa'i khrid rim dang ma 'brel zhing dbang rnon ngo sprod pa'ang /
NK031(ki)004:1022: dang por mkho ba ma yin no zhes shes par byos shig /
NK031(ki)004:1023: da ni bar gyi ting nge 'dzin dngos kyi rang bzhin la re zhig rnam pa bzhi ste /
NK031(ki)004:1024: lta ba thabs kyis bzung ba /
NK031(ki)004:1025: lta ba nyams su myong ba /
NK031(ki)004:1026: lta ba lam du slong ba /
NK031(ki)004:1027: lta ba ngo sprod pa zhes bya'o //
NK031(ki)004:1029: rgyu tshogs la gnas par bya ba dang /
NK031(ki)004:1030: rnal 'byor gyi zas bdun brten pa'o //
NK031(ki)004:1032: sgo gsum rnam par g.yo ba'i rkyen las 'khor bar 'khrul te /
NK031(ki)004:1033: g.yo ba med pa las rang gi de kho na nyid rtogs par 'gyur ro //
NK031(ki)004:1034: de bas na rkyen dang bral bar lhur blangs te /
NK031(ki)004:1036: ngag smra ba med pa dang /
NK031(ki)004:1037: sems dran bsam med pa yun ring du gnas par bya dgos pas /
NK031(ki)004:1038: lus bsam gtan gyi chos dang ldan pa la /
NK031(ki)004:1039: rlung btang bzung med pa dang /
NK031(ki)004:1040: sems spro bsdu'i rgyun gcod la gnas par bya'o //
NK031(ki)004:1041: zla ba lnga'am zhag nyer gcig la sogs pa'i bar du bsgom par bya ste /
NK031(ki)004:1043: rnal 'byor gyi zas brten pa ni /
NK031(ki)004:1044: khams reg gnyid sems rnam par shes //
NK031(ki)004:1045: ting 'dzin tshangs spyod rnam pa bdun //
NK031(ki)004:1046: zhes pa'i dang po ni dug tu 'gyur ba spangs te mthun pa bsten pa'o //
NK031(ki)004:1048: 'jam yang la sogs pa bsten no //
NK031(ki)004:1050: nyin spangs te mtshan bsten no //
NK031(ki)004:1054: 'dod pa'i yon tan lhag ma snga ma bzhin lam du byed pa'o //
NK031(ki)004:1056: sems gtad so cung zad kyang med par phyad de /
NK031(ki)004:1061: log pa bgrod pa spang ba ste /
NK031(ki)004:1062: 'di ltar zas kyis khams gso zhing tshogs la gnas pa ni bsgrub bya dngos so //
NK031(ki)004:1063: de las dang po g.yo ba'i nyams sna tshogs 'char /
NK031(ki)004:1064: de nas thob pa'i nyams sna tshogs 'char /
NK031(ki)004:1065: slar gnas pa de goms pas nyams yun du sdod pa 'byung /
NK031(ki)004:1066: de nas brtan pa'i nyams ci tsam 'dod 'dod du gnas pa 'byung ste /
NK031(ki)004:1067: nyams rnam pa bzhi po 'di nyams su myong na lta ba nyams su myong ba zhes bya'o //
NK031(ki)004:1069: ting nge 'dzin du ma'i sgo nas dang /
NK031(ki)004:1071: ting nge 'dzin mtshan bcas 'phrod pa'i rigs kyis zlum po dkar po /
NK031(ki)004:1075: sngo sang zlum po rnams dang /
NK031(ki)004:1081: +aahmh'u s+w+aa h+aa sogs la sems gtad pa'o //
NK031(ki)004:1082: mtshan med 'phrod pa'i rigs kyis ci la'ang mi sems par bzhag pa'o //
NK031(ki)004:1083: bskyed rim 'phrod pa'i rigs yod do //
NK031(ki)004:1087: snying gar mar me lta bu bsgom pa /
NK031(ki)004:1088: mar me'i snying po lta bu la bsgom pa dang /
NK031(ki)004:1091: lte bar pa wa sangs lta bu'i thig le bsgom
NK031(ki)004:1092: pa rlung sems 'dres pa'i thig le la bzung ba
NK031(ki)004:1093: dang / steng 'og gi rlung lcags kyu grol mdud ltar bya la /
NK031(ki)004:1094: sbrul mdud lta bu la bzung ba rnams steng 'og gi rlung 'jam po bde lugs dang /
NK031(ki)004:1095: 'gogs med dang sbyar ba dang bzhi'o //
NK031(ki)004:1096: skyil krung sa gnon la rlung drag tu bzung /
NK031(ki)004:1097: nam mkhar rang nyid gdugs dkar gyi steng na gnas pa 'khor bar bsgom pa dang /
NK031(ki)004:1098: 'khor lo la yang de ltar bya bas /
NK031(ki)004:1100: 'khor lo la brten pa zhes rtsub pa'o //
NK031(ki)004:1101: de la sogs pa thabs du mas bslang ngo //
NK031(ki)004:1112: zhes brgyad po bzhag thabs kyi rnal 'byor te /
NK031(ki)004:1113: bcad ces bya ba ni mtha'i dri ma bco brgyad bcad de /
NK031(ki)004:1127: sems la rnam rtog langs na phung /
NK031(ki)004:1128: gtang 'dzin byed na gnod cing brlag /
NK031(ki)004:1129: byung tshor gyi rjes su 'brengs na 'khor /
NK031(ki)004:1130: bying rmug gi dbang du song na 'thib /
NK031(ki)004:1131: spang blang byed na 'dzol zhes te tha ma kho nar bsdus so //
NK031(ki)004:1132: lta ba ngo sprad pa ni /
NK031(ki)004:1133: dang por gser gyi brag ri g.yu yis brgyan pa'i
NK031(ki)004:1134: rtser gser gyi mchod rten 'od gsal ba bsgom ste
NK031(ki)004:1135: / yid la gsal na de phyogs bcu gang na gnas pa /
NK031(ki)004:1138: nang lus kyi phyogs la yang de ltar te /
NK031(ki)004:1141: shar du song ngam zhes gsum gyis phye ba'am /
NK031(ki)004:1142: rnam dbye du mas btsal lo //
NK031(ki)004:1143: de nas rmi lam du de lta bu rmis pa de zhes snga ma ltar brtags pa dang /
NK031(ki)004:1144: de dag ji lta bar dngos su gser ri mchod rten gyis brgyan pa yang zhes brtag go //
NK031(ki)004:1145: gser ris mtshon nas sa ci snyed pa ste /
NK031(ki)004:1148: dngos snang gsum las rim bzhin blta'o //
NK031(ki)004:1160: gnyen dgra sogs kyis mtshon nas /
NK031(ki)004:1168: da lta'i sangs rgyas rnams dang /
NK031(ki)004:1176: dngos gsum gyis gtan la dbab ste /
NK031(ki)004:1177: nges pa mthong mthong du bya'o //
NK031(ki)004:1178: de thams cad byung song gnas pa med pas /
NK031(ki)004:1180: med kyang rnam par snang tsam /
NK031(ki)004:1181: rtag chad yod med kyi 'dzin pa las grol ba'i mthong ba skyes na ngo 'phrod pa ste /
NK031(ki)004:1182: sprod 'phrad bral rlung zhugs shes 'byung ngo //
NK031(ki)004:1183: 'byung lnga rang byung skye med du ngo sprad /
NK031(ki)004:1184: 'gro drug rang byung skye med du ngo sprad /
NK031(ki)004:1187: phun tshogs rang byung skye med du ngo sprod ces lnga po 'di dang /
NK031(ki)004:1188: gzhan yang ci rigs su shes par bya'o //
NK031(ki)004:1192: gnyis med rang grol zhes ngo sprad /
NK031(ki)004:1193: yang na 'og gi rdzong bzhis ngo sprad kyang rung ste /
NK031(ki)004:1194: gang la'ang yang yang 'dris shing thag bcad par bya ba ni gnad do //
NK031(ki)004:1197: rang 'phro ba rnams khyad med du grol bar mthong na nges pa rnyed pa zhes bya ste /
NK031(ki)004:1198: de lta bu ni bar gyi ting nge 'dzin no //
NK031(ki)004:1200: bsre ba gsum dang man ngag nyi shu ste /
NK031(ki)004:1201: lus ngag yid kyi kun spyod 'gro 'dug smra sems ma lus pa dang sbyar te bsgom pa /
NK031(ki)004:1202: nyin par las dang bya ba dang bsre ba zhes bya'o //
NK031(ki)004:1204: snying khar +aahmh'u s+w+aa h+aa sogs la sbyar te bsgom pa dang /
NK031(ki)004:1205: lta ba mthong ba'i ngang las ma g.yos par gnyid pas 'od gsal lam /
NK031(ki)004:1206: rmi lam gyis bsgoms pas 'grub ste mtshan mo gnyid dang rmi lam dang bsre zhes bya'o //
NK031(ki)004:1207: 'od kyi gong bu sogs 'phen 'dun gyis sbyor ba'am /
NK031(ki)004:1208: skye 'gag med pa'i gshis la blo des pas don bsgrubs la /
NK031(ki)004:1209: 'chi dus shes rab phar phyin dang bsre zhes de
NK031(ki)004:1210: ltar bsre ba gsum la bsgom bdag gtod ces kyang
NK031(ki)004:1211: bya'o // dran pa gdod nas dran med du gnas pa rang gsal ba dang /
NK031(ki)004:1212: shar snang ji snyed pa de nyid du nges pa dang /
NK031(ki)004:1214: gdod ma'i babs rnams la rdzong zhes /
NK031(ki)004:1215: dran pa gzhir bzhengs lta ba'i rdzong //
NK031(ki)004:1216: mthong tshe de nyid sgom pa'i rdzong //
NK031(ki)004:1217: thug 'phrad rang grol spyod pa'i rdzong //
NK031(ki)004:1218: skye ba med de 'bras bu'i rdzong //
NK031(ki)004:1220: thams cad du dran 'dzin brtan pa dang /
NK031(ki)004:1221: nyin mtshan snga phyi bar gyi dus bzhi'am /
NK031(ki)004:1222: thun bzhir bsgom la brtson pa dang /
NK031(ki)004:1223: lus ngag yid gsum lhug pa las mi g.yo ba dang /
NK031(ki)004:1224: ngo sprod kyi tshig bzhi gnad la dbab pa rnams rdzong la 'jug pa'i lam 'phrang ste /
NK031(ki)004:1225: dang po nyams len mkhan gyis dgos so zhes /
NK031(ki)004:1226: shes bya rtsis zin lta ba'i 'phrang //
NK031(ki)004:1227: dus bzhi mnyam sbyor sgom pa'i 'phrang //
NK031(ki)004:1228: sgo gsum rang grol spyod pa'i 'phrang //
NK031(ki)004:1231: ngo sprod mchog thob pa de 'phrang dang rdzong mi
NK031(ki)004:1232: dgos par snang srid yangs pa chos sku'i klong du
NK031(ki)004:1233: grol lo zhes / gcig shes kun grol lta ba'i klong //
NK031(ki)004:1234: zab mo nyams drug sgom pa'i klong //
NK031(ki)004:1235: tshor ba rjes med spyod pa'i klong //
NK031(ki)004:1238: de la brtan pa thob pas gding du 'gyur te /
NK031(ki)004:1239: rang byung ye shes lta ba'i gding //
NK031(ki)004:1240: ye shes rang sa bsgom pa'i gding //
NK031(ki)004:1241: ye shes zang thal spyod pa'i gding /
NK031(ki)004:1242: ye shes spyi blugs 'bras bu'i gding //
NK031(ki)004:1244: de nyid lha bzhir grub ste /
NK031(ki)004:1245: skye med tshig gcig lta ba'i lha //
NK031(ki)004:1246: shes bya gcig chod sgom pa'i lha //
NK031(ki)004:1249: zhes bya ba rnams yin no //
NK031(ki)004:1250: 'jigs med phyogs med kyi rig pa la //
NK031(ki)004:1251: phyogs 'dzin gyi lta bas ci bgyis //
NK031(ki)004:1252: rang sems chos nyid kyi dkyil 'khor la //
NK031(ki)004:1253: dmigs gtad kyi sgom pas ci bgyi //
NK031(ki)004:1254: ci byed byang sems kyi cho 'phrul la //
NK031(ki)004:1255: bzang ngan gyi spyod pas ci bgyi //
NK031(ki)004:1256: rnam rtog rang byung gi ye shes la //
NK031(ki)004:1258: thams cad ye dag gi ngo bo la //
NK031(ki)004:1260: rang sems sangs rgyas kyi rgyal po la //
NK031(ki)004:1261: gsar thob kyi 'bras bus ci bgyi //
NK031(ki)004:1262: zhes zab mo'i tshig drug ste /
NK031(ki)004:1263: de nyams su myong bar bya'o //
NK031(ki)004:1264: rig 'dzin dpa' bo mkha' 'gro'i mchod pa /
NK031(ki)004:1266: man+dala gsol 'debs rnams dang ldan pas /
NK031(ki)004:1267: snang ba rnams rang grol du ngo sprod pa rgyal thabs spyi blugs kyi dbang /
NK031(ki)004:1268: snga phyi bsre ba'i shes pa sogs med par rig
NK031(ki)004:1269: pa rang gsal mar me'i snying po ltar ngo sprad
NK031(ki)004:1270: pa rig pa rang gsal gyi dbang /
NK031(ki)004:1271: nam mkha' lta bu ye ji bzhin pa'i chos nyid
NK031(ki)004:1272: bsam bral du ngo sprad pa ye shes spyi blugs
NK031(ki)004:1273: kyi dbang ste gsum po cho gar byas kyang rung
NK031(ki)004:1274: / ngo sprod rnal ma thob nas nges shes skyes na cho ga med kyang thob ste /
NK031(ki)004:1276: ma bskur thob sogs mu bzhis shes so //
NK031(ki)004:1277: des snyan brgyud rin po che bsdus te lag tu len tshul yin la /
NK031(ki)004:1278: rgyas par gdabs dpung cha lag dang bcas par rgyas par gsal bas der blta'o //
NK031(ki)004:1279: rab yangs lta ba'i mkha' la spyod 'dod na //
NK031(ki)004:1280: ji bzhin lta ba mngon du byed pa'i gnad //
NK031(ki)004:1281: mgon po rnam par snang mdzad thugs kyi bcud //
NK031(ki)004:1282: yang dag nges pa'i gsang 'di bsgom par mdzod //
NK031(ki)004:1283: gang dag phyogs zhen dri mas sbags blo can //
NK031(ki)004:1284: zab mo'i chos la gshed ma ltar mthong ba //
NK031(ki)004:1285: de 'dra'i smra bas grol ba'i sgo 'gegs te //
NK031(ki)004:1286: khyed cag 'bad de bsam mi khyab dran bya'o //
NK031(ki)004:1287: gang 'di sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag mdzad de //
NK031(ki)004:1288: legs par grub pa rin chen dam pa'i chos //
NK031(ki)004:1289: log par mthong smra dmyal ba'i lcags kyu che //
NK031(ki)004:1290: gang la bsnun pa nyams byed 'jigs su rung //
NK031(ki)004:1291: phung khrol dbyig brtsegs de 'dra mi mthong zhing //
NK031(ki)004:1292: mi thos mi dran yang na de yi gnyen //
NK031(ki)004:1293: smin grol bla med rab sbyin nyid gyur te //
NK031(ki)004:1294: 'gro kun mchog gi lta la sbyor gyur cig /
NK031(ki)004:1295: snyan brgyud rin po che'i khrid kyi man ngag mkha' dbyings snying po'i bde khrid ces bya ba /
NK031(ki)004:1296: dpal mkha' spyod pas chu bo gang+g+aa gser ldan dang nye ba'i ljongs su bris pa'o //
NK031(ki)004:1301: dpal dus gsum shes bya kun mkhyen /
NK031(ki)004:1302: ldan rin chen zhes bya ba ni nye brgyud do //
NK031(ki)004:1305: byang sems snying po'i pra khrid bzhugs so //
NK031(ki)004:1306: lhun grub byang sems bsgom par mos na /
NK031(ki)004:1307: sngon 'gro snyan brgyud nyid dang mthun te /
NK031(ki)004:1308: dngos gzhi la pan+di sngon du shes pas mtha' bcad pa /
NK031(ki)004:1310: ku su lu'i sgom pa kho na /
NK031(ki)004:1314: dang po la bzung thabs zin rtags las /
NK031(ki)004:1315: dang po skyil krung sa gnon /
NK031(ki)004:1316: rlung yid tsam bcing ba'am rgya yan la sems rten med du bzhag cing /
NK031(ki)004:1317: gdugs dang 'khor lo yang 'og rlung drag dang sbyor la drag tu bsgoms te /
NK031(ki)004:1319: lcags sbub tu chu 'dus pa lta bu /
NK031(ki)004:1323: rtsa mchog ser bus gdung ba lta bu /
NK031(ki)004:1325: rus sbal mkhar gzhong lta bu /
NK031(ki)004:1327: rgun snye ba la ba lta bu /
NK031(ki)004:1329: dri bzhon dal gyis ldang ba lta bu dang drug go //
NK031(ki)004:1330: g.yo yang med pa ltar gsal yang mi 'gyu ba /
NK031(ki)004:1331: sems bzung ba'i man ngag go //
NK031(ki)004:1341: 'di ltar snang srid 'khor 'das su snang ba 'di thams cad chos nyid yin /
NK031(ki)004:1343: de nyid shar zhes rgyas par ngo sprod pa'i man ngag /
NK031(ki)004:1345: lam la 'khor ba lugs 'byung dang lugs ldog gnyis las /
NK031(ki)004:1346: dang por rang gis rang bcings /
NK031(ki)004:1347: dar srin nam rgyal bu ltar rang gis rang ma rig ste /
NK031(ki)004:1348: rgyu lhan skyes kyi ma rig pa /
NK031(ki)004:1349: rkyen kun brtags kyi ma rig pa /
NK031(ki)004:1352: rang ngo ma rtogs pa nyid /
NK031(ki)004:1353: dpe thag sbrul dar srin sogs chos drug ldan lugs 'byung ste /
NK031(ki)004:1354: gdams ngag gis bzlog par bya ba la /
NK031(ki)004:1356: brtson 'grus can tshe 'dir btab pas grol ba dang /
NK031(ki)004:1357: le lo can 'chi khar btab pas grol ba'o //
NK031(ki)004:1361: lta ba gding med bya sgro rlung khyer lta bu /
NK031(ki)004:1362: 'jug sgo lam bral lag rdum brag 'dzegs /
NK031(ki)004:1363: spyod pa grogs med dmus long mthar 'khyams gsum spangs la /
NK031(ki)004:1364: lta ba gding ldan khyung chen mkhar lding /
NK031(ki)004:1365: 'jug sgo lam ldan gar spyin sbrang 'byar /
NK031(ki)004:1366: spyod pa grogs bcas b+hi shwa karma rnams shes par bya /
NK031(ki)004:1369: spyod pa shugs 'byung zhes pa dgos la /
NK031(ki)004:1372: spyod pa tshul 'chos su ma shor ba gal che'o //
NK031(ki)004:1373: lta sgom spyi'i go don no //
NK031(ki)004:1375: 'di ltar snang ba'i 'di thams cad phan pa phyogs gcig tu grub pa'ang med /
NK031(ki)004:1376: gnod pa phyogs gcig tu grub pa'ang med /
NK031(ki)004:1380: dug phyogs gcig tu grub pa'ang med /
NK031(ki)004:1387: de bas na chos thams cad ji ltar snang yang rang sems zhes bya'o //
NK031(ki)004:1388: rang sems de gzugs sgra dri ro sogs ma rnyed de stong pa /
NK031(ki)004:1391: de gnyis gdod nas gnyis med ro mnyam /
NK031(ki)004:1392: gnyis med de ye nas rang grol bas de nyid sangs rgyas chen po zhes bya'o //
NK031(ki)004:1395: lta ba bzhi sbyor du ngo sprod pa'i man ngag go //
NK031(ki)004:1397: man ngag gi gnad btsal ba'i thos pa bya ba /
NK031(ki)004:1403: phyi nang gi dgon pa bsten pa ste /
NK031(ki)004:1404: sngon 'gro bzhis sgom chas su gzhug pa'i man ngag go //
NK031(ki)004:1406: stan la lus gnad bcas la lta thog tu bzhag la lta bas mtshams sbyar te bsgom pa /
NK031(ki)004:1407: lus kho na srang du bcug ste bya ba sgo bcad pa'i mtshams sbyor /
NK031(ki)004:1410: sems lta gsum ka dang ldan /
NK031(ki)004:1411: sgo gsum gyi mtshams sbyor zhes rab 'bring tha ma'i mtshams sbyor gsum gsum man ngag go //
NK031(ki)004:1415: gnyis med chos kyi chos nyid du ngo sprad pa nyid gsum bsre ba'i man ngag go //
NK031(ki)004:1417: log na legs par btsal ba sems 'tshol ba rjes med kyi man ngag go //
NK031(ki)004:1418: kun gzhi sgo lnga rtog med du bzhag pa yid phra ma mkhan bskyar 'don gyi man ngag go //
NK031(ki)004:1420: sems yal thabs ni byang sems cog bzhag ma'i man ngag ste zab /
NK031(ki)004:1421: man ngag bzhis bsgom dngos ngo sprad pa /
NK031(ki)004:1425: bya btang skyes bu gsum ni bzhag thabs so //
NK031(ki)004:1427: khyim stong gi rkun ma ltar bcos /
NK031(ki)004:1429: nam mkha' sprin ltar bcos pa rnams rab lta bas bcos pa /
NK031(ki)004:1432: lus la bde ba skyes pa ri bo zhags bzhi /
NK031(ki)004:1436: ngag la skye ba glu dbyangs sogs /
NK031(ki)004:1437: sems la skye ba snying kha'i thig le dkar rnams bying ba bcos pa /
NK031(ki)004:1441: rgod sel te khyi'usa 'byin lta bu /
NK031(ki)004:1442: tha ma gdams ngag gis bcos pa ste /
NK031(ki)004:1443: bcos thabs gsum gyi man ngag go //
NK031(ki)004:1446: rgyal po'i btsun mo ltar zhes gcun thabs gsum mo //
NK031(ki)004:1449: shing bal gsum tshad gsum mo //
NK031(ki)004:1452: rtog gsum du yod du mi tshor drod gsum mo /
NK031(ki)004:1455: snang ba lam slong rnams phyi nang gsang ba rtags gsum mo //
NK031(ki)004:1456: de ltar bzhag thabs nas rtags kyi bar thabs drug gis bsgom gyi gzhung srang ba'i man ngag go //
NK031(ki)004:1460: dum bu tsam las med pa snyam byed phyi'i rtags thabs gsum /
NK031(ki)004:1463: phyad kyis song ba snyam nang gi gsum /
NK031(ki)004:1466: dga' ya le gsum ni gsang ba'i /
NK031(ki)004:1467: rig pa rang grol ba mthar thug gi gcig ste bsgom snang bcus bsgom ngos bzung ba'o //
NK031(ki)004:1469: gsung rab lta ba sogs lta bas bskyed gdon /
NK031(ki)004:1472: goms nas phyag rgya lhan cig kun tu rgyu ba rigs spyod spyod pas bskyed gdon pa /
NK031(ki)004:1473: sha lnga sogs bsten pa bdud rtsis bskyed gdon pa ste bogs 'don gsum mo //
NK031(ki)004:1475: phung po'i bdud lam gyi gzhi /
NK031(ki)004:1478: 'chi bdag lam gyi rgyan du bya ba bdud bzhi rnam rgyal /
NK031(ki)004:1480: nyin par las dang bya ba /
NK031(ki)004:1481: mtshan mo gnyid rmi lam mtshams su ye shes bzhi sbyor dang bsre zhes bsre thabs gsum /
NK031(ki)004:1483: bying rgod bcos pas so skye'i gol sa gcod /
NK031(ki)004:1484: rtag chad bral bas mu stegs gol sa gcod /
NK031(ki)004:1485: blos byas zhig pas skye mched mu bzhi'i gol sa gcod /
NK031(ki)004:1486: thi bya ltar ram thos bsam gyis theg chen bsam
NK031(ki)004:1487: gtan gyi gol sa gcod de gol sa bzhi bcad
NK031(ki)004:1491: yon tan thams cad 'dus pa'i phan yon /
NK031(ki)004:1492: tshegs chung don che'i phan yon te phan yon bzhi'o //
NK031(ki)004:1494: de ltar sgom chas su gzhug pa /
NK031(ki)004:1503: sgom dpal yon phun tshogs zhes don bcus /
NK031(ki)004:1504: sgom zhib tshags su gdab pa'o //
NK031(ki)004:1506: gtad med smyon pa lta bu /
NK031(ki)004:1507: zhen bral bu chung lta bu /
NK031(ki)004:1508: chad med 'on lkugs lta bu gsum shes rab dang mthun pa'i spyod pa /
NK031(ki)004:1509: spang blang 'jug ldog ci ltar rigs rigs su bya ba thabs dang mthun pa'i spyod pa /
NK031(ki)004:1511: gnas lugs dang sgo gsum rgyun gyi spyod pa ste rnam gsum spyod pa'i 'khor lo'o //
NK031(ki)004:1513: lta ba mnyam nyid bzhi sbyor la /
NK031(ki)004:1514: sgom pa chings bcu'i rgyan dang ldan //
NK031(ki)004:1515: spyod pa ye shes gsum skor gyis //
NK031(ki)004:1518: 'chi tshul shes par bya ba 'chi ba rjes dran /
NK031(ki)004:1519: gang la'ang snying po med par nges pa skyes pa rjes dran /
NK031(ki)004:1520: 'chi ba skyes pa'i chos nyid du nges nas zhen 'khris skrag sogs gtang ba gtong ba rjes dran /
NK031(ki)004:1521: snang ba thams cad sna tshogs gsal ba'i lha /
NK031(ki)004:1522: rang rig byang sems bde chen gyi lha /
NK031(ki)004:1523: 'khor ba ye dag snying po'i lhar nges pa lha rjes dran /
NK031(ki)004:1524: da lta dngos kyi bar do /
NK031(ki)004:1526: shi nas srid pa bar do gsum dbyer med du nges pa bar do rjes dran /
NK031(ki)004:1529: dran pa ye shes gsum gcig tu 'dres pa don gsum gcig dril gyi man ngag ces bya ste /
NK031(ki)004:1531: rjes dran drug gis 'chi khar btab grol gyi man ngag go //
NK031(ki)004:1534: 'chi khar gdab grol gnyis kyis lam rtogs pa'i don /
NK031(ki)004:1536: bde chen byang chub kyi sems 'di nyid sangs rgyas kyi dngos gazhi'am ngo bo'o //
NK031(ki)004:1537: de yi rtsal dag snang can la longs sku /
NK031(ki)004:1538: 'khrul snang can la sprul sku du ma ste rnam pa'o //
NK031(ki)004:1539: chos thams cad de nyid du rtogs pa mthar phyin pa ni thob pa'o //
NK031(ki)004:1542: tha ma skye ba gsum mam bdun tshun nges pa ste dus so //
NK031(ki)004:1543: de ltar sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo /
NK031(ki)004:1546: dus mtshams bzhis 'bras bu rdzogs pa'i don no //
NK031(ki)004:1548: gzhi ni gnyug ma snying po'i don //
NK031(ki)004:1549: lam ni rang grol rtogs pa'i don //
NK031(ki)004:1550: 'bras bu ye dag rdzogs pa'i don //
NK031(ki)004:1551: don gsum snying po byang chub lam //
NK031(ki)004:1553: de ltar man ngag snying po gnad la phab pa ste lam du bya'o //
NK031(ki)004:1554: sems nyid lam du byed pa la //
NK031(ki)004:1555: kun bzang byang sems snying po'i lam //
NK031(ki)004:1556: lam rnams kun gyi rgyal po mchog /
NK031(ki)004:1557: 'di ni gsang chen snying po'i bcud //
NK031(ki)004:1558: e ma ho grogs dag brtson pa'i dpal //
NK031(ki)004:1559: ha cang 'phel ba de lta na'ang //
NK031(ki)004:1560: mthong shes rtogs pas grol med par //
NK031(ki)004:1561: grol ba rnams sbyin 'dis tshim byos //
NK031(ki)004:1562: snyan brgyud rin po che byang sems snying po'i pra
NK031(ki)004:1563: khrid ces bya ba dpal mkha' spyod pas rtsa ba
NK031(ki)004:1564: dang mthun par gangs can lho phyogs kyi rgyud du
NK031(ki)004:1565: bris pa'o ////// slob dpon dga' rab rdo rje nas
NK031(ki)004:1566: brgyud pa'i rdzogs pa chen po sems sde'i pra khrid
NK031(ki)004:1568: rdzogs pa chen po sems sde khams lugs /
NK031(ki)004:1570: rang bzhin skye med chos kyi sku //
NK031(ki)004:1571: rol pa 'gag med sprul pa'i sku //
NK031(ki)004:1572: mtshan nyid dbyer med longs spyod sku //
NK031(ki)004:1573: rig pa rang grol ngo bo'i sku //
NK031(ki)004:1575: sku lnga yongs rdzogs kun tu bzang //
NK031(ki)004:1576: bka' brgyud bla mar bcas pa la //
NK031(ki)004:1578: de la 'dir theg pa dgu'i yang rtse /
NK031(ki)004:1580: dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bgrod pa gcig tu gyur pa'i lam /
NK031(ki)004:1581: rnal 'byor pa thams cad kyi don du gnyer bya'i man ngag /
NK031(ki)004:1582: sprul pa'i sku mchog dga' rab rdo rjes mdzad pa'i
NK031(ki)004:1583: rdzogs pa chen po'i pra khrid kyi man ngag 'di
NK031(ki)004:1584: la gnyis te / bla ma brgyud tshul gyi rim pa dang /
NK031(ki)004:1586: dang po la ring brgyud ni /
NK031(ki)004:1587: chos sku kun tu bzang po /
NK031(ki)004:1588: longs sku rdo rje sems dpa' /
NK031(ki)004:1589: sprul sku dga' rab rdo rje /
NK031(ki)004:1590: rgyal ba dgongs pa'i brgyud pa'o //
NK031(ki)004:1591: de nas slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen /
NK031(ki)004:1605: de nas g.yu sgra snying po /
NK031(ki)004:1619: chos rje badz+ra sh+r+ai'i bar gang zag snyan nas snyan du brgyud pa'o //
NK031(ki)004:1628: dpal 'bar ba la gang byo'i tshul du tshig don ma lus pa gnang ba'o //
NK031(ki)004:1630: dam pa chen po la dpal rdo rje sems dpas
NK031(ki)004:1631: dngos su zhal gzigs nas yang dag pa'i don ma
NK031(ki)004:1634: rtsa ba'i bla ma nyid sangs rgyas dngos yin par rgyud thams cad nas gsungs so //
NK031(ki)004:1635: brgyud pa'i bar ma chad pa ni rang gi sems
NK031(ki)004:1636: nyid rtogs na sku lnga lhun grub kyi sangs rgyas
NK031(ki)004:1638: gnyis pa brgyud pa de las byung ba'i man ngag la gsum ste /
NK031(ki)004:1639: sngon du 'gro bas rgyud snod du rung bar byed pa dang /
NK031(ki)004:1640: dngos gzhi nyams su blang ba'i rim pa dang /
NK031(ki)004:1641: rjes 'bras bu ci ltar thob pa'i tshul bstan pa'o //
NK031(ki)004:1642: dang po la gsum gyi thog mar yi ge brgya pa'i bsgom bzlas dang /
NK031(ki)004:1643: bla ma'i rnal 'byor thun mong du bya ba ni /
NK031(ki)004:1644: bdag dang sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal
NK031(ki)004:1645: gyi rgya mtsho las sgrol nas sangs rgyas kyi go
NK031(ki)004:1646: 'phang rin po che thob pa zhig dkon mchog drug
NK031(ki)004:1647: po 'di mkhyen snyam pa byas la /
NK031(ki)004:1648: bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro dang sangs rgyas chos
NK031(ki)004:1649: dang dge 'dun rnams la skyabs su 'gro ba mang
NK031(ki)004:1650: du bya'o // de nas khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad kyis /
NK031(ki)004:1651: thog ma med pa nas bdag gi pha ma byas
NK031(ki)004:1652: shing drin gyis bskyangs pa kho na yin pa rnams
NK031(ki)004:1653: da lta rigs drug 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal myong ba
NK031(ki)004:1654: 'di dag bde ba dang ldan sdug bsngal dang bral
NK031(ki)004:1655: nas sangs rgyas kyi sa la 'god par byed pa
NK031(ki)004:1656: la / thog mar bdag 'tshang rgya dgos te /
NK031(ki)004:1657: de'i ched du dge sbyor bya'o snyam du nges par sems bskyed /
NK031(ki)004:1658: de nas rin po che'i sa gzhi sangs rgyas kyi
NK031(ki)004:1659: zhing khams rnam par dag pa'i dbus su pad+ma nyi
NK031(ki)004:1660: zla'i steng du / rang gi sems nyid h'u dkar
NK031(ki)004:1661: po las 'od 'phros 'phags pa mchod sems can gyi
NK031(ki)004:1662: don byas sgrib pa sbyangs nas rdo rje sems dpa'i
NK031(ki)004:1664: 'od tshur 'dus yongs su gyur pa las /
NK031(ki)004:1665: rang nyid rdo rje sems dpa' dkar po zhal gcig
NK031(ki)004:1666: phyag gnyis rdo rje dang dril bu thugs kar bsnol
