NK031(ki)004:1667: ba / zhabs rdo rje'i skyil krung dang dar sna lnga'i sham thabs byas pa /
NK031(ki)004:1668: rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i thugs
NK031(ki)004:1669: kar zla ba'i steng du rdo rje dkar po rtse
NK031(ki)004:1670: lnga pa'i lte bar zla ba'i steng du h'u la
NK031(ki)004:1671: yi ge brgya pas g.yas su 'khor ba /
NK031(ki)004:1672: rang gi spyi gtsug nyi zla'i steng du rtsa ba'i
NK031(ki)004:1673: bla ma dang dbyer med pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'
NK031(ki)004:1674: sku mdog sngon po nam mkha'i mdog can /
NK031(ki)004:1675: zhal gcig phyag gnyis rdo rje dang dril bu bsnol
NK031(ki)004:1676: mar 'dzin cing dar dang rin po che dang rus
NK031(ki)004:1677: pa'i rgyan drug gis brgyan pa /
NK031(ki)004:1678: snang la rang bzhin med pa 'ja' tshon gyi sku lta bu'i dpral bar /
NK031(ki)004:1681: phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi rgyal ba sras bcas thams
NK031(ki)004:1682: cad rdo rje sems dpa'i rnam par byon nas spyi
NK031(ki)004:1683: bo'i bla ma rdo rje sems dpa' la thim pa
NK031(ki)004:1684: lan bdun / rdo rje bsdu ba'i phyag rgya g.yas su bskor ba dang /
NK031(ki)004:1685: se gol bcas pas lan bdun yi ge brgya pa tshar bdun bzla ba rim bzhin sprod /
NK031(ki)004:1686: de nas bla ma rdo rje sems dpa'i sku gsung
NK031(ki)004:1687: thugs las ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun byung
NK031(ki)004:1688: nas rang gi spyi bor babs /
NK031(ki)004:1689: lus kyi nad gdon sems kyi sdig sgrib dam tshig chag nyams thams cad 'og sgo dang /
NK031(ki)004:1690: rkang zhabs su bud nas song bas /
NK031(ki)004:1691: rang lus phru ma phus btab pa lta bu'i nang
NK031(ki)004:1692: zag med ye shes kyi bdud rtsis gang bar bsam
NK031(ki)004:1693: zhing / badz+ra sat+wa sa ma ya /
NK031(ki)004:1695: badz+ra sat+wa te no pa tish+tha /
NK031(ki)004:1697: su to sh+yo me b+ha wa /
NK031(ki)004:1698: a nu rak+to me b+ha wa /
NK031(ki)004:1699: su po sh+yo me b+ha wa /
NK031(ki)004:1703: ha ha ha ha hoh b+ha ga w+aan sarba ta th+aa ga ta /
NK031(ki)004:1704: badz+ra m+aa me muny+tsa badz+r+ai b+ha wa ma h+aa sa
NK031(ki)004:1705: ma ya sa t+wa +aah zhes gsal dag tu bzlas
NK031(ki)004:1706: shing / thun rting la bdag gi sdig sgrib nyes ltung thams cad bshags so //
NK031(ki)004:1708: zhes brjod la bla ma rang la bstim /
NK031(ki)004:1709: rang thugs ka'i rdo rje la /
NK031(ki)004:1711: h'u 'ja' yal ba ltar song nas chos kyi dbyings
NK031(ki)004:1712: su 'dres par bsam pa'i ngang nas dmigs med du
NK031(ki)004:1714: de nas rtags thon par byed pa gal che ste /
NK031(ki)004:1715: rtags ni sngar bas dad pa che ba /
NK031(ki)004:1716: mi rtag pa rgyud la skye ba /
NK031(ki)004:1717: sems dga' zhing dge sbyor la blo 'jug pa /
NK031(ki)004:1718: sems can la byams snying rje skye ba dang rmi
NK031(ki)004:1719: lam du ri dang skas la sogs par gyen la
NK031(ki)004:1726: lus las 'bu srin dang khrag rnag bud pa /
NK031(ki)004:1727: skyugs sbyong dang gos dkar po gyon pa /
NK031(ki)004:1728: me tog gi gling du phyin pa la sogs pa rmi'o //
NK031(ki)004:1730: rdo rje sems dpa' bsgoms nas ni //
NK031(ki)004:1731: sngags kyang rab tu zlo byed pa //
NK031(ki)004:1732: de yi sdig kun dag nas kyang //
NK031(ki)004:1736: mdun du thugs kyi ngo bo rdo rje sems dpa' ni //
NK031(ki)004:1737: nam mkha'i mdog can rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa'i gnas gsum du //
NK031(ki)004:1738: sku gsung thugs kyi yig 'bru 'od zer can //
NK031(ki)004:1739: bdag gis lus la zhugs pas sdig pa dag nas byin rlabs 'jug pa nyid //
NK031(ki)004:1741: gnyis pa tshogs gnyis rdzogs shing byin rlabs 'jug par
NK031(ki)004:1742: byed pa man+dala dang bla ma'i rnal 'byor bsgom pa
NK031(ki)004:1744: yi ge brgya pa'i bsgom bzlas sngon du song bas /
NK031(ki)004:1745: rang yi dam rdo rje sems dpa'i smin mtshams nas
NK031(ki)004:1746: b+h+r+aum spros pa las mdun gyi man+dala de 'od du
NK031(ki)004:1747: zhu bas rin po che kha dog brgya rtsa brgyad
NK031(ki)004:1748: la mig mang ris su bsdebs pa'i sa gzhi mnan
NK031(ki)004:1749: na nem pa btegs na 'phar ba /
NK031(ki)004:1750: gzhi mdo thams cad rin po che sna tshogs pa'i tshom bus spras pa /
NK031(ki)004:1751: mig gis bltar mi bzod pa'i 'od dang ldan pa
NK031(ki)004:1752: rgya chos dbyings nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i dbus su
NK031(ki)004:1753: / rin po che'i khri ka ba brgyad kyis btegs pa mdzod mig bdun bdun dang ldan pa /
NK031(ki)004:1754: gdung ma zung sgril du 'khor ba seng ge brgyad
NK031(ki)004:1755: kyis btegs shing rin po che'i d+r+wa bas khri khebs
NK031(ki)004:1757: pad+ma stong ldan dang nyi ma'i gdan la /
NK031(ki)004:1758: rtsa ba'i bla ma dang chos sku kun tu bzang po dbyer med pa la /
NK031(ki)004:1759: brgyud tshul gsum gyi bla ma rnams kyis bskor ba /
NK031(ki)004:1760: de'i mdun du glang chen brgyad kyis btegs pa'i gdan drug brtsegs la /
NK031(ki)004:1761: yi dam rgyal ba'i lha tshogs la mkha' 'gro chos skyong rnams kyis bskor ba /
NK031(ki)004:1762: bla ma'i g.yas su rta mchog brgyad kyis btegs pa'i gdan drug brtsegs la /
NK031(ki)004:1763: sangs rgyas dkon mchog sku gsum gyis bsdus pa rnams dang /
NK031(ki)004:1764: rgyab phyogs su rma bya brgyad kyis btegs pa'i gdan drug brtsegs la /
NK031(ki)004:1765: chos dkon mchog rgyu 'bras lam gsum gyis bsdus pa
NK031(ki)004:1766: rnams gser gyi shog bu la bee d+aur+ya zhun mas
NK031(ki)004:1767: rang nan du bris pa'i glegs bam rang sgra grags
NK031(ki)004:1768: pa rnams dang / g.yon phyogs su shang shang brgyad kyis btegs pa'i gdan la /
NK031(ki)004:1769: dge 'dun dkon mchog rig pa 'dzin pa rnams la
NK031(ki)004:1770: sa dang lam la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
NK031(ki)004:1771: rnams dang rang sangs rgyas nyan thos chen po dgra
NK031(ki)004:1772: bcom pa rnams bzhugs par bsam la /
NK031(ki)004:1773: rang bzhin gyi gnas dang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten nas /
NK031(ki)004:1774: de 'dra ba thams cad spyan drangs la so sor bstim /
NK031(ki)004:1775: de dag la mchod pa'i dngos po nam mkha' khyab
NK031(ki)004:1776: tshad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams sa gzhi dang ri
NK031(ki)004:1777: dang khang pa thams cad kyang rin po che sna
NK031(ki)004:1779: rtsi shing nags tshal thams cad dpag bsam shing las dgos 'dod 'byung ba /
NK031(ki)004:1780: mtsho dang chu thams cad yan lag brgyad ldan gyi
NK031(ki)004:1781: mtsho dang rdzing bu gser dngul gyi bye ma gdal
NK031(ki)004:1782: ba / gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya thams cad
NK031(ki)004:1783: mchod rdzas kyi bye brag dngos po bzang la gya
NK031(ki)004:1784: ba / nom pa / rang gi lus zhing gi rdul snyed du sprul nas /
NK031(ki)004:1785: skye 'gro lha'i bu dang bu mo /
NK031(ki)004:1786: gzugs byad mchog tu gyur pa /
NK031(ki)004:1787: ngag tu ci smra thams cad dbyangs dang bstod pa /
NK031(ki)004:1788: rkang lag gi 'du byed thams cad bro dang gar /
NK031(ki)004:1790: lag tu gang bzung thams cad lha'i na bza' do shal dpung rgyan se mo do dang /
NK031(ki)004:1791: ye shes kyi bdud rtsi la sogs pa'i mchod rdzas su gyur pa dang /
NK031(ki)004:1792: nam mkha' bar snang sa gzhi thams cad rin po
NK031(ki)004:1793: che'i sprin las dgos 'dod char du dbab pa dang
NK031(ki)004:1794: / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan bla re yol ba la sogs pa sprin bzhin 'khrigs pa /
NK031(ki)004:1795: me tog ut+pala dang pad+ma la sogs dri bsung phyogs bcur 'phro ba rnams rtsi shing ltar rgyas pa /
NK031(ki)004:1796: mdor na phyogs bcu rab 'byams mu med mtha' klas pa thams cad /
NK031(ki)004:1797: 'phags pa kun tu bzang po'i rnam par thar pa
NK031(ki)004:1798: lta bu'i mchod pas rgyas par bkang ste 'bul bar
NK031(ki)004:1799: bsam la / mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen po ni //
NK031(ki)004:1800: sems kyi yid bzhin sprin tshogs kyis //
NK031(ki)004:1801: phyogs bcu thams cad sangs rgyas zhing //
NK031(ki)004:1802: mnyen 'jam reg na bde ba yi //
NK031(ki)004:1803: sna tshogs rin po che yi gzhir //
NK031(ki)004:1804: mdzes par bres shing spras pa dang //
NK031(ki)004:1806: dbyibs legs rdzing bu bro mchog bsil //
NK031(ki)004:1807: rin chen khang pa sna tshogs dang //
NK031(ki)004:1808: rgyan dang dpag bsam ljon pa'i tshal //
NK031(ki)004:1809: glu dbyangs tshigs su bcad pa'i sgra //
NK031(ki)004:1810: bla bre rgyal mtshan na bza' gdugs //
NK031(ki)004:1811: do shal dpung rgyan se mo do //
NK031(ki)004:1812: bza' dang btung ba'i mchog rnams kyis //
NK031(ki)004:1813: rang la mdzes par brgyan pa yi //
NK031(ki)004:1814: lha dang lha mo rdul snyed kyi //
NK031(ki)004:1815: bro gar la sogs bsam yas kyis //
NK031(ki)004:1816: phyogs bcu nam mkha'i khams bkang nas //
NK031(ki)004:1818: ces dmigs pa dang bcas pas brgya rtsa'am nyer gcig la sogs thun re la bya'o //
NK031(ki)004:1819: de ltar sems nyid skye ba med pa'i ngang las
NK031(ki)004:1820: 'gag pa med pa'i rtsal gyi rnam pa 'phrul ba
NK031(ki)004:1821: sgyu 'phrul chen po'i tshul du mchod pa ni longs
NK031(ki)004:1822: sku'i zhing sgrub pa'i man+dala thun mong ma yin pa'o
NK031(ki)004:1823: // de nas sprul sku'i zhing sgrub pa thun mong gi man+dala 'bul ba ni /
NK031(ki)004:1824: rang yi dam rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs ka nas t+r+aam gcig spros pa 'od du zhu ba las /
NK031(ki)004:1825: mtha' yi rgya mtsho chen po'i dbus su ri bo mchog rab /
NK031(ki)004:1826: shar shel dkar po las grub pa /
NK031(ki)004:1828: nub pad+ma r+aa ga dmar po /
NK031(ki)004:1829: byang gser las grub pa ser po /
NK031(ki)004:1830: steng sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i longs spyod /
NK031(ki)004:1831: phyi rol rgyal chen sde bzhi'i longs spyod /
NK031(ki)004:1832: khong gseng lha ma yin gyi longs spyod /
NK031(ki)004:1833: 'og klu'i longs spyod dang bcas pa gser gyi ri bdun rol pa'i mtsho bdun gyis bskor ba /
NK031(ki)004:1834: de'i shar phyogs kyi gling lus 'phags po dang /
NK031(ki)004:1835: g.yas g.yon du gling g.yogs lus dang lugs 'phags gnyis /
NK031(ki)004:1836: de bzhin du lho 'dzam bu gling /
NK031(ki)004:1837: rnga yab dang rnga yab gzhan /
NK031(ki)004:1841: sgra mi snyan dang sgra mi snyan gyi zla /
NK031(ki)004:1842: gling gi phyi rol lcags ri mu khyud kyis bskor ba /
NK031(ki)004:1849: dmag dpon te rgyal srid sna bdun dang /
NK031(ki)004:1851: bkra shis rdzas brgyad la sogs pa lha mi'i longs spyod dpal 'byor gyis gang ba dang /
NK031(ki)004:1852: nam mkhas khyab tshad kyi gling bzhi'i 'jig rten stong gsum mu med pa thams cad /
NK031(ki)004:1853: rin chen sman dang 'bru la sogs pa bkang ste /
NK031(ki)004:1854: sngar gyi dmigs yul tshan pa lnga po la 'bul bar bsam la /
NK031(ki)004:1856: gling bzhi dkyil 'khor rin chen ldan //
NK031(ki)004:1857: dpag bsam shing dang rdzing bu mdzes //
NK031(ki)004:1858: las bzhi byin rlabs lhun grub pa //
NK031(ki)004:1859: lha dang lha mo'i longs spyod ldan //
NK031(ki)004:1861: zhes thun rer bargya'am nyer gcig phul na /
NK031(ki)004:1862: rgyu bsod nams kyi tshogs des 'bras bu ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par byed de /
NK031(ki)004:1863: chos rnams thams cad 'bras bu yongs rdzogs pa'i //
NK031(ki)004:1864: sangs rgyas rnams la man+dala 'di phul bas //
NK031(ki)004:1865: 'bras bu 'phags pa'i nor bdun lhun grub ste //
NK031(ki)004:1866: ting 'dzin 'bum phrag rnams la dbang sgyur shog /
NK031(ki)004:1868: de nas thal mo sbyar te yid kyis mos gus
NK031(ki)004:1869: gdung ba zhe thag pa nas gsol ba gdab pa
NK031(ki)004:1871: phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /
NK031(ki)004:1876: zhing khams zag pa med pa zad mi shes pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo'i bden pa dang /
NK031(ki)004:1879: smin pa rgya mtsho'i bka' brgyud kyi bla ma rin po che rnams kyi byin rlabs kyis /
NK031(ki)004:1880: sems can thams cad kyi don du bdag ming rdo rje che ge mo zhes bgyi ba la /
NK031(ki)004:1881: rdzogs pa chen po shin tu rnal 'byor gyi don
NK031(ki)004:1882: rang byung gi ye shes de kho na nyid kyis
NK031(ki)004:1883: gang ba dang / shin tu gang ba dang /
NK031(ki)004:1889: shin tu grol ba rgya chen po mdzad du gsol /
NK031(ki)004:1890: zhes thun re la nyer gcig la sogs pas gsol ba gdab nas /
NK031(ki)004:1891: dkon mchog rigs drug tshan lnga po de 'od du zhu nas rtsa ba'i bla ma la thim /
NK031(ki)004:1892: tshom bu bsdus la rang gi spyi bor bzhag /
NK031(ki)004:1893: bla ma bdag la thugs rjes nye bar dgongs nas spyi bor byon te /
NK031(ki)004:1894: sna tshogs pad+ma nyi ma zla ba'i steng du rdo
NK031(ki)004:1895: rje sems dpa' bde ba chen po'i sku zhal gcig
NK031(ki)004:1896: phyag gnyis pa / rdo rje dril bu thugs kar bsnol bas yum la 'khyud pa /
NK031(ki)004:1897: ral pa bcings pa'i lhag ma grol ba /
NK031(ki)004:1898: dar ser po'i tshangs skud se ral khar thogs pa /
NK031(ki)004:1899: yum rdo rje snyems ma dmar mo g.yas yab la 'khyud cing /
NK031(ki)004:1900: g.yon dril bu snyan rtsar 'khrol ba /
NK031(ki)004:1901: yab yum gnyis ka la rin po che'i dbu rgyan /
NK031(ki)004:1908: sku reg thams cad kyis brgyan cing /
NK031(ki)004:1909: dar sna lnga'i sham thabs byas pa /
NK031(ki)004:1910: zhabs rdo rje dang pad+ma'i skyil krung du bzhugs pa /
NK031(ki)004:1911: snang la rang bzhin med pa /
NK031(ki)004:1912: nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi brjid dang ldan pa'i spyi bo dkar po /
NK031(ki)004:1914: thugs kar h'u sngon po bsam /
NK031(ki)004:1915: de nas bdag gi lus longs spyod kha rje dbang
NK031(ki)004:1916: thang dus gsum gyi dge rtsa bde skyid dpal 'byor
NK031(ki)004:1917: phun sum tshogs pa thams cad bla ma dam pa
NK031(ki)004:1918: la 'bul lo // bzhes su gsol lo //
NK031(ki)004:1919: bdag la dbang bskur byin gyis brlab tu gsol /
NK031(ki)004:1920: lus ngag yid gsum smin cing grol bar byin gyis brlab par mdzad du gsol /
NK031(ki)004:1921: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla ma dam
NK031(ki)004:1922: pa'i rtogs pa khyad par can da lta nyid du
NK031(ki)004:1923: bdag gi rgyud la skye bar mdzad du gsol /
NK031(ki)004:1924: zhes gdung sems drag pos brgya rtsa brgyad la sogs pa gsol ba btab pa'i rjes la /
NK031(ki)004:1925: bla ma yab yum ma chags thabs kyi rol pa'i 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros /
NK031(ki)004:1926: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud
NK031(ki)004:1927: bskul byin rlabs bsdus bla ma yab yum la thim
NK031(ki)004:1928: / sbyor ba mdzad nas byang sems dkar dmar babs /
NK031(ki)004:1929: bdag gi las nyon shes sgrib thams cad dag nas
NK031(ki)004:1930: rang rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du gsal ba la
NK031(ki)004:1931: / bla ma'i dpral ba nas dkar po 'od zer
NK031(ki)004:1932: dang bcas pa byung ba bdag gi spyi bor thim
NK031(ki)004:1935: lus sprul skur mngon du byas ang snyam pa bya'o //
NK031(ki)004:1936: de bzhin du bla ma'i mgrin pa nas +aahdamara po 'od zer dang bcas pa byung /
NK031(ki)004:1937: rang gi lce thog tu thim /
NK031(ki)004:1941: thugs ka nas h'u mthing ga 'od zer dang bcas pa rang gi snying nang du thim /
NK031(ki)004:1943: thugs shes rab ye shes kyi dbang thob /
NK031(ki)004:1944: sems chos skur grol bar bsam /
NK031(ki)004:1945: de nas bla ma yab yum dgyes pa'i tshul gyis tshangs bug nas mar byon /
NK031(ki)004:1946: rang gi snying pad+ma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa zhig tu gyur pa'i dbus su /
NK031(ki)004:1947: nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan la zhal 'dzum mul le /
NK031(ki)004:1950: yab yum dkar dmar lham mer bzhugs pa la ci nus su sems gtad /
NK031(ki)004:1951: de nas bla ma yab yum 'od du zhu nas /
NK031(ki)004:1952: dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i bla ma de'i k+aa w+aa tsi dang /
NK031(ki)004:1953: rang gi lus ngag yid gsum dbyer med du 'dres /
NK031(ki)004:1954: sgo gsum tha dad kyi dri ma dag /
NK031(ki)004:1955: ye shes rdo rje'i tshig gis sbyin pa'i dbang thob /
NK031(ki)004:1956: ngo bo nyid dang gsang ba'i sku mngon du gyur ang snyam pa'i rjes la /
NK031(ki)004:1957: dus gsum gyi rtog pa bcad nas sems ma bcos lhug par bzhag pa yun bsring /
NK031(ki)004:1958: thun rting dge ba bsngo ste /
NK031(ki)004:1959: bdag gis dge ba'i las 'di bgyis pa yis //
NK031(ki)004:1960: 'jig rten ring por mi thogs sangs rgyas nas //
NK031(ki)004:1961: de kun 'gro la phan phyir dam chos kyis //
NK031(ki)004:1962: sems can sdug bsngal tsha gdung sgrol gyur cig /
NK031(ki)004:1963: 'di la rtags ma byung bar du gnyug bsring ba gal che ste /
NK031(ki)004:1964: byin rlabs ma zhugs na nyams rtogs mi skye zhing /
NK031(ki)004:1965: bla ma'i byin rlabs zhugs na nyams rtogs btsan thabs su skye bar gsungs so //
NK031(ki)004:1966: rtags ni rab snang srid chos skur rtogs pa /
NK031(ki)004:1968: bde gsal mi rtog pa'i nyams gcig car du skye ba /
NK031(ki)004:1969: tha mas 'khor ba la blo ldog cing /
NK031(ki)004:1970: bla ma la sangs rgyas dngos kyi 'du shes skye ba dang /
NK031(ki)004:1971: rmi lam du rin po che dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing la sogs pa dag pa'i snang ba 'byung /
NK031(ki)004:1972: spyir gsang sngags dbang gis khyad par byas pa yin cing /
NK031(ki)004:1973: dbang thams cad las ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang zab /
NK031(ki)004:1974: de las bla ma la dbang blang ba zab cing /
NK031(ki)004:1975: bla ma snying dbus su bsgoms pas snying rlung la sogs pa'i smyo 'bogs dang /
NK031(ki)004:1976: 'byung ba 'khrugs pa'i nad thams cad dang /
NK031(ki)004:1977: gdon gyi bar chad thams cad mi 'byung zhing /
NK031(ki)004:1978: ting nge 'dzin gyi yon tan rin po che ma
NK031(ki)004:1979: lus pa 'byung bar gsungs pa la rang gis myong
NK031(ki)004:1981: bka' rgya yod kyang gzhan phan gyi blo kho nas bris pa rtsa gsum tshogs la bzod par gsol /
NK031(ki)004:1982: gang gis rdo rje slob dpon nyid //
NK031(ki)004:1983: bkur zhing spyi bor sus sgom pa //
NK031(ki)004:1984: de la rgyal bas byin gyis rlobs //
NK031(ki)004:1985: rgyal ba'i dgongs pa de yis 'dzin //
NK031(ki)004:1987: bla ma dam pa he ru ka yi gtsug rgyan nyid //
NK031(ki)004:1988: mos shing gus pa yon tan kun gyi gzhi //
NK031(ki)004:1989: zhes sogs rgyud sde'i lung dpag tu med do //
NK031(ki)004:1990: gsum pa bar chad bsrung ba'i don du rang yi
NK031(ki)004:1991: dam he ru ka ye shes kyi khro bo gang
NK031(ki)004:1992: rung bsgoms pa'i thugs kar h'u mthing nag gcig bsam
NK031(ki)004:1993: la / h'u de 'dra ba grangs med pa byung /
NK031(ki)004:1994: sna bug g.yas nas phyir thon lo ka'i khams thams cad h'u sgra dang bcas pas gang /
NK031(ki)004:1995: sna bug g.yon nas tshur byung /
NK031(ki)004:1996: lus kyi nang thams cad h'u sgra dang bcas pas gang bar bsam zhing /
NK031(ki)004:1997: ngag tu h'u ring bgrang ngo //
NK031(ki)004:1998: dbugs phyir 'gro tshur 'ong gang la yang phyi nang
NK031(ki)004:1999: gi h'u gis mgrin pa'i bar du gang bar bsam
NK031(ki)004:2000: pa'o // bar chad bsal phyir h'u ring bgrang //
NK031(ki)004:2001: h'u gi sbyor bas phyogs mtshams bsrung //
NK031(ki)004:2003: sngon 'gro 'di rnams dang po re re nas rtags thon par bya zhing /
NK031(ki)004:2004: phyis kyang thun mgo thams cad la bya'o //
NK031(ki)004:2005: thun ring thung gang la yang snga ma bskyur nas phyi ma la 'jug pa ma yin /
NK031(ki)004:2006: skyabs 'gro sems bskyed nas bzung ste snga ma la
NK031(ki)004:2007: phyi ma phyi ma snon pa'i tshul du bya zhing
NK031(ki)004:2008: / thams cad kyi thun rting dmigs med du bzhag la dge ba bsngo /
NK031(ki)004:2009: gnyis pa dngos gzhi la gnyis te /
NK031(ki)004:2010: snod bcud kyi mtshan nyid dang /
NK031(ki)004:2014: nges pa'i lung ldan slob dpon gyis //
NK031(ki)004:2015: rnal 'byor pa yi don ched du //
NK031(ki)004:2016: byang chub sems kyi pra khrid kyi //
NK031(ki)004:2017: sgom pa'i rim pa bstan pa'o //
NK031(ki)004:2019: bla ma dang slob ma gdams ngag gi mtshan nyid gsum ston te /
NK031(ki)004:2020: bla ma ni nges don ston pa'i rgyud lung man ngag mkhyen pa /
NK031(ki)004:2021: kun tu bzang po nas rim par dbang bzhi'i chu bo ma nub pa /
NK031(ki)004:2022: byin rlabs nyams rtogs kyi zam ma chad pa /
NK031(ki)004:2023: snyan brgyud gdams ngag gi gnad ma 'chug pa /
NK031(ki)004:2024: rang 'dod med pa gzhan rjes su bzung nus pa'i bla ma /
NK031(ki)004:2025: slob ma'i mtshan nyid 'khor ba la nges 'byung gi blo skyes pa /
NK031(ki)004:2026: snyan grags la sogs pa tshe 'di'i bya ba rgyab tu dor ba /
NK031(ki)004:2027: dkon mchog gsum la mi phyed pa'i dad pa dang ldan zhing /
NK031(ki)004:2028: las rgyu 'bras khyad du mi gsod pa /
NK031(ki)004:2029: dbang thob cing dam tshig dang ldan pa /
NK031(ki)004:2030: bla ma la sangs rgyas su blta zhing lus longs spyod gtong nus pa /
NK031(ki)004:2031: gdams ngag la gces spras su byed cing phyi bshol med par sgrub pa /
NK031(ki)004:2032: rnal ma don dam pa'i chos nyid la blo 'byor nus pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa'o //
NK031(ki)004:2033: gdams ngag gi mtshan nyid ni /
NK031(ki)004:2034: las thabs sna tshogs pas tshe 'di sgrub pa'i thabs dang /
NK031(ki)004:2035: rang nyid zhi bde sgrub pa theg dman gyi lam dang /
NK031(ki)004:2036: bskal pa grangs med du sa lam bgrod pa mtshan nyid kyi lugs dang /
NK031(ki)004:2037: mtshan bcas rtsol sgrub la ltos pa gsang sngags 'og ma'i thabs thams cad las khyad par 'phags pa /
NK031(ki)004:2038: 'khor 'das ngo bo gcig pa'i don byang chub kyi sems /
NK031(ki)004:2039: chos sku mngon sum du rtogs shing mngon du byed
NK031(ki)004:2040: pa la brda thabs lag len gyi rim pas pra
NK031(ki)004:2041: thabs su khrid par byed pa 'di bstan pa'o //
NK031(ki)004:2042: gnyis pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pa ni /
NK031(ki)004:2044: dang por gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin //
NK031(ki)004:2045: gnyis pa la ni mi g.yo ba //
NK031(ki)004:2046: gsum pa mnyam pa nyid du 'gyur //
NK031(ki)004:2047: bzhi pa ye shes lhun gyis grub //
NK031(ki)004:2050: skyes bu rim gyis skyed rdzogs pa la /
NK031(ki)004:2054: stobs rdzogs nas tshe dang lus stobs mthar phyin pa bzhi yod cing /
NK031(ki)004:2055: lo thog rim gyis skyes pa la yang ljang bu dang /
NK031(ki)004:2058: rnga btsas zin nas mthar phyin pa bzhi yod pa ltar /
NK031(ki)004:2059: gang zag blo'i rim gyis sa lam bgrod pa la yang /
NK031(ki)004:2060: dang po sems las su rung bar byed pa zhi gnas nyams kyi dus dang /
NK031(ki)004:2061: gnyis pa lhag mthong rtog pa mi g.yo ba'i dus dang /
NK031(ki)004:2062: gsum pa zhi gnas nyams rtogs gcig tu 'dres pa mnyam pa nyid kyi dus dang /
NK031(ki)004:2063: bzhi pa ye shes lhun grub lam mthar phyin pa'i dus kyi rnal 'byor dang bzhi'o //
NK031(ki)004:2064: de la dang po sems zhi gnas kyis sems las su rung bar byed pa la bzhi ste /
NK031(ki)004:2065: ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag pa'i thabs /
NK031(ki)004:2066: de las skyes pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dpe /
NK031(ki)004:2068: 'bras bu ci ltar thob tshul bstan pa'o //
NK031(ki)004:2071: dgon par mnyam par bzhag pa'i tshe //
NK031(ki)004:2072: rkyen gyi tshogs rnams ma byung bar //
NK031(ki)004:2073: ji srid gnas la gnas zhes bya //
NK031(ki)004:2075: dang por 'jug pa'i 'gal rkyen spang zhing mthun rkyen bsten pa /
NK031(ki)004:2077: bar du ting nge 'dzin gyi skyon ngos bzung zhing spang ba /
NK031(ki)004:2078: ting nge 'dzin gyi ngo bo bzhis ston te /
NK031(ki)004:2080: tshe 'dir rang nyid gnyen 'dun dang bcas pa bde skyid dpal 'byor 'dod cing /
NK031(ki)004:2081: dgra'i phyogs 'dul ba'i don du mi dge ba bcu la sogs sdig pa dang /
NK031(ki)004:2082: tshong khe spogs so nam rtsol sgrub shes yon grong
NK031(ki)004:2083: chog bzo rtsis sman bon la sogs pa'i lto gos
NK031(ki)004:2084: dang rnyed bkur snyan grags sgrub pa thams cad 'du
NK031(ki)004:2085: 'dzi rnam g.yeng 'khor ba'i bya ba yin pas ring
NK031(ki)004:2086: du spangs la / bsten bya ni /
NK031(ki)004:2087: grong yul las ring du dpag pa dgon pa'i gnas
NK031(ki)004:2088: mi dang mi ma yin pa gcan gzan la sogs
NK031(ki)004:2090: chu shing la sogs mthun rkyen bsgrub sla ba /
NK031(ki)004:2091: nyams dga' zhing dge sbyor 'phel ba'i gnas su mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i bla ma dang /
NK031(ki)004:2092: chos mthun gyi grogs bzang po bsten par bya'o //
NK031(ki)004:2093: gnyis pa mnyam par bzhag pa'i thabs ni /
NK031(ki)004:2095: ma lus sems can thams cad la //
NK031(ki)004:2096: byang chub snying po'i rang bzhin gnas //
NK031(ki)004:2097: de don rtogs par bya ba'i phyir //
NK031(ki)004:2098: ma zin zin phyir gnad bzhi bsgom //
NK031(ki)004:2099: zhes pas bca' ba lus kyi gnad bsam gtan chos bdun byas te /
NK031(ki)004:2102: lag pa mnyam bzhag byas nas dpung pa brgyang /
NK031(ki)004:2105: so yar mar ma reg tsam bya /
NK031(ki)004:2106: mchu'i bar rlung 'grim pa tsam du sbyar /
NK031(ki)004:2107: lto ba gsus po che phyir brgyang /
NK031(ki)004:2108: mig sna rtser smin mtshams nas phar thad kyi lag
NK031(ki)004:2109: pa'i sleb so tsam du ma 'gul bar gtad de
NK031(ki)004:2110: / dmigs pa yul gyi gnad ni /
NK031(ki)004:2111: dmigs pa gtad sa der a dkar po gsal zhing
NK031(ki)004:2112: 'tsher ba gcig la skad cig kyang ma yengs par
NK031(ki)004:2113: gtad do // rgyu ba rlung gi gnad ni /
NK031(ki)004:2114: thun 'go la rlung ro drag po lan dagu'am gsum
NK031(ki)004:2115: la sogs par 'bud nas dbugs rang sar klod la
NK031(ki)004:2116: bzhag / 'dzin pa sems kyi gnad la dmigs bcas dang dmigs med gnyis kyi dang po ni /
NK031(ki)004:2117: a de la sems zin nas gzhan du mi 'phro ba dang /
NK031(ki)004:2118: rtog med du lhan ne gnas pa ma byung gi
NK031(ki)004:2119: bar du zhag gcig thun drug la sogs par byas
NK031(ki)004:2120: nas skabs su khams bseng bya zhing bsgom mo //
NK031(ki)004:2122: dang po dben par lus bsdad nas //
NK031(ki)004:2123: bya rgod mkha' la 'phur ba bzhin //
NK031(ki)004:2124: dmigs gtad byas pa'i rig pa gtad //
NK031(ki)004:2125: rlung sems gcig tu byas pa des //
NK031(ki)004:2126: rtsol ba drag la thun du bya //
NK031(ki)004:2127: dmigs pa dag la brten nas su //
NK031(ki)004:2128: mi dmigs pa dag rab tu skye //
NK031(ki)004:2130: gnyis pa dmigs med la sems gtad thabs gsum gyi /
NK031(ki)004:2131: dang po lus ngag gi gnad sngar ltar byas la /
NK031(ki)004:2132: yid kyis 'das ma 'ongs da ltar gyi bsam pa ci yang mi byed de /
NK031(ki)004:2133: sngar gyi dmigs pa gtad sa a'i mal der /
NK031(ki)004:2134: yid mig rlung gsum rtse gcig tu bsgrims la gtad
NK031(ki)004:2135: cing logs su skad cig kyang yengs la ma shor
NK031(ki)004:2136: bar byas la rtog pa ci byung tol skyes rbad
NK031(ki)004:2140: da lta'i shes pa ma bcos pa //
NK031(ki)004:2141: mda' mkhan smyug ma srong ba bzhin //
NK031(ki)004:2142: dmigs pa'i rtsol ba drag tu bsgrim //
NK031(ki)004:2144: gnyis pa rtog pa ngos zin nas bcad mi thub
NK031(ki)004:2145: pa zhig 'byung ba'i skabs su lus sems gnyis ka
NK031(ki)004:2146: khong klod la / sgom mi skye dogs pa'i blo mi byed nas /
NK031(ki)004:2147: rnam rtog bzang ngan ci byung yang /
NK031(ki)004:2148: sngon bsu rgyab skyel mi byed nas /
NK031(ki)004:2149: rang mal du klod la klod thog der bzhag ci nyan bya'o //
NK031(ki)004:2151: de la bzhag thabs bstan pa ni //
NK031(ki)004:2152: lus ngag yid gsum mi bsdom par //
NK031(ki)004:2153: sos dal khong klod bzhag pa yin //
NK031(ki)004:2155: gsum pa 'gyu ba gnas pa gnyis so sor shes nas /
NK031(ki)004:2156: lus sems gnyis ka ha cang mi bsgrims mi klod /
NK031(ki)004:2157: ran mor bde tshod tsam du byas la /
NK031(ki)004:2158: rnam rtog bde mi bde ci byung yang bcas bcos
NK031(ki)004:2159: mi byed par kho rang gang byung de nyid kyi
NK031(ki)004:2160: steng du tsan ne bzhag cing 'tsho shes pa logs
NK031(ki)004:2161: su yan mi gzhug pa gal che'o //
NK031(ki)004:2163: shes pa so ma gcig tu sdod //
NK031(ki)004:2164: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa yin //
NK031(ki)004:2166: gsum pa skyon ngos bzung nas bsal ba la /
NK031(ki)004:2167: dam pa rin po ches gol sgrib sum cur gsungs pa'i nang nas /
NK031(ki)004:2168: ting nge 'dzin dang por mi skye zhing bar du mi 'phel ba'i skyon drug dang /
NK031(ki)004:2169: bar chad bcu drug gsungs te /
NK031(ki)004:2170: de la skyon ni rnam pa drug /
NK031(ki)004:2171: glo bur 'dod chags ldang ba dang //
NK031(ki)004:2172: zhe sdang chen po 'byung ba dang //
NK031(ki)004:2173: nga rgyal phrag dog sems 'khrugs dang //
NK031(ki)004:2174: lta ba khengs dang de drug go //
NK031(ki)004:2175: le lo bya ba mang ba dang //
NK031(ki)004:2176: sems g.yeng sems rgod de dang ni //
NK031(ki)004:2177: sems sdug pa dang sems rjes 'brang //
NK031(ki)004:2178: sems rmugs pa dang rtog pa mang //
NK031(ki)004:2179: re ba mang dang dogs pa mang //
NK031(ki)004:2181: gnyid dga' kha ton klog 'bri dang //
NK031(ki)004:2182: bre mo'i gtam dang cal col smra //
NK031(ki)004:2183: bar du gcod pa bcu drug ste //
NK031(ki)004:2184: mkhas pas 'di dag spang bar bya //
NK031(ki)004:2186: skyon de dag ngos zin nas dran shes bag yod dang ldan pas spang bar bya'o //
NK031(ki)004:2187: de yang ting nge 'dzin gyi skyon thams cad bying /
NK031(ki)004:2191: bying ba ni shes pa hon nas ci byas ma tshor ba'o //
NK031(ki)004:2192: rmugs pa ni shes pa mi gsal bar nag thibs se ba'o //
NK031(ki)004:2193: rgod pa ni sems cung re gnas kyang bsam blo tsab tsub cung re dran pa'o //
NK031(ki)004:2194: 'thor ba ni sgom brjed nas rnam rtog kha 'byams pa'o //
NK031(ki)004:2195: de bsal ba la gnyis te /
NK031(ki)004:2196: sgom pa'i shugs las byung ba dang /
NK031(ki)004:2197: rkyen gyis byung ba bsal ba'o //
NK031(ki)004:2199: sgom dus bying zhing rmugs na /
NK031(ki)004:2200: mtho la bsil ba'i sar stan srab mo la bsdad
NK031(ki)004:2201: nas lus sems hur bton la shes pa seng nge
NK031(ki)004:2202: ye re hrig ge cig byas la bsgom /
NK031(ki)004:2204: rgod cing 'thor na dro zhing dma' ba dang nag pa'i sar stan 'bol ba la bsdad /
NK031(ki)004:2205: lus sems khong klod la lta stangs smad la bsgom mo //
NK031(ki)004:2206: zas bcud can dang chang bzang po yod na nyung tsam btang ngo //
NK031(ki)004:2207: gnyis pa rkyen gyi 'byung ba ni /
NK031(ki)004:2208: sngar gyi gegs sam 'phral la chags sdang gi yul ngan gyis lhongs nas bying rgod byung na /
NK031(ki)004:2210: chags sdang gti mug dbang gis ni //
NK031(ki)004:2211: rgod cing bying bar gyur pa'i tshe //
NK031(ki)004:2212: phyi nang gsang ba gsum po la //
NK031(ki)004:2213: sems gtod nas ni zhi bar 'gyur //
NK031(ki)004:2216: mya ngan 'das kyi yon tan bsam //
NK031(ki)004:2217: nang gi shes pa rtse gcig bsdam //
NK031(ki)004:2218: gsang ba lta ba dran par bya //
NK031(ki)004:2220: skabs su bsgom 'tsher lus rmya zhing rtsub pa /
NK031(ki)004:2221: gnyid mi phebs pa byung na bku mnye bya /
NK031(ki)004:2224: 'gro 'dod pa dang sems g.yeng ba dang mgo bo stod na ba byung na /
NK031(ki)004:2227: rlung ro drag tu 'bud nas lus klod /
NK031(ki)004:2228: lus ljid sa la phabs nas shes pa lte bar gtad cing bsgom mo //
NK031(ki)004:2230: skyon dang bcos thabs la sogs kun //
NK031(ki)004:2231: nyams dang khams kyi tshod bzung nas //
NK031(ki)004:2232: skyon bcos sgrim klod zhal las shes //
NK031(ki)004:2234: bzhi pa ting nge 'dzin gyi ngo bo la lnga ste /
NK031(ki)004:2235: nyams skye tshul gyi rim pa /
NK031(ki)004:2236: ting nge 'dzin rang gi ngo bo /
NK031(ki)004:2240: de dag re re la yang gsum gsum mo //
NK031(ki)004:2241: skye tshul la g.yo thob brtan gsum ste /
NK031(ki)004:2243: dang po bsgoms pas rnam rtog sngar bas mang du song /
NK031(ki)004:2244: sgom mi skye bar 'dug snyam pa 'byung /
NK031(ki)004:2245: de ni rnam rtog ngos zin pa yin pas /
NK031(ki)004:2246: gong du bstan pa ltar skyon dbang du ma song bar byas la /
NK031(ki)004:2247: rnam rtog kho rang gi steng du klod cing bzhag pas /
NK031(ki)004:2248: skabs su yod pa snyam pa dang /
NK031(ki)004:2250: lhan ne gnas pa snyam dang /
NK031(ki)004:2251: za yun thung ba tsam du rtog pa 'phro ba 'byung ngo //
NK031(ki)004:2253: de yang dang por chu drag bzhin /
NK031(ki)004:2254: rnam rtog mang zhing cung zad gnas //
NK031(ki)004:2256: gnyis pa thob pa'i nyams ni /
NK031(ki)004:2257: thun gyi mgo rkang bar gsum du ma nges par /
NK031(ki)004:2260: rtog pa med par mer re ba'am /
NK031(ki)004:2262: bde gsal mi rtog gsum char du skye ba'o //
NK031(ki)004:2264: de nas dal drag chu bo bzhin //
NK031(ki)004:2265: res 'ga' res rtog thun phyed gnas //
NK031(ki)004:2267: gsum pa brtan pa'i nyams ni /
NK031(ki)004:2268: thun re'am nyi dros pa'i bar tsam mam /
NK031(ki)004:2269: phyed skabs tsam du yang bying rmugs rgod 'thor med
NK031(ki)004:2270: par bde gsal mi rtog gsum ka 'char ram shas
NK031(ki)004:2271: gang che ma nges pa la gnas pa 'byung ste
NK031(ki)004:2273: de nas dal 'bab chu bo bzhin //
NK031(ki)004:2274: shes pa dal zhing thun du gnas //
NK031(ki)004:2276: gnyis pa ting nge 'dzin gyi ngo bo ngos bzung ba la gsum ste /
NK031(ki)004:2277: rab kyis mnyam bzhag tu bde gsal mi rtog pa
NK031(ki)004:2278: gsum dus gcig tu skye ba de yang nyams phyi
NK031(ki)004:2279: nang 'char ba / sems nang du yod snyam pa lta bu ma yin par /
NK031(ki)004:2280: rang gi sems de nyid ngo bo nyid kyis bde ba /
NK031(ki)004:2281: rang bzhin gsal ba gnyis su med par thag chod pa'i ngang la /
NK031(ki)004:2282: shes pa rtse gcig tu gnas pa 'byung ba ni /
NK031(ki)004:2283: sngar thos bsam gyi blo dang mi 'dra bar /
NK031(ki)004:2284: don nyams su myong ba'i nges shes kyi dga' spro /
NK031(ki)004:2285: don gnyer mis don grub pa lta bu 'byung ngo //
NK031(ki)004:2286: sems rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'i mnyam bzhag tshe na 'byung ba ste /
NK031(ki)004:2288: mnyam nyid yul bral ting 'dzin la //
NK031(ki)004:2289: ma yengs ngang gis gnas par bya //
NK031(ki)004:2290: skyes bu rab kyi spyod yul yin //
NK031(ki)004:2293: de nyid rang gi sems kyi rang bzhin du shes
NK031(ki)004:2294: kyang rnam rtog dang 'od gsal so sor 'dzin pa
NK031(ki)004:2297: yul dang shes pa'i tshul du mthong //
NK031(ki)004:2299: tha ma ni lus bde sems dga' ba'i ngang nas
NK031(ki)004:2300: shes pa mi 'phro bar lhan ne gnas pa 'byung
NK031(ki)004:2302: tha ma rtog pa'i bslad bral bar //
NK031(ki)004:2303: mi g.yo tsam du gnas pa nyid //
NK031(ki)004:2306: rab dran pa zin dus sems rang snang yin pa dang /
NK031(ki)004:2307: ma zin dus kyang tha mal gyi dngos 'dzin chung ba /
NK031(ki)004:2308: 'bring dran pa zin dus sgyu ma lta bu rang bzhin med pa yin snyam pa dang /
NK031(ki)004:2309: ma zin dus tha mal du 'gro /
NK031(ki)004:2310: tha ma dngos 'dzin rang ga ma'o //
NK031(ki)004:2312: rjes shes dran pa ma zin nas //
NK031(ki)004:2313: tha mal 'chor ba btang snyoms gnas //
NK031(ki)004:2314: dran zin tha mal a 'thas log /
NK031(ki)004:2318: gsum pa mnyam bzhag gi ting nge 'dzin de rgyun du rang gi rgyud la btsa' thabs gsum ni /
NK031(ki)004:2319: dper na nor yod pa'i mis skyong bran dgos pa dang 'dra bas /
NK031(ki)004:2320: rab kyis za nyal 'gro 'dug spyod lam rnam bzhi
NK031(ki)004:2321: thams cad du lta bas snang srid thams cad sems
NK031(ki)004:2323: sgom pas yul sems gnyis med rig pa rang gsal gyi ngang la rgyun khyer bya'o //
NK031(ki)004:2325: spyod lam rnam bzhi ci spyod kyang //
NK031(ki)004:2326: sems kyi rtsi yis zin pas na //
NK031(ki)004:2327: 'di ni bzhag thabs dam pa ste //
NK031(ki)004:2328: dgongs pa sangs rgyas thugs dang mnyam //
NK031(ki)004:2330: 'bring gis mnyam bzhag dus kyi 'od gsal de /
NK031(ki)004:2331: da lta'i rang gi shes rig gi ngo bo gsal
NK031(ki)004:2332: stong 'di yin pa la 'gyur ba med par ngos
NK031(ki)004:2333: bzung zhing / gang shar gyi steng du ma yengs par rig pa cog bzhag bya'o //
NK031(ki)004:2334: ma yengs lam du khyer dgos pas /
NK031(ki)004:2336: dper na rmu rgod rta 'dul ltar //
NK031(ki)004:2337: ma yengs par ni bsgom par bya //
NK031(ki)004:2339: tha mas lus ngag yid gsum gyi g.yeng ba thams cad btsan thabs su bor zhing /
NK031(ki)004:2340: yun ring thung che chung ci nus pas khod snyoms su mnyam par bzhag pa la brtson par bya'o //
NK031(ki)004:2342: phyi nang g.yeng bas ma gos pa'i //
NK031(ki)004:2343: gnas su yang yang bsgom par bya'o //
NK031(ki)004:2345: bzhi pa thun tshad la gsum ste /
NK031(ki)004:2346: khams bde zhing ting nge 'dzin gsal ba'i dus su thun ring bar bya /
NK031(ki)004:2347: khams nyog cing mi gsal ba'i dus su thun chung la grangs mang bar bya'o //
NK031(ki)004:2348: nyin mtshan gyi gung gnyis dang mtshams gnyis bying rgod
NK031(ki)004:2349: kyi dus yin pas srod tho reng snga dro phyi
NK031(ki)004:2350: dro bzhi la brtson nas bsgom goms nas spyod lam
NK031(ki)004:2352: thun la bcad du med par rgyun du ting nge 'dzin dang mi 'bral bar bya'o //
NK031(ki)004:2354: thun tshad rab 'bring gsum du bcad //
NK031(ki)004:2355: khams bde thun ni ring bar bya //
NK031(ki)004:2356: mi bde thun bzhir bcad par bya //
NK031(ki)004:2357: thun chen goms pa'i rnal 'byor bya //
NK031(ki)004:2359: lnga pa bogs dbyung ba la gsum ste /
NK031(ki)004:2360: rab rtogs pas bogs dbyung ba ni /
NK031(ki)004:2361: snang sems la bzang ngan dang bde sdug gi 'char tshul ci byung yang /
NK031(ki)004:2362: blo ma bcos par gang shar de nyid kyi ngo bo la bltas pas /
NK031(ki)004:2363: mtshan 'dzin gyi rig pa nyid rang bzhin skye med /
NK031(ki)004:2365: mtshan nyid dbyer med du grol bas /
NK031(ki)004:2366: snang ba dang rang rig dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'gyur ro //
NK031(ki)004:2367: 'bring gis spyod lam la lta sgom gyis rgyas gdab cing /
NK031(ki)004:2368: skabs su rgyud lung zab mo'i lta ba dang /
NK031(ki)004:2372: mdo rgyud dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'gyur ro //
NK031(ki)004:2373: tha mas 'chi ba mi rtag pa bsam zhing /
NK031(ki)004:2374: bla ma la yang yang zhu gtugs dang /
NK031(ki)004:2375: grogs po la gsal 'debs zhu ba dang /
NK031(ki)004:2376: ting nge 'dzin la brtson 'grus kyis bogs 'don te /
NK031(ki)004:2377: bla ma dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten par bya'o //
NK031(ki)004:2378: spyir rab 'bring tha ma gsum ka la yang /
NK031(ki)004:2379: bla ma la sangs rgyas dngos kyi 'du shes bskyed la rgyun du gsol ba gdab pa dang /
NK031(ki)004:2380: sems can thams cad la nye ring med par pha
NK031(ki)004:2381: ma'i 'du shes kyis byams snying rje bsgom pa dang
NK031(ki)004:2382: / nyams su blangs pa'i brtson 'grus yengs pa med pa dang /
NK031(ki)004:2383: tshe 'di'i bde skyid snyan grags zas nor nye du'i
NK031(ki)004:2384: zhen pa thams cad btsan thabs su bcad na myur
NK031(ki)004:2385: du yon tan chen po 'ong nges so //
NK031(ki)004:2387: lung zab bla ma nyams can spun //
NK031(ki)004:2388: blta dang lta 'bul nyams bsdur dang //
NK031(ki)004:2390: gnas lugs dran pa'i rtsis zin pas //
NK031(ki)004:2391: gsang spyod thabs la bsten pa dang //
NK031(ki)004:2392: rlung dang bde ba'i man ngag dang //
NK031(ki)004:2393: dmigs med snying rje bsgom pa dang //
NK031(ki)004:2394: gdams pa'i gnad dang shes rab kyis //
NK031(ki)004:2395: rig pa rtsal sbyang nyams bogs 'don //
NK031(ki)004:2397: gnyis pa ting nge 'dzin skyes pa'i dpe ni /
NK031(ki)004:2398: dper na skyes bu 'jigs bcas zhig /
NK031(ki)004:2399: lam la bgrod par gyur pa'i tshe //
NK031(ki)004:2400: rang yul snang ba mthong slebs dang //
NK031(ki)004:2401: 'jigs pa'i rtog pa med dang mtshungs //
NK031(ki)004:2402: zhes pas lta sgom mthar phyin nas re dogs med pa'i dpe ni 'dir ma yin la /
NK031(ki)004:2403: nyams rtogs skyes pa'i gnas skabs su dbugs dbyung ba'i dpe ste /
NK031(ki)004:2404: rab snang sems dbyer med chos skur rtogs pas theg
NK031(ki)004:2405: pa 'og ma'i rgyun rtsol ba la ltos pa'i 'jigs
NK031(ki)004:2406: pa med / 'bring rig pa rang gsal du gnas pa'i bying rmugs rgod 'thor gyi 'jigs pa med /
NK031(ki)004:2407: tha ma lus sems dga' bde'i ngang la rtse gcig tu lhag par gnas pas dbugs phyin pa'o //
NK031(ki)004:2408: gsum pa ting nge 'dzin skyes pa'i rtags bstan pa ni /
NK031(ki)004:2410: 'khor ba'i chos la skyo ba dang //
NK031(ki)004:2411: sems can rnams la snying rje skye //
NK031(ki)004:2412: rang gi gnas la mi chags shing //
NK031(ki)004:2415: drod rtags phyi nang gsang gsum ste /
NK031(ki)004:2418: rlung gi mtshan ma lnga mthong nas //
NK031(ki)004:2419: shugs snang brgyad sogs nyams snang dag /
NK031(ki)004:2420: g.yo thob tsam du 'byung ba srid //
NK031(ki)004:2422: sems dang rlung gnyis med brtan pa yin pas sems gnas pa'i tshe rlung zin cing /
NK031(ki)004:2423: rlung la sa chu me rlung nam mkha'i rlung lnga ste /
NK031(ki)004:2424: de rtsa ro rkyang gnyis la /
NK031(ki)004:2425: lnga gnyis bcu nang du rgyu ba de nang du
NK031(ki)004:2426: zin pa'i rtags su rnal 'byor pa'i mthong snang du
NK031(ki)004:2427: / du ba lta bu kha dog ma nges pa dang /
NK031(ki)004:2428: smig rgyu lta bu chu'i rigs dang /
NK031(ki)004:2430: me stag lta bu me'i rigs dang /
NK031(ki)004:2431: mar me 'bar ba lta bu gcig nas mang po'i bar dang /
NK031(ki)004:2432: sprin med pa'i nam mkha' lta bu rgya che chung ma nges pa dang /
NK031(ki)004:2433: dkar po dmar po ser po lam lam pa dang /
NK031(ki)004:2434: snang ba med pa'i mun nag lta bu dang /
NK031(ki)004:2435: nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od can dang /
NK031(ki)004:2438: bar snang sbrang 'dab lta bu skya tsig tsig pas gang ba dang /
NK031(ki)004:2439: 'od kyi thig le kha dog lnga gang rung la /
NK031(ki)004:2440: 'od zer gyi thag pa brgyang ba lta bu dang /
NK031(ki)004:2441: 'od sna lnga ci rigs pa mthong ste /
NK031(ki)004:2443: rlung gi mtshan ma rnam lnga yang //
NK031(ki)004:2444: du ba lta bu'i long long la //
NK031(ki)004:2445: smig rgyu lta bu'i gya gyu dang //
NK031(ki)004:2446: srin me lta bu'i dmar 'gro dang //
NK031(ki)004:2447: mar me lta bu'i dmar kan dang //
NK031(ki)004:2448: mkha' la nyi shar lta bur snang //
NK031(ki)004:2449: shugs snang brgyad po snang ba yang //
NK031(ki)004:2450: grur zhugs 'gro ba snyam byed dang //
NK031(ki)004:2451: snang ba mun par 'gyur ba dang //
NK031(ki)004:2452: nam mkha' rdul gyis gang ba dang //
NK031(ki)004:2454: lus dang 'byung ba snang med par //
NK031(ki)004:2455: sems nyid gsal stong dwangs pa dang //
NK031(ki)004:2456: me long skar mas brgyan pa mthong //
NK031(ki)004:2458: gzhan yang sems ni 'khor 'das thams cad kyi kun gzhi yin pas /
NK031(ki)004:2459: thog med dus kyi shes bya'i bag chags thams cad kun gzhi la yod pa dang /
NK031(ki)004:2460: kun gzhi des bskyed pa'i lus 'di la snang srid
NK031(ki)004:2461: 'khor 'das kyi sa bon thams cad rtsa mdud la
NK031(ki)004:2462: yi ge'i tshul du dod pa'i nang du rlung sems
NK031(ki)004:2464: phyi snod nang bcud skye 'gro rigs drug /
NK031(ki)004:2465: bem po dang rig pa can la sogs pa'i gzugs
NK031(ki)004:2466: dbyibs kha dog sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba ci
NK031(ki)004:2467: srid pa gang yang snang du rung ba /
NK031(ki)004:2468: rnal 'byor pa'i bsgom pa'i nyams snang yin pas bzang
NK031(ki)004:2469: ngan gyi rnam pa gang la yang chags sdang mi
NK031(ki)004:2470: bya bar nyams snang de nyid kyi steng du sems
NK031(ki)004:2471: gtad cing snang sems bsre bar bya'o //
NK031(ki)004:2473: 'gro drug rgya gnas rlung tshug dang //
NK031(ki)004:2474: thog med bag chags sna tshogs dang //
NK031(ki)004:2475: sems nyid cir yang 'char ba'i phyir //
NK031(ki)004:2476: 'gro drug snang tshul sna tshogs dang //
NK031(ki)004:2477: lha dang lha mo la sogs dang //
NK031(ki)004:2478: skyed mos tshal dang zhing khams sogs //
NK031(ki)004:2479: ngan song gsum gnas sdug bsngal dang //
NK031(ki)004:2480: 'dod khams lha mi'i snang tshul dang //
NK031(ki)004:2481: gzugs khams gzugs med bsam gtan dang //
NK031(ki)004:2482: pad+ma'i tshal dang sangs rgyas zhing //
NK031(ki)004:2483: nyams kyi snang ba cir yang 'char //
NK031(ki)004:2484: de kun sems nyid rang snang la //
NK031(ki)004:2485: mi g.yo de bzhin ma bcos bzhag /
NK031(ki)004:2489: drod ni bzod pa phra thob dang //
NK031(ki)004:2490: lus yang bde ba 'byung ba dang //
NK031(ki)004:2491: dbugs kyi rgyu ba mi tshor dang //
NK031(ki)004:2492: sems nyid rnal du phebs pa yi //
NK031(ki)004:2493: gsal la yul med mi rtog gnas //
NK031(ki)004:2496: nor rdzas gnyen 'dun la sogs pa //
NK031(ki)004:2497: tshe 'di'i bya ba thams cad blos thongs nas //
NK031(ki)004:2498: ci la yang chags zhen chung ba ste //
NK031(ki)004:2501: phyi rtags lus ni yod mi tshor //
NK031(ki)004:2502: nang rtags dbugs ni rgyu mi tshor //
NK031(ki)004:2503: gsang rtags dngos po'i zhen pa chung //
NK031(ki)004:2504: nyams ni ming du mi thogs shing //
NK031(ki)004:2505: shes pa khong nas dga' ba 'byung //
NK031(ki)004:2506: lus ni 'dar zhing sprugs pa dang //
NK031(ki)004:2507: 'phags dang rgyug pa'i las rnams byed //
NK031(ki)004:2508: ngag ni rgod cing ngu ba dang //
NK031(ki)004:2509: kha nas sgra skad sna tshogs 'byung //
NK031(ki)004:2510: sems ni 'dzin med btang dka' la //
NK031(ki)004:2511: phyi nang shes pa mi rgyu ba //
NK031(ki)004:2513: rnal 'byor pa bsgom pa'i dus su lus la 'phra
NK031(ki)004:2514: 'dar mchong rgyug tsha brad na brad sha 'gul sna
NK031(ki)004:2515: tshogs dang / ngag tu rgod pa dang ngu ba dang /
NK031(ki)004:2516: glu dbyangs la sogs skad sna tshogs dang /
NK031(ki)004:2517: sems bde sdug gsal mi gsal mes tshig chus khyer
NK031(ki)004:2518: khyi dang gcan sbrul la sogs kyis gtses pa'i snang
NK031(ki)004:2519: ba la sogs nyams la mi 'byung med pa med
NK031(ki)004:2520: cing / lus ngag yid gsum la ci byung yang
NK031(ki)004:2521: nyams yin pas bzang ba 'dra la dga' ba dang
NK031(ki)004:2522: cing / / ngan pa 'dra la mi dga' ba dang the tshom mi bya la /
NK031(ki)004:2523: nyams gang byung de nyid kyi steng du sems bskyang ngo //
NK031(ki)004:2524: rmi lam gyi rtags mang du gsungs mod kyi /
NK031(ki)004:2525: rnal 'byor pa bden 'dzin 'phel ba'i rgyu yin pas
NK031(ki)004:2526: nyams snang thams cad kyang bden med sgyu ma lta
NK031(ki)004:2528: rmi lam la bden med du shes par bya'o //
NK031(ki)004:2530: gang la zhen pa med cing chags pa chung //
NK031(ki)004:2531: ma nor don la kun gzhi 'gyur med gsal //
NK031(ki)004:2532: rtags chen de yod gzhan gyi khar ma lus //
NK031(ki)004:2534: tshe 'di'i bya ba la sogs snang ba mngon zhen
NK031(ki)004:2535: chod na rtags gzhan ma byung yang bzod la rtags
NK031(ki)004:2536: thams cad 'dzom yang mngon zhen che na du ba
NK031(ki)004:2537: byung ran me bsad pa dang 'dra'o //
NK031(ki)004:2538: bzhi pa 'bras bu bstan pa ni /
NK031(ki)004:2541: nges par mi lus thob nas su //
NK031(ki)004:2542: chos spyod pa dang ldan 'gyur te //
NK031(ki)004:2543: de tshe chos nyid bden pa mthong //
NK031(ki)004:2546: rnal 'byor pa gnas pa'i nyams de tsam na tshe 'phos na gong du bstan pa ltar /
NK031(ki)004:2547: ting nge 'dzin rab la phyin pa de bar do'i
NK031(ki)004:2548: 'od gsal ngos zin nas ting nge 'dzin rtsal rdzogs
NK031(ki)004:2549: te sangs rgyas / 'bring sgyu lus bar dor lha'i
NK031(ki)004:2550: rig pa 'dzin par bardzusa te skyes nas ting nge
NK031(ki)004:2552: tha ma mi lus thob nas gdams ngag zab mo
NK031(ki)004:2553: dang 'phrad nas chos nyid bden pa'i don mthong bar
NK031(ki)004:2556: gdams pa'i gnad dang shes rab kyis //
NK031(ki)004:2557: 'gags med ye shes chos skur sbyor //
NK031(ki)004:2558: 'gags med sgyu lus bar do nas //
NK031(ki)004:2559: lha mi rig 'dzin de nas grol //
NK031(ki)004:2560: phal cher bag chags rtog pa'i mthus //
NK031(ki)004:2561: nges par mi lus thob nas su //
NK031(ki)004:2562: chos spyod pa dang ldan gyur te //
NK031(ki)004:2563: de tshe chos nyid bden pa mthong //
NK031(ki)004:2565: skyes bu byed pa'i rnam smin gyi 'bras bu ni /
NK031(ki)004:2566: gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin des nyon mongs pa dang
NK031(ki)004:2567: gzung 'dzin gyi mtshan ma che rags grol nas mi
NK031(ki)004:2568: g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gsungs te /
NK031(ki)004:2570: rtogs pa'i ngang gnas rnal 'byor pas //
NK031(ki)004:2571: gsal la yul med goms pa yis //
NK031(ki)004:2572: nyon mongs kun brtags 'bring bcom nas //
NK031(ki)004:2573: brtan pa'i cha la mi g.yo thob //
NK031(ki)004:2575: gnyis pa lhag mthong rtogs pa mi g.yo ba'i rnal 'byor la bzhi ste /
NK031(ki)004:2576: ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag pa'i thabs /
NK031(ki)004:2582: ji srid mnyam par bzhag pa'i tshe //
NK031(ki)004:2583: skyon gyi rnam pa bkag nas ni //
NK031(ki)004:2584: rang byung ye shes 'od dang ldan //
NK031(ki)004:2585: nyin mtshan 'das kyi bar du gnas //
NK031(ki)004:2588: skyon ngos bzung nas ye shes sbyor thabs /
NK031(ki)004:2589: rtog pa'i ye shes ngos bzung ba /
NK031(ki)004:2590: ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i yun dang bzhis ston te /
NK031(ki)004:2593: rnam shes 'du ba'i gnas dag tu //
NK031(ki)004:2594: bag phebs lus sems klod par bya //
NK031(ki)004:2595: rtog pa blo yi zhen pa bzlog /
NK031(ki)004:2596: phra rags yul la blo mi bzung //
NK031(ki)004:2597: rang sems thabs kyis mthong byas te //
NK031(ki)004:2598: yang dag shes rab mig gis blta //
NK031(ki)004:2599: zhes pa de la yang gsum ste /
NK031(ki)004:2600: dang po phyi nang gsang ba'i rnam g.yengs med pa'i
NK031(ki)004:2601: gnas su lus ngag yid gsum bde bar byas la
NK031(ki)004:2602: tshogs drug gi yul la shes pa phyir mi 'phro
NK031(ki)004:2603: bar rang gi sems la nang du yang dag par
NK031(ki)004:2604: bltas te / de yang da lta'i sems 'di 'gyu ba dang /
NK031(ki)004:2607: bde ba ci ltar 'dug brtag la /
NK031(ki)004:2608: gang du 'dug pa de la lta ba'i rgyas 'debs dang /
NK031(ki)004:2609: 'di yin gyi blo bzo mi bya bar bde gsal mi rtog pa'i ngang la gnas 'dug na /
NK031(ki)004:2610: gang ltar 'dus pa de nyid la byung sa /
NK031(ki)004:2617: sgom mkhan gyi sems dang nyams de la khyad par
NK031(ki)004:2618: ci snang brtag cing kho rang gi steng du bzhag
NK031(ki)004:2620: ma skyes rang byung skye ba med //
NK031(ki)004:2621: skye ba med pa'i chos nyid la //
NK031(ki)004:2622: ma bcos rang byung lhug par bzhag /
NK031(ki)004:2623: zhe 'dod mi bya phyal bar bzhag /
NK031(ki)004:2625: de'i don chod na chod tshul 'og nas 'byung /
NK031(ki)004:2626: gnas pa yon tan du mi lta /
NK031(ki)004:2627: 'gyu ba skyon du mi lta bar rnam rtog 'gyu ba gang byung ngos bzung nas /
NK031(ki)004:2628: da lta dran bdo'i rnam rtog de la byung gnas 'gro gsum /
NK031(ki)004:2631: kha dog ci byung ci snang /
NK031(ki)004:2632: nyams bde gsal mi rtog pa dang /
NK031(ki)004:2634: rgyu rkyen gyi byas ma byas /
NK031(ki)004:2635: dri ma yod med khyad ci snang /
NK031(ki)004:2636: sems kyi ngo bo de gang byung brtag /
NK031(ki)004:2639: 'gyu gnas gang byung de nyid kyi steng du 'tsho zhing brtags te /
NK031(ki)004:2641: zhi gnas bsgoms pas lhag mthong skye //
NK031(ki)004:2642: rnam par rtog las ye shes skye //
NK031(ki)004:2643: stong pa nyid las snying rje skye //
NK031(ki)004:2647: sngar bshad pa'i drod rtags me /
NK031(ki)004:2650: sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams sku gzugs la sogs mthong
NK031(ki)004:2651: snang bzang ngan ci byung yang de nyid la sems
NK031(ki)004:2652: bsre zhing 'tsho / nyams snang de la byung gnas
NK031(ki)004:2653: 'gro gsum dngos po grub mtha' ci snang yang sems
NK031(ki)004:2654: dang gcig gam tha dad brtag go //
NK031(ki)004:2656: zung du 'jug pa'i ye shes ni //
NK031(ki)004:2657: rgyu dang rkyen la rag ma lus //
NK031(ki)004:2658: thugs phrad shugs kyis lhug par 'char //
NK031(ki)004:2662: gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya la sogs pa'i yul du snang ba thams cad /
NK031(ki)004:2663: nyon mongs pa dug lnga dang /
NK031(ki)004:2664: bde sdug gi tshor ba dang /
NK031(ki)004:2665: 'khor 'das la re dogs la sogs sems la byung tshad kyi steng du bzhag cing /
NK031(ki)004:2666: ngo bo dbyings kha dog byung gnas 'gro gsum sems dang sems byung khyad ci snang brtag go //
NK031(ki)004:2668: chos sku spros bral rang rig gsal //
NK031(ki)004:2669: sku gsum rang chas rtsol med las //
NK031(ki)004:2670: byar med skyes bu ci bzhin du //
NK031(ki)004:2671: lus sems khong klod gang dgar bzhag /
NK031(ki)004:2673: de ltar sems la gang shar gyi nyams bskyang dgos pa yang /
NK031(ki)004:2675: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug kyang //
NK031(ki)004:2676: rnam rtog rlung gis mi bskyod na //
NK031(ki)004:2677: de nyid rang byung ye shes yin //
NK031(ki)004:2678: rang byung ye shes chen po yang //
NK031(ki)004:2679: rnam rtog rlung gis bskyod pa na //
NK031(ki)004:2680: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug yin //
NK031(ki)004:2682: gnyis pa skyon ngos bzung nas ye shes sbyar ba la /
NK031(ki)004:2684: mi mthun phyogs kyi skyon bstan pa //
NK031(ki)004:2685: gol sgrib sum cu so drug ste //
NK031(ki)004:2686: nor du dogs pa lnga bshad na //
NK031(ki)004:2687: chad par dogs dang rtag par dogs //
NK031(ki)004:2688: phyal bar dogs dang bying bar dogs //
NK031(ki)004:2689: med par dogs dang de lnga'o //
NK031(ki)004:2690: sgrib pa chen po bcu bshad na //
NK031(ki)004:2691: mi g.yo gsal dang bde sdug bsngal //
NK031(ki)004:2692: sems la shes 'byung mngon shes dang //
NK031(ki)004:2695: bdag gi lta ba snyems pa dang //
NK031(ki)004:2696: gzhan gyi lta ba khyad du gsod //
NK031(ki)004:2698: mngon shes mtshan mar 'dzin pa bdud //
NK031(ki)004:2701: lta sgom la thun mong ba'i dri ma lngas gting du mi phyin cing /
NK031(ki)004:2702: yon tan la mngon par rlom pa bcus gong du mi 'phel ba ste /
NK031(ki)004:2704: rnal 'byor dang por bshad pa'i skyon drug /
NK031(ki)004:2705: bar du gcod pa bcu drug dang sum cu rtsa bdun du 'gyur yang /
NK031(ki)004:2706: skyon drug sgrib bcus lta ba snyems gnyis gcig tu
NK031(ki)004:2707: brtsi bas gol sgrib so drug po de dag gis
NK031(ki)004:2708: rnal 'byor dang po'i ting nge 'dzin mi skye mi
NK031(ki)004:2710: 'dir snang srid sems su rtogs shing sems nyid chos skur rtogs pa'i tshe /
NK031(ki)004:2715: bying rmugs rgod 'thor gang byung yang de nyid kyi steng du bzhag cing ngo bo la bltas pas /
NK031(ki)004:2716: gol sgrib thams cad rig pa'i rtsal ma 'gag pa las cir yang snang zhing /
NK031(ki)004:2717: rig pa nyid gzhi med rtsa bral du skyon yon
NK031(ki)004:2718: gyi mtha' las 'das par rtogs pas skyon thams cad
NK031(ki)004:2721: thams cad bdag tu rtogs pas nyon mongs skye yul med //
NK031(ki)004:2722: bdag nyid bsam mi khyab pas nyon mongs skye mkhan med //
NK031(ki)004:2723: nyon mongs ma bcad rang chod sangs rgyas dgongs pa yin //
NK031(ki)004:2725: dam pa nyid kyis skyon sel gsungs pa /
NK031(ki)004:2726: stong pa lta med chad ma song //
NK031(ki)004:2727: ther zug lta med rtag ma song //
NK031(ki)004:2728: bsam rjes ma 'brangs phyal ma song //
NK031(ki)004:2729: rmugs pa med na bying ma song //
NK031(ki)004:2730: rang rig shes rab gsal yod pas //
NK031(ki)004:2731: med par ma song de dga' 'o //
NK031(ki)004:2733: gsum pa rtog pa'i ye shes ngos bzung ba la bzhi ste /
NK031(ki)004:2734: rtogs pa skye tshul gyi rim pa dang /
NK031(ki)004:2735: rtogs pa rang gi ngo bo /
NK031(ki)004:2736: de rang gi rgyud la btsa' thabs /
NK031(ki)004:2739: sems la 'char sgo gang byung gi steng du bzhag cing /
NK031(ki)004:2740: de'i ngo bo la bltas pas mnyam par bzhag thabs gsum las /
NK031(ki)004:2741: rnam rtog skye tshul gsum 'byung ste /
NK031(ki)004:2742: dang po rnam par rtog pa phra rags gang byung
NK031(ki)004:2743: thams cad rang byung rang zhi gsal stong du grol
NK031(ki)004:2744: nas / gsal stong de nyid rang rig pa'i ye shes su rtogs pa ni /
NK031(ki)004:2745: rtogs pa'i ye shes mgo g.yo ba zhes so //
NK031(ki)004:2746: mnyam bzhag rtog pa rang grol dang //
NK031(ki)004:2747: gsal stong bde la mi rtog gnas //
NK031(ki)004:2749: de nas ngar 'dzin rnam par rtog pa grwa ma
NK031(ki)004:2750: chag zur ma nyams pa de nyid rgyun chad med
NK031(ki)004:2751: cing 'dus ma byas pa'i rang byung gi ye shes
NK031(ki)004:2752: dri med chos skur lhag gis rtogs pa ni rtogs
NK031(ki)004:2753: pa'i ngo bo thob pa zhes bya'o //
NK031(ki)004:2755: rang byung ye shes rang las byung //
NK031(ki)004:2756: de shes ye shes tsam du brjod //
NK031(ki)004:2759: rang byung rgyu rkyen med par 'byung ba yin //
NK031(ki)004:2760: ye shes 'gag pa med par gsal ba yin //
NK031(ki)004:2762: de nas nyams snang gang byung ba thams cad rgyun
NK031(ki)004:2763: chad med par 'gag med rig pa rang snang du
NK031(ki)004:2764: rtogs la / gzhan snang srid shes bya'i chos thams
NK031(ki)004:2765: cad sems nyid rang snang du rtogs shing snang sems
NK031(ki)004:2766: gnyis med du 'dres nas yul med rang gsal gyi
NK031(ki)004:2768: rtogs pa brtan por zhugs pa na //
NK031(ki)004:2769: yul med rang gsal nyams kyi gting //
NK031(ki)004:2771: chod tshul gsum po de la /
NK031(ki)004:2772: sems nyid 'od gsal chen po la //
NK031(ki)004:2773: ji srid mnyam par bzhag pa'i tshe //
NK031(ki)004:2774: rnam par rtog pa sngon la 'byung //
NK031(ki)004:2775: ye shes chen po phyi na shar //
NK031(ki)004:2776: skyon bcos g.yo ba'i nyams zhes bya //
NK031(ki)004:2777: gsal ba'i ngang la rtog pa 'byung //
NK031(ki)004:2778: 'byung ba de nyid dbyings su rig /
NK031(ki)004:2779: skyon bcos thob pa'i nyams zhes bya //
NK031(ki)004:2780: snang gsal dran rig ye shes klong //
NK031(ki)004:2782: gnyis med rig pa lhun gyis grub //
NK031(ki)004:2783: rtag tu de ltar gnas pa ni //
NK031(ki)004:2784: skyon bcos brtan pa'i nyams zhes bya //
NK031(ki)004:2786: gnyis pa rtogs pa rang gi ngo bo la rab 'bring tha gsum ste /
NK031(ki)004:2787: rab kyi mnyam bzhag dus su sems nyid skye ba
NK031(ki)004:2788: med pa gsal stong ka dag chos kyi sku las
NK031(ki)004:2789: ma g.yos bzhin rgya mtsho la gzugs brnyan 'char ba
NK031(ki)004:2790: ltar / 'gag pa med pa'i rol pa las shes
NK031(ki)004:2791: bya thams cad ma 'dres yongs rdzogs lhun gyis grub
NK031(ki)004:2792: pa la ma skyes mi 'gag snga phyi med par
NK031(ki)004:2793: mtshan nyid dbyer med du nyams su myong zhing /
NK031(ki)004:2794: myong mkhan gyi rig pa nyid gtan tshig gsum gyi
NK031(ki)004:2795: ngo bor rang grol ba ni sku gsum dbyer med
NK031(ki)004:2798: ma bcos spros bral chos kyi sku //
NK031(ki)004:2799: ma 'gag rang byung longs spyod rdzogs //
NK031(ki)004:2800: mtshan nyid sna tshogs sprul pa'i sku //
NK031(ki)004:2801: sems dang chos skur 'dres pa ni //
NK031(ki)004:2802: sku gsum ngo bo dbye ba med //
NK031(ki)004:2805: dran pas zin tshad kyi snang ba thams cad sems nyid rang snang sgyu mar 'char zhing /
NK031(ki)004:2806: ma zin dus btang snyoms su gnas te tha mal gyi 'khrul snang med do //
NK031(ki)004:2808: dran zin gnyis med gsal 'debs shing //
NK031(ki)004:2809: rang snang sgyu mar gsal ba dang //
NK031(ki)004:2810: rtsol med btang snyoms chen por gnas //
NK031(ki)004:2812: 'bring gi mnyam bzhag tu snang rig gi chos thams
NK031(ki)004:2813: cad yul med rang rig pa rang gsal rang snang
NK031(ki)004:2814: du gcig pa'i ngang du gnas pas re dogs gnyis
NK031(ki)004:2815: 'dzin la sogs pa'i lta sgom gyi skyon mi mnga'
NK031(ki)004:2817: mnyam bzhag mi mthun gnyen po bral //
NK031(ki)004:2818: ma gtad yengs med mi g.yo gnas //
NK031(ki)004:2819: bde gsal mi rtog spros dang bral //
NK031(ki)004:2822: dran pa zin dus rig pa rang snang du shes shing /
NK031(ki)004:2823: ma zin dus tha mal du 'gro yang 'phral du zin no //
NK031(ki)004:2825: rjes shes dran pas ma zin na //
NK031(ki)004:2826: tha mal 'chor dang btang snyoms dang //
NK031(ki)004:2830: mnyam bzhag tu rnam par rtog pa nyid rang byung gi ye shes su rtogs shing /
NK031(ki)004:2831: rig pa rang gsal gyi ngang la gnas pas 'gyu gnas gnyis la khyad par med cing /
NK031(ki)004:2833: rig pa phyi nang med par gsal bas lhag mthong yin //
NK031(ki)004:2834: gsal ba'i don la ma yengs zhi gnas yin //
NK031(ki)004:2837: dran pas zin dus tha mal gyi zhen pa med pa btang snyoms su 'dug la /
NK031(ki)004:2838: ma zin dus tha mal 'khrul snang du 'char te /
NK031(ki)004:2840: tha mal 'chor dang btang snyoms gnas //
NK031(ki)004:2843: nyams rtogs zung du 'brel ba de rang gi rgyud la sbyor zhing btsa' thabs ni /
NK031(ki)004:2844: byang chub sems rdzogs pa chen po'i don sems kyi
NK031(ki)004:2845: rang bzhin rtogs pa'i don la ting nge 'dzin dang
NK031(ki)004:2846: ldan na / de'i btsa' thabs la rnam pa drug ste /
NK031(ki)004:2847: phyi nang gi dam tshig nyams na g.yeng ba byung nas bsgom mi khom pa dang /
NK031(ki)004:2849: sems gnas mi thub pa dang /
NK031(ki)004:2850: lus sdod mi tshugs pa byung na lta ba kha 'byams su 'gro /
NK031(ki)004:2851: ting nge 'dzin gyi drod rtags thams cad rjes yal
NK031(ki)004:2852: du 'gro ba'i mthar ngan song kha brgyud nas 'gro
NK031(ki)004:2853: bas / dam tshig thams cad ma nyams par bsrung ba gal che ste /
NK031(ki)004:2855: de la dam tshig phyi dang nang //
NK031(ki)004:2856: rang bzhin phung po khams bzhi gnas //
NK031(ki)004:2859: sgom pa'i dus bsam dpyod drag po mang na chu rnyogs pa dang 'dra ste /
NK031(ki)004:2860: yun du bsgoms kyang ting nge 'dzin gyi rnyogs ma
NK031(ki)004:2861: mi dwangs pas sems kyi rang bzhin chos kyi dbyings
NK031(ki)004:2862: la ma yengs bag gis blta bar bya'o //
NK031(ki)004:2864: snang ba med pa'i chos nyid ni //
NK031(ki)004:2865: ma btsal bzhag na sgom pa yin //
NK031(ki)004:2866: de dang de ni rnam btsal na //
NK031(ki)004:2867: de la de bzhin mi snang ngo //
NK031(ki)004:2869: ting nge 'dzin shin tu gsal yang yun ring na
NK031(ki)004:2870: sngar goms shas chung ba'i dbang gis bying rgod byung
NK031(ki)004:2872: ngos bzung bral ba'i rig pa rgyas 'debs su song nas bden pa mthong du mi btub /
NK031(ki)004:2873: nges shes dang brtson 'grus chung du 'gro bas /
NK031(ki)004:2874: ting nge 'dzin ma dub tsam du bzhag nas khams gso bar byas la bsgom mo //
NK031(ki)004:2876: rnal 'byor pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi shugs dang lta
NK031(ki)004:2877: ba'i rlabs mthong ba'i dbang gis snang srid ye shes
NK031(ki)004:2878: su 'char zhing mthong sgom gyi drod rtags ltar du
NK031(ki)004:2879: 'char ba'i dus na nyams dang rtogs pa'i nga rgyal
NK031(ki)004:2880: skyes nas / da ni bdag la ting nge 'dzin gyi 'gal rkyen med snyam ste /
NK031(ki)004:2886: chos brgyad kyi mgo yang ma 'jil bar bdag cag
NK031(ki)004:2887: rnal 'byor pa yin zer zhing sangs rgyas par gdon
NK031(ki)004:2888: mi za bar skad pa de ni shin tu 'khrul
NK031(ki)004:2889: te / 'byung ba'i lhag ma ma zad pas lus la zhen cing /
NK031(ki)004:2890: 'du shes kyi lhag ma ma zad pas chags sdang 'byung ba yin te /
NK031(ki)004:2891: slar yang de'i bag chags kun gzhi la bsags nas
NK031(ki)004:2892: mtho ris kyang mi thob na thar pa lta smos
NK031(ki)004:2893: ci dgos / des na rtag tu dgon pa bsten
NK031(ki)004:2894: cing 'jig rten gyi 'brel ba bcad de chos brgyad
NK031(ki)004:2895: kyi khur po spang bar bya'o //
NK031(ki)004:2896: lnga pa rnal 'byor pa la mngon shes sam yon
NK031(ki)004:2897: tan phra mo byung nas de la rang yang rlom
NK031(ki)004:2898: pa skye zhing gzhan la yang sgrogs pa de ni
NK031(ki)004:2899: / bdud kyi las bar chad thams cad 'jug pa'i rgyu yin pas /
NK031(ki)004:2900: mngon shes rdzu 'phrul yon tan ci yod kyang ngoms pa dang /
NK031(ki)004:2901: ngom po mi bya la sbed cing /
NK031(ki)004:2902: yon tan gong 'phel la brtson par bya'o //
NK031(ki)004:2904: gdams ngag dang po thebs nas sangs rgyas ma thob kyi bar du gdams ngag gi 'debs lugs /
NK031(ki)004:2908: nyams rtogs kyi mtshan ma thams cad snying sgor yang
NK031(ki)004:2909: dbyung bar mi bsam na khar dbyung ba lta smos
NK031(ki)004:2910: kyang ci dgos / gal te smras na las dang
NK031(ki)004:2911: po pa'i nyams dang drod rtags gtan nas med par
NK031(ki)004:2912: kyang ci dgos / 'gyur zhing / gding thob nas
NK031(ki)004:2913: kyang sangs rgyas myur du mi thob par byed do
NK031(ki)004:2914: kyang ci dgos / 'gyur zhing / // lung las kyang /
NK031(ki)004:2915: rgya mtsho'i mjing gi pha bong bzhin //
NK031(ki)004:2916: bskal par 'khrugs kyang khar mi dbyung //
NK031(ki)004:2918: thog ma nas tha ma'i bar du bla ma ni
NK031(ki)004:2919: rtag tu yid kyi ting nge 'dzin du bya zhing
NK031(ki)004:2924: gal te skyon de dag byung na bsam gtan je
NK031(ki)004:2925: med du 'gro nas ngan song gsum du kha brgyud
NK031(ki)004:2926: par byed do // zhes gsungs pas /
NK031(ki)004:2927: de la dang por gnas zhing zag med mngon du
NK031(ki)004:2928: ma gyur gyi bar du dran shes bag yod dang
NK031(ki)004:2930: bzhi pa nyams rtogs bogs 'don pa la gsum ste /
NK031(ki)004:2931: rab yon tan gyis ngoms nas 'di bas yon tan gong na med snyam nas /
NK031(ki)004:2932: rlom pa dang khengs pas bcings te bogs mi thon pa yin te /
NK031(ki)004:2933: rang la skyon de lta bu ci 'dra 'dug yang yang ngos bzung zhing /
NK031(ki)004:2934: sangs rgyas kyi sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las
NK031(ki)004:2935: ma lus pa rang sems la tshang nas yod pa
NK031(ki)004:2937: sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'i dgongs pa yon tan
NK031(ki)004:2938: thams cad sangs rgyas dang mnyam par yod kyang rdo
NK031(ki)004:2939: rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug
NK031(ki)004:2940: pa dang shes sgrib kyi bag la nyal sbyang dgos
NK031(ki)004:2941: pa la / rang la da lta zag bcas kyi
NK031(ki)004:2942: nyams ban bun skabs re yod kyang rkyen dang 'phrad
NK031(ki)004:2943: dus tha mal rang du shor ba 'di la nga
NK031(ki)004:2944: rgyal nas ting nge 'dzin la mi brtson pa bdud
NK031(ki)004:2945: dbang du song nges snyam pa byas la /
NK031(ki)004:2946: nga rgyal dang rlom pa byed mkhan /
NK031(ki)004:2948: rtog mkhan de tshur sems la rtsad bcad cing /
NK031(ki)004:2949: rtogs mkhan gzhi med rtsa bral du yang yang du grol ba gal che'o //
NK031(ki)004:2951: rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs ston mdzad cing //
NK031(ki)004:2952: 'jig rten grags pa sgrogs pa dang //
NK031(ki)004:2953: longs spyod g.yeng bas brid pa dang //
NK031(ki)004:2954: drod rtags byin rlabs stobs skyes nas //
NK031(ki)004:2955: dga' brod rlom sems nga rgyal na //
NK031(ki)004:2956: bdag med thar ba'i bar du gcod //
NK031(ki)004:2957: de kun sems nyid rang snang las //
NK031(ki)004:2958: ma g.yos gnyis med ngang du gzhom //
NK031(ki)004:2960: 'bring mnyam rjes thun mtshams song nas mnyam bzhag dus
NK031(ki)004:2961: snang sems phyogs re la 'dres kyang gdal khyab tu
NK031(ki)004:2962: ma song zhing rjes thob lta sgom dang ma 'dres
NK031(ki)004:2963: na bogs mi thon pas mnyam rjes thams cad du
NK031(ki)004:2966: rig pa ngar bskyed nas spyod lam thams cad du
NK031(ki)004:2967: lta sgom gyis zin par byas la gtsang btsog dang
NK031(ki)004:2968: bde sdug thams cad blang dor med par tshogs drug
NK031(ki)004:2969: ro snyoms rig pa'i rtsal sbyang bar bya'o //
NK031(ki)004:2970: dgongs pa skyed chung 'thas pa na //
NK031(ki)004:2971: rtogs pa'i ngang nas ma yengs pas //
NK031(ki)004:2972: gsang spyod spyod pa sna tshogs bya //
NK031(ki)004:2973: rjes shes dran pa'i thag pa yis //
NK031(ki)004:2974: rta rgod bzhin du bsgrims la btsa' //
NK031(ki)004:2975: de ltar lta spyod spel ma yis //
NK031(ki)004:2976: mi g.yo rgyun goms brtan par bya //
NK031(ki)004:2978: tha ma ni nyams rtogs cha re la chags nas bogs mi thon pas /
NK031(ki)004:2979: rig ngor byung tshad kyi shes bya yul snang dang /
NK031(ki)004:2980: shes bya yul la 'jug tshad kyi shes byed kyi
NK031(ki)004:2981: rig pa 'char tshad la phar bzhag tshur len mi
NK031(ki)004:2982: byed nas gang shar de nyid kyi steng du mnyam
NK031(ki)004:2983: par bzhag cing / snang sems gnyis gcig gam tha dad byung /
NK031(ki)004:2984: gcig na yul sems so sor snang zhing dus gcig
NK031(ki)004:2985: la yang gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya du mar
NK031(ki)004:2987: tha dad byung na gang zag gcig la'ang nyams snang
NK031(ki)004:2988: nyin snang mtshan rmi lam snang ba dang gnas skabs
NK031(ki)004:2989: gsum du brjod kyis mi long bar snang ba de
NK031(ki)004:2990: / gcig yod pa'i dus gnyis po de gang du snang brtag cing /
NK031(ki)004:2991: snang ba rnam pa gsum la phyir grub pa ci snang /
NK031(ki)004:2992: 'das pa'i snang ba thams cad gang du snang /
NK031(ki)004:2994: da lta'i snang ba la dngos po ci 'dug /
NK031(ki)004:2995: snang ba'i rig pa nang du grub pa ci 'dug /
NK031(ki)004:2998: da lta ba'i rig pa de gang du gnas /
NK031(ki)004:2999: gzhan yang 'khrul grol lam gsum gang zag gcig gi sems rgyud la 'char ba de ji ltar byung /
NK031(ki)004:3000: da lta yang bde sdug thams cad so sor ma 'dres par myong ba de ci yin /
NK031(ki)004:3001: legs par brtag shing dpyad pas /
NK031(ki)004:3002: snang ba rnam gsum ji ltar snang yang /
NK031(ki)004:3003: sems 'gag med kyi rol par rang snang zhing sems
NK031(ki)004:3004: nyid gzhi med rtsa bral gdod nas ka dag chen
NK031(ki)004:3005: por rtogs pas bogs dbyung ngo //
NK031(ki)004:3007: lhun grub mngon du ma gyur bar //
NK031(ki)004:3008: gol sgrib gdar sha bcad pa gces //
NK031(ki)004:3009: zhes bsam gtan spyi 'grel du sems kyi gdar sha
NK031(ki)004:3010: gcod pa'i thabs mang du gsungs pa'i don yin no
NK031(ki)004:3011: // bzhi pa ting nge 'dzin mthar phyin pa'i tshad dang yun ni /
NK031(ki)004:3012: rtogs pa rab 'bring tha ma gang rung gi ngang la /
NK031(ki)004:3013: rab nyin mtshan 'khor ba re tsam /
NK031(ki)004:3015: tha ma thun re tsam du bar mi chod pa ste /
NK031(ki)004:3017: rang byung ye shes drod dang ldan //
NK031(ki)004:3018: rgya mtsho'i gting ltar mi g.yo la //
NK031(ki)004:3019: nyin phyed nyin dang nyin zhag nas //
NK031(ki)004:3021: gnyis pa ting nge 'dzin de'i dpe ni /
NK031(ki)004:3023: mi rtog mi dmigs thig le bde //
NK031(ki)004:3024: mi bskyod dwangs pa'i rgya mtsho ltar //
NK031(ki)004:3025: mi g.yo gsal ba'i mar me 'dra //
NK031(ki)004:3026: de ni ye shes bde ba'i drod //
NK031(ki)004:3029: thig le gcig la grwa zur med pa'i zlum po
NK031(ki)004:3030: gcig tu yod pa ltar 'khor 'das kyi chos thams
NK031(ki)004:3031: cad ci ltar yang yul du mi rtog ste /
NK031(ki)004:3032: sems nyid rang byung gi ye shes rang snang zhing
NK031(ki)004:3033: sems thig le nyag gcig la bde sdug gnyis su
NK031(ki)004:3034: mi dmigs pa'i ngang du gnas pa ngo bo nyid
NK031(ki)004:3035: kyi bde ba'o // klong chen las /
NK031(ki)004:3036: thig le gcig la grwa zur med //
NK031(ki)004:3037: gdal ba chen po chos kyi sku //
NK031(ki)004:3040: dpe rgya mtsho chen po rlung gis ma bskyod pa
NK031(ki)004:3041: la gzugs brnyan thams cad ma 'dres la gsal ba
NK031(ki)004:3042: ltar / sems kyi ngo bo 'od gsal ba la mtshan ma'i rtog pas ma bskyod par /
NK031(ki)004:3043: snang srid ma 'dres yongs rdzogs su rang snang ba'i ngang la gnas pa'o //
NK031(ki)004:3044: dper na rgya mtsho dwangs pa la //
NK031(ki)004:3045: skar tshogs gzugs brnyan mang snang yang //
NK031(ki)004:3046: nyid las mi gzhan sa ler snang //
NK031(ki)004:3047: de bzhin snang bas chos rnams kun //
NK031(ki)004:3048: chos dbyings dwangs pa'i dkyil 'khor na //
NK031(ki)004:3049: ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs par gsal //
NK031(ki)004:3052: mar me phyi nang med par gsal ba ltar /
NK031(ki)004:3053: chos thams cad yul med rig pa rang gsal gyi ngang la gnas pa'o //
NK031(ki)004:3054: lta med rig pa rang gsal ni //
NK031(ki)004:3055: yul med spros bral ji bzhin nyid //
NK031(ki)004:3056: rang snang rig pa'i 'khor lo la //
NK031(ki)004:3057: yul med rang gsal rig pas mthong //
NK031(ki)004:3060: des don gsum po de gnas pa'i nyams rab 'bring
NK031(ki)004:3061: tha gsum dang mi g.yo'i nyams rab 'bring tha gsum
NK031(ki)004:3062: 'dres par gyur pa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong zung
NK031(ki)004:3064: dper na me dang drod mtshungs par ldan pa bzhin /
NK031(ki)004:3065: rtogs pa'i ye shes nyams myong dang mtshungs pa ldan pa'o //
NK031(ki)004:3066: gsum pa drod rtags bstan pa ni /
NK031(ki)004:3068: zas dang gos kyi 'du shes chung //
NK031(ki)004:3069: nyon mongs la sogs chags sdang chung //
NK031(ki)004:3070: snying rje phan sems rab tu che //
NK031(ki)004:3071: rmi lam rtags bzang rab tu 'byung //
NK031(ki)004:3073: phyi nang gsang ba gsum ste /
NK031(ki)004:3074: gsang ba'i drod rtags ni gong du dpe bzhis bstan pa'i nyams rtogs mtshungs ldan de nyid do //
NK031(ki)004:3076: lus mngon zhen chod pas na tsha drag po la sogs pa'i bde sdug ro snyoms pa dang /
NK031(ki)004:3077: lus yang zhing bde bar gnas pa dang /
NK031(ki)004:3078: sems las su rung ba'i ting nge 'dzin la rgyun du gnas pas /
NK031(ki)004:3080: drod ni shing bal ltar yang dang //
NK031(ki)004:3081: lus kyis bzod pa cher thob dang //
NK031(ki)004:3082: khams snyoms rang lus bde ba rgyas //
NK031(ki)004:3083: 'gyu ba can dang the tshom bral //
NK031(ki)004:3084: gsal ba yul la mi g.yor gnas //
NK031(ki)004:3086: phyi rtags chos thams cad sems nyid rang snang du rtogs pas /
NK031(ki)004:3088: chags sdang gzhi med du grol nas rang gi zas gos kyi zhen pa dang /
NK031(ki)004:3089: gzhan la phyogs ris kyi rtsod 'then dang /
NK031(ki)004:3090: khe grags don du gnyer ba'i chos brgyad kyi bya ba rang rgyud la mi 'byung zhing /
NK031(ki)004:3091: sems can la phyogs ris med pa'i snying rje dang phan sems 'byung ngo //
NK031(ki)004:3093: ting 'dzin rlung zin drod ldan pas //
NK031(ki)004:3094: zas dang gos kyi 'du shes chung //
NK031(ki)004:3095: nyon mongs ngar 'dzin phyogs cha dang //
NK031(ki)004:3096: chos brgyad chags sdang kun brtag sogs //
NK031(ki)004:3097: shin tu chung zhing phra rab gnas //
NK031(ki)004:3098: 'khrul pa ya mtshan thugs brtse ba'i //
NK031(ki)004:3099: tshad med thugs rje chen po 'byung //
NK031(ki)004:3101: rmi lam du yang sgren mor phyung nas khrus byed pa la sogs sgrib pa dag pa'i rtags dang /
NK031(ki)004:3102: mun khung dang 'dam rdzab nas thon pa la sogs ngan song nas thar pa'i ltas dang /
NK031(ki)004:3103: rang las 'od byung nas snang srid gsal ba la sogs bden pa mthong ba'i ltas dang /
NK031(ki)004:3104: yi dam lha'i zhal mthong gsung thos la sogs 'byung
NK031(ki)004:3105: bar bshad kyang de la dga' zhing bden par 'dzin
NK031(ki)004:3106: na bdud du 'gro bar gsungs pas rang snang sgyu
NK031(ki)004:3109: thams cad sems su shes pas bdud kyis glags mi rnyed /
NK031(ki)004:3111: gzhan yang zag med mngon gyur ni ma thob /
NK031(ki)004:3112: rtsa khams nyams snang bzang po yod pa'i rnal 'byor pa la /
NK031(ki)004:3113: nyin dang rmi lam du nyams sna tshogs 'byung ba
NK031(ki)004:3114: la bzang ngan du zhen cing bden par 'dzin na
NK031(ki)004:3116: gang la yang chags sdang med par rang snang dngos med du shes na lam rtags yin te /
NK031(ki)004:3118: rtags ni gnyis su shes par bya ste /
NK031(ki)004:3119: phyi rtags bdud kyi mtshan ma bco brgyad de /
NK031(ki)004:3120: sangs rgyas byang sems mthong ba dang /
NK031(ki)004:3121: 'khor du bdag gis chos nyan pa dang /
NK031(ki)004:3122: rang nyid 'phags pa'i gzugs su snang nas 'khor la chos bshad pa dang /
NK031(ki)004:3123: skad cig ma la bskal pa grangs med 'gyed nus pa dang /
NK031(ki)004:3124: rgyud sde thams cad chags thogs med par 'chad nus pa dang /
NK031(ki)004:3125: rigs drug gi sems can mthong ba dang /
NK031(ki)004:3126: de dag gi tshe dang las bzang ngan shes pa dang /
NK031(ki)004:3127: de la snying rje'i sems skye zhing don bya bar 'dod pa dang /
NK031(ki)004:3128: rang gi lus la 'od chen po nyin mtshan med par 'byung ba dang /
NK031(ki)004:3129: ri dang rtsig pa la mi thogs pa dang /
NK031(ki)004:3131: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis phyag spyi bor 'jog nas dbang bskur ba dang /
NK031(ki)004:3133: phyogs gar 'dod du thogs chags med par 'gro nus pa dang /
NK031(ki)004:3134: sems can thams cad kyi skad du chos ston nus pa dang /
NK031(ki)004:3135: lha klu mthu bo che rnams kyis bdag bkur zhing bka' sgrub pa dang /
NK031(ki)004:3136: sems can thams cad kyi skad go bar 'byung ste /
NK031(ki)004:3137: de la mtshan mar bzung na bdud kyi las yin te /
NK031(ki)004:3139: mtshan mar 'dzin pa la bdud kyis skabs tshol la /
NK031(ki)004:3140: mi 'dzin pa la skabs mi rnyed do //
NK031(ki)004:3141: nang yon tan gyi rtags chen po brgyad de /
NK031(ki)004:3142: sangs rgyas dang mnyam par gtam yang rlom pa med pa dang /
NK031(ki)004:3143: 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa skad cig la mthong yang ngom pa med pa dang /
NK031(ki)004:3144: bdud kyi rgyal po 'ong yang 'jigs skrag med pa dang /
NK031(ki)004:3145: lha yi bu mo mthong yang chags sems med pa dang /
NK031(ki)004:3146: chos nyid bsam du med pa'i ngang la gnas kyang chos spyod bcu'i bar mi chad pa dang /
NK031(ki)004:3147: spyod lam thams cad du ting nge 'dzin dang mi 'bral ba dang /
NK031(ki)004:3148: 'dod yon lnga la spyod kyang zhen chags med pa dang /
NK031(ki)004:3149: sdug bsngal gyi rkyen byung yang ting nge 'dzin gyi grogs su 'gro ba'o //
NK031(ki)004:3150: zhes gsungs pa ltar shes par bya'o //
NK031(ki)004:3153: de lta bu yi rnal 'byor pa //
NK031(ki)004:3154: 'byung ba lnga po zhig pa'i tshe //
NK031(ki)004:3155: lha yi rig 'dzin chen po thob //
NK031(ki)004:3156: de tshe de la sangs rgyas so //
NK031(ki)004:3159: rab gong du bstan pa ltar mi g.yo ba'i nyams
NK031(ki)004:3160: rtogs pa ma bral bar de mthar phyin nas rnal
NK031(ki)004:3164: 'chi kha'i 'od gsal gyis mtshams sbyar nas 'od gsal
NK031(ki)004:3165: ma bu 'dres te skad cig ma la 'tshang rgya'o
NK031(ki)004:3167: phung po len par byed pa'i rgyu las dang nyon mongs pa rang grol te /
NK031(ki)004:3168: skye ba mi len par lha'i rig 'dzin /
NK031(ki)004:3170: lha ni gnyis 'dzin bral ba'i rig pa rnam par dag pa yin la /
NK031(ki)004:3172: gnyis 'dzin bral ba'i rig pa dri med de nyid ting nge 'dzin du shar nas stobs rdzogs te /
NK031(ki)004:3173: sangs rgyas zhes chos rje gtsang pas 'bru bsnan to //
NK031(ki)004:3175: zhi gnas kyi sems cung zhig las su rung bas 'dod khams su ma skyes la /
NK031(ki)004:3176: gzugs khams dang gzugs med kyi khams gang rung gi
NK031(ki)004:3177: rten la mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin mthar
NK031(ki)004:3178: phyin te / sangs rgyas sar sems so //
NK031(ki)004:3180: mi g.yo ngang la rnal 'byor pas //
NK031(ki)004:3181: 'byung ba lnga po zhig pa dang //
NK031(ki)004:3182: rab ni ye shes chos skur sbyor //
NK031(ki)004:3183: 'bring ni ye shes bar du gnas //
NK031(ki)004:3184: stong gsal sems la dbang thob cing //
NK031(ki)004:3185: lha yi rig 'dzin chen po thob //
NK031(ki)004:3186: de tshe nyid la mngon sangs rgya //
NK031(ki)004:3188: skyes bu byed pa'i rnam smin gyi 'bras bu ni /
NK031(ki)004:3189: mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yin te /
NK031(ki)004:3191: mi g.yo ngang gnas rnal 'byor pa'i //
NK031(ki)004:3192: thugs rjes spyod pa sna tshogs dang //
NK031(ki)004:3193: mi rtog thig le'i klong gnas pa'i //
NK031(ki)004:3194: dgongs pa nyon mongs kun brtags sgrib //
NK031(ki)004:3195: phra ba bcom nas mnyam nyid thob //
NK031(ki)004:3197: gsum pa mnyam pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor la bzhi ste /
NK031(ki)004:3205: ji lta bu yang mi gzigs te //
NK031(ki)004:3206: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gsal //
NK031(ki)004:3207: lo zla 'das kyang de bzhin gnas //
NK031(ki)004:3209: gong gi rnal 'byor gnyis po'i zhi lhag nyams rtogs
NK031(ki)004:3210: gcig tu 'dres na mthar phyin pa'i 'bras bu yin
NK031(ki)004:3211: pas / 'khor 'das snang srid snod bcud bzang ngan /
NK031(ki)004:3216: yin min la sogs pa gnyis 'dzin gyi mtshan ma thams cad rang grol te /
NK031(ki)004:3217: yul phar snang gi rtog pa med par /
NK031(ki)004:3218: rig pa rang byung gi ye shes nyid chos thams cad du lhun gyis grub cing /
NK031(ki)004:3219: yul nyid rig pa'i ngo bor ka nas dag pa ste /
NK031(ki)004:3220: snang sems gnyis med kyi mnyam bzhag chen po mngon du gyur ba'o //
NK031(ki)004:3222: ma skyes rang snang dmigs med phyir //
NK031(ki)004:3223: yul med rang grol cir mi gzigs //
NK031(ki)004:3224: thams cad mnyam pa nyid du gsal //
NK031(ki)004:3226: de ltar mnyam bzhag tu chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid mngon du gyur pa'i ngo bo la /
NK031(ki)004:3227: rab 'bring tha ma'i dbye ba med cing /
NK031(ki)004:3231: bogs 'don rnams la 'og ma lta bu yul yul can /
NK031(ki)004:3232: mtshan ma'i brtags dpyad dang nyams len gyi rim pa med kyang /
NK031(ki)004:3233: da rung sgom pa'i lam yin pas rjes thob mnyam bzhag la khyer dgos pa la /
NK031(ki)004:3234: mnyam rjes 'dres ma 'dres kyi rim pa yod de /
NK031(ki)004:3235: mnyam nyid ngang la mnyam rjes thob //
NK031(ki)004:3236: cung mnga' tshul bzung rtsod pa can //
NK031(ki)004:3237: zhes gsungs pas mnyam bzhag gis ma zin pa'i spyod lam ci 'byung ngos bzung nas /
NK031(ki)004:3239: gnyis 'dzin gyi rtog pa gang byung kho rang gi steng du mnyam par bzhag ste /
NK031(ki)004:3241: ting 'dzin rab tu gyur pa na //
NK031(ki)004:3242: ma bcos so ma lhug par bzhag /
NK031(ki)004:3244: nyin par mnyam rjes med kyang gnyid ma gnyid kyi
NK031(ki)004:3245: mtshams su bag chags kyi snang ba ban bun 'byung
NK031(ki)004:3246: ba dang / gnyid dus su rmi lam gyis mnyam
NK031(ki)004:3247: bzhag bar chod ma chod kyi tshad bzung zhing ma
NK031(ki)004:3249: nyin mtshan dang mnyam rjes kyi dbye ba med par rgyun chags nas kyang mnyam par bzhag mkhan dang /
NK031(ki)004:3250: sgom pa'i brtson pa byed mkhan /
NK031(ki)004:3251: rtog cing nyams su myong mkhan kho rang gi steng du bzhag dgos te /
NK031(ki)004:3252: re zhig yin tshul shes pas mi phan no //
NK031(ki)004:3254: gdags su med pa'i chos nyid la //
NK031(ki)004:3255: mtshan mar btags pa blo yin pas //
NK031(ki)004:3256: chos nyid blo las 'das pa yin //
NK031(ki)004:3257: blo yi blo gros ngo mtshar che //
NK031(ki)004:3258: 'di ni blo gros dam pa'i rgyud //
NK031(ki)004:3261: zag med kyi rtogs pa dang por skyes pa /
NK031(ki)004:3262: bar du mnyam rjes bsre ba /
NK031(ki)004:3263: tha ma 'dres pa gsum la g.yo thob brtan gsum du phye'o //
NK031(ki)004:3265: gong gi khyer thabs de bas logs su med do //
NK031(ki)004:3266: skyon sel ni 'dir mi dgos te /
NK031(ki)004:3268: khyad par rnam rtogs cir snang yang //
NK031(ki)004:3269: nyon mongs rtsad chod mnyam nyid phyir //
NK031(ki)004:3270: brtags pa'i bye brag 'di la med //
NK031(ki)004:3272: ting nge 'dzin mthar phyin pa'i tshad ni lo zla
NK031(ki)004:3273: grangs kyis bgrangs kyang mnyam bzhag la rkyen cis kyang
NK031(ki)004:3274: mi chod / brgyal zhing ra ro ba dang 'du shes thoms pa mi 'byung /
NK031(ki)004:3275: 'byung bzhis bsdus pa'i lus la 'pho 'gyur byung yang
NK031(ki)004:3276: na tsha la sogs pa'i rkyen nyid mnyam bzhag gi
NK031(ki)004:3277: ting nge 'dzin du 'char bar gsungs so //
NK031(ki)004:3279: skyes bu goms pas gar rgyug lhung med ltar //
NK031(ki)004:3280: skye med rtogs shing 'dres pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
NK031(ki)004:3281: gang ltar spyad kyang mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang //
NK031(ki)004:3283: gnyis pa dpe bstan pa ni /
