NK031(ki)004:3285: mnyam nyid mi g.yo chos sku'i ngang //
NK031(ki)004:3286: bzung bas mi zin chu zla 'dra //
NK031(ki)004:3287: rtog med mnyam pa de nyid ni //
NK031(ki)004:3288: khyung chen nam mkhar lding dang mtshungs //
NK031(ki)004:3290: dgongs pa rang gi ngo bo dang /
NK031(ki)004:3291: rtsol ba med pa sangs rgyas kyi sa la phyin pa'i dpe gnyis ston te /
NK031(ki)004:3292: rang gi ngo bo ni dper na chu dwangs pa'i
NK031(ki)004:3293: nang du zla ba'i gzugs brnyan snang yang chu nyid
NK031(ki)004:3295: mnyam nyid kyi dgongs pa la chos thams cad ye shes rang snang du lhun gyis grub pa'o //
NK031(ki)004:3297: dper na nam mkha' lding la bya bran lta bu'i rtsol ba dang /
NK031(ki)004:3298: ngam grog lta bu'i g.yang sa la dogs pa dang /
NK031(ki)004:3299: 'gro sar mi phyin dogs pa'i 'du shes med par yud tsam gyis gar 'dod phyin pa ltar /
NK031(ki)004:3300: mnyam nyid rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
NK031(ki)004:3301: rnal 'byor 'og ma lta bu'i rtsol ba dang /
NK031(ki)004:3302: 'og mar ltung gis dogs pa dang /
NK031(ki)004:3303: 'tshang mi rgya dogs pa'i 'du shes med par rtsol
NK031(ki)004:3304: med kyi ngang nas sangs rgyas kyi sa la gshegs
NK031(ki)004:3305: pa'o // gsum pa drod rtags bstan pa ni /
NK031(ki)004:3308: dge dang mi dge rnam rtog med //
NK031(ki)004:3309: nyon mongs sgrib pa rnam par dag /
NK031(ki)004:3310: nyams kyi rmi ltas sna tshogs 'byung //
NK031(ki)004:3312: phyi nang gsang ba gsum las /
NK031(ki)004:3314: nyon mongs dang khams dang skye gnas kyi zag pa gsum dang bral ba /
NK031(ki)004:3315: dge sdig gnyis kyi 'bras bu bde sdug gnyis la re dogs gnyis med /
NK031(ki)004:3316: skye rga na 'chi'i chu bo bzhi brgal /
NK031(ki)004:3317: bdud bzhi bcom nas zag med mnyam nyid kyi ting
NK031(ki)004:3318: nge 'dzin rgyun chad med par rang ngo shin tu
NK031(ki)004:3321: mnyam nyid kun bral kun dngos phyir //
NK031(ki)004:3322: zag med zas gos zhen pa grol //
NK031(ki)004:3323: kun brtags nyon mongs chags sdang dang //
NK031(ki)004:3324: ngar 'dzin phyogs cha re dogs dang //
NK031(ki)004:3325: chos brgyad la sogs rtsad nas chod //
NK031(ki)004:3326: 'jigs pa lnga bral bdud bzhi bcom //
NK031(ki)004:3328: dus phyed btang snyoms chen por gnas //
NK031(ki)004:3331: mngon par shes pa spyan lnga dang drug ste /
NK031(ki)004:3332: ma bsgribs rang gsal mnyam nyid kyi //
NK031(ki)004:3333: zag med shes rab spyan mnga' bas //
NK031(ki)004:3334: mngon par shes pa rnam pa drug /
NK031(ki)004:3335: gsal dang rgyun gyis khyad par 'phags //
NK031(ki)004:3338: gzhan snang gi rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs pas 'gro ba 'dul ba ste /
NK031(ki)004:3339: mnyam nyid ngang las ma g.yos bzhin //
NK031(ki)004:3340: zhing khams stong gsum brgya stong phrag /
NK031(ki)004:3341: thugs rjes rang byung sprul pa yi //
NK031(ki)004:3342: rngon dang smad 'tshong shan pa dang //
NK031(ki)004:3343: lha mi'i bsod nams ldan la sogs //
NK031(ki)004:3344: gang la gang ltar 'dul ba bzhin //
NK031(ki)004:3345: mngon shes rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs dang //
NK031(ki)004:3346: sprul pa'i lus kyis 'dul bar byed //
NK031(ki)004:3347: rang byung cho 'phrul bzhir snang ba //
NK031(ki)004:3348: nyi zla zhon nas mkha' la 'gro //
NK031(ki)004:3349: ri brag la sogs thogs med dang //
NK031(ki)004:3350: chu la mi byings mes mi tshig /
NK031(ki)004:3351: dug dang mtshon dang nad mi tshugs //
NK031(ki)004:3352: chu rgyun bzlog dang rlung mi 'gul //
NK031(ki)004:3353: sreg pa'i bskal pa gzhil la sogs //
NK031(ki)004:3355: skam sar chu phyung bye ma gser //
NK031(ki)004:3356: sol bar ljon shing dug la sman //
NK031(ki)004:3357: mi snang ba dang mngon par sprul //
NK031(ki)004:3358: ri rab bkyag nas gsor ba dang //
NK031(ki)004:3360: stong gsum yungs 'brur shong ba dang //
NK031(ki)004:3361: yungs 'brus stong gsum khengs pa dang //
NK031(ki)004:3362: gzhan yang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin //
NK031(ki)004:3363: tshe dang dus la bsring bstung dang //
NK031(ki)004:3365: gso gsad pham rgyal thogs med 'grub //
NK031(ki)004:3366: rang byung thugs rjes byin gyis brlab //
NK031(ki)004:3367: 'gro ba rigs drug mu stegs dang //
NK031(ki)004:3368: lam dang sa la gnas pa dag /
NK031(ki)004:3369: so so'i skad dang cha mthun pas //
NK031(ki)004:3370: gang la gang 'tshams chos ston nas //
NK031(ki)004:3372: 'jig rten brgya stong g.yos nas kyang //
NK031(ki)004:3373: ngo mtshar cher skyed dga' zhing mgu //
NK031(ki)004:3374: nang g.yos pa yang rim g.yo byed //
NK031(ki)004:3375: gsang ba sngags kyi sgra bsgrags pas //
NK031(ki)004:3376: kun kyang rmad byung sngags kyi sgrar //
NK031(ki)004:3377: grags pas bdud 'dul ngan song sbyong //
NK031(ki)004:3381: mnyam pa nyid kyi ngo bo la //
NK031(ki)004:3382: lam dang sa yi rig 'dzin thob //
NK031(ki)004:3383: de yang bgrod du med pa ste //
NK031(ki)004:3384: de tshe nyid la sangs rgyas thob //
NK031(ki)004:3386: lam dang sa'i rig 'dzin zag med kyi rtogs pa mngon gyur mthong lam yin cing /
NK031(ki)004:3387: sgom lam la gsang sngags nang pas lam gyi rig 'dzin bzhi dang /
NK031(ki)004:3388: pha rol tu phyin pas 'phags pa'i sa bcur bzhed
NK031(ki)004:3389: pa gang yang mnyam bzhag tu chos nyid mngon sum
NK031(ki)004:3390: du rtogs pa de'i rgyun goms par byed nas /
NK031(ki)004:3391: rjes thob tu shes sgrib phra rags mnga' ba de sbyang ba'i rim pa yin pa ltar /
NK031(ki)004:3392: 'dir yang zag med mnyam pa nyid mngon sum du rtogs pa'i ngang la goms par byed cing /
NK031(ki)004:3393: rjes phra rags mnyam bzhag la bskyal ba yin pas /
NK031(ki)004:3394: rang gi ngo bo lam gyi rig 'dzin bzhi dang 'phags pa'i sa bcu'i thad yin gsungs /
NK031(ki)004:3395: 'og ma'i sa lam gyi rig 'dzin dang /
NK031(ki)004:3396: 'phags pa rnams bskal pa'i grangs dang mi tshe'i dus
NK031(ki)004:3397: la ltos nas shes sgrib rim gyis sbyong ba dang
NK031(ki)004:3398: mi 'dra ste / 'dir shes sgrib gnyis can gzung
NK031(ki)004:3399: 'dzin gyi chos thams cad gnyis med rang byung gi
NK031(ki)004:3401: de'i ngang la rgyun goms par byed cing /
NK031(ki)004:3402: rjes shes mnyam bzhag la bskyal ba kho na yin la /
NK031(ki)004:3404: rab mnyam rjes med pa ni /
NK031(ki)004:3405: rgyu mthun dang skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu nyid
NK031(ki)004:3406: tshe 'dir lhun gyis grub pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob
NK031(ki)004:3407: nas / rang ngo la skye 'chi med pa rdo
NK031(ki)004:3408: rje'i sku brnyes nas rnam smin gyi 'bras bu sangs
NK031(ki)004:3409: nas / rgyas pa'o // 'bring mnyam bzhag tu zag
NK031(ki)004:3410: med kyi ting nge 'dzin yod kyang rjes thob tu
NK031(ki)004:3411: mtshan ma'i rtog pa yod pa tsam la tshe 'phos
NK031(ki)004:3412: nas / rgyas pa'o // pa ni / 'chi ka'i gnad gcod la sogs pa'i rkyen gyis byas te /
NK031(ki)004:3413: ting nge 'dzin cung zhig brjed song yang phyi dbugs
NK031(ki)004:3414: song nas nang dbugs ma song gi bar ram tha
NK031(ki)004:3415: ma yang lus sems bral ma thag tu rgyu mthun
NK031(ki)004:3416: nam / skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu /
NK031(ki)004:3417: rjes su dran pa drug 'byung ste /
NK031(ki)004:3418: skabs 'dir bar do yin par dran pa /
NK031(ki)004:3419: der bla ma dam pa dran pa /
NK031(ki)004:3420: des bstan pa'i gdams ngag dran pa /
NK031(ki)004:3421: sngar gyi nyams len rtogs pa dran pa /
NK031(ki)004:3422: de ma thag tu chos nyid ma bu 'dres pa'i
NK031(ki)004:3423: skad cig ma de la gzung 'dzin rang grol ka
NK031(ki)004:3424: dag chen por sangs rgyas pa dang /
NK031(ki)004:3425: spyan lnga mngon shes drug la sogs pa'i yon tan
NK031(ki)004:3426: ma lus rdzogs pa ni rnam smin gyi 'bras bu'o
NK031(ki)004:3428: mnyam nyid ngang gnas dgongs spyod dang //
NK031(ki)004:3429: dgongs pa'i ngang gnas shes rab kyis //
NK031(ki)004:3430: shes sgrib rags dang 'bring bcom nas //
NK031(ki)004:3431: btsal ba med par lhun 'grub thob //
NK031(ki)004:3433: mnyam pa nyid kyi ngo bo la //
NK031(ki)004:3434: zag pa kun bral rin chen 'dzin //
NK031(ki)004:3436: de tshe nyid la mngon sangs rgyas //
NK031(ki)004:3437: zhes pa'i lung gnyis po 'dir rab 'bring gnyis ka'i lung thun mong ma yin no //
NK031(ki)004:3438: bzhi pa ye shes lhun grub lam mthar phyin pa'i rnal 'byor ni /
NK031(ki)004:3440: rang gi ngo bo chos kyi sku //
NK031(ki)004:3441: dpe ni dpe med nam mkha' 'dra //
NK031(ki)004:3443: 'bras bu sangs rgyas de nyid do //
NK031(ki)004:3449: dang po ngo bo la gnyis te /
NK031(ki)004:3451: sku lnga lhun grub sangs rgyas kyi rgyal tshab chen por bzhugs pa ste /
NK031(ki)004:3452: lhun grub rig 'dzin zhes pa'i don no //
NK031(ki)004:3454: rang byung lhun grub chos kyi sku //
NK031(ki)004:3455: rang gi rgyal tshab ston par byed //
NK031(ki)004:3457: dgongs pa ni rang snang lhun grub chos kyi sku ste /
NK031(ki)004:3458: skye med rang byung mngon byas pa'i //
NK031(ki)004:3459: rtsol med bde chen lhun grub la //
NK031(ki)004:3460: mtha' dbus skye 'gag rnam dag dbyings //
NK031(ki)004:3461: sku lnga ma 'dres kun tu bzang //
NK031(ki)004:3463: gnyis pa dpe ni chos can mtshan ma'i dpes mtshon mi nus te /
NK031(ki)004:3464: chos nyid lhun grub kyi nam mkha' ni mthar lam chen po de nyid dang /
NK031(ki)004:3465: sangs rgyas ma gtogs pa gzhan gang gis kyang shes par mi nus pa'o //
NK031(ki)004:3469: ma rig sel 4ba'i dpe du ma ste /
NK031(ki)004:3471: nam mkha'i dpe ltar mtshon du med //
NK031(ki)004:3475: gsum pa rtags phyi nang gsang gsum ni /
NK031(ki)004:3477: gsang rtags sgrib gnyis bral ba'i ye shes rgyas /
NK031(ki)004:3478: nang rtags zag med kyi mngon shes dang /
NK031(ki)004:3479: rdzu 'phrul yon tan mtha' yas pa la dbang 'byor /
NK031(ki)004:3482: thugs rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul sna tshogs mdzad
NK031(ki)004:3483: bas nam mkhas khyab tshad kyi sems can thams cad
NK031(ki)004:3486: rtags ni sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul dang //
NK031(ki)004:3487: yon tan sna tshogs rang bzhin rdzogs //
NK031(ki)004:3488: ma bsgribs kun gsal mngon shes drug /
NK031(ki)004:3489: rgyu rkyen me long tshul gzigs pa'o //
NK031(ki)004:3490: yul dang mkhyen tshad rgyal ba dang //
NK031(ki)004:3491: 'dra la bag la nyal bas phye //
NK031(ki)004:3494: sangs rgyas dang dgongs pa yon tan thams cad 'dra
NK031(ki)004:3495: yang bag la nyal yod med kyi khyad yod de
NK031(ki)004:3496: / 'di 'bras bu dngos ma yin mthar lam yin
NK031(ki)004:3497: pa'i don gyis bag la nyal zhes bya ba'i phra
NK031(ki)004:3498: ba gnyen po ye shes dang mi 'bral ba dang
NK031(ki)004:3499: / / gong du bsnyen bkur ba'i gnas sangs rgyas dang /
NK031(ki)004:3500: mar don bya ba'i gnas sems can du snang cha
NK031(ki)004:3501: nam mkha'i 'ja' lta bur mtshan ma'i sgrib g.yogs med
NK031(ki)004:3502: kyang rang snang tsam gcig mnga' ba de /
NK031(ki)004:3503: gzhan rkyen la mi ltos par rang rig pa'i ye
NK031(ki)004:3504: shes chen pos skad cig ma la rtogs pa grol
NK031(ki)004:3505: ba dus mnyam ste sangs rgyas pas /
NK031(ki)004:3506: g.yo thob brtan gsum du phye'o //
NK031(ki)004:3508: lhun grub chen po'i dgongs spyod dang //
NK031(ki)004:3510: dmigs med rang rig shes rab kyis //
NK031(ki)004:3511: skad cig nyid la tha ma yi //
NK031(ki)004:3512: bag la nyal bcom de bzhin gshegs //
NK031(ki)004:3514: don gsum pa rjes su 'bras bu thob tshul ni /
NK031(ki)004:3515: rnal 'byor pas gong du bstan pa ltar sngon 'gro rnams kyis rgyud snod du rung bar byas nas /
NK031(ki)004:3516: dngos gzhi rnal 'byor bzhi la g.yo thob brtan gsum du phyes pas /
NK031(ki)004:3517: rim pa dang po zhi gnas la ma brten na /
NK031(ki)004:3518: thos bsam gyi go ba bzang po yod kyang sems las su mi rung bas /
NK031(ki)004:3519: 'gal rkyen spang ba la sogs rnal 'byor dang por
NK031(ki)004:3520: bstan pa'i rim pa ltar nyams su blangs pas sems
NK031(ki)004:3521: las rung ba'i zhi gnas khyad par can rnyed la
NK031(ki)004:3522: / de yang rang rig rtogs pa'i ye shes kyis
NK031(ki)004:3523: ma khyab na 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan du gol
NK031(ki)004:3524: / bas / rnal 'byor gnyis par ci ltar bstan
NK031(ki)004:3525: pa'i rim pa so sor dpyod pa'i shes rab kyis
NK031(ki)004:3526: snang srid chos skur rtogs par byed cing /
NK031(ki)004:3527: de yang zag med mngon du ma gyur na zag
NK031(ki)004:3528: bcas kyi nyams rtogs thams cad mi rtag cing 'gyur
NK031(ki)004:3529: bas / rnal 'byor gsum par ci ltar bstan pa bzhin /
NK031(ki)004:3530: yengs med kyi ngang las mnyam gzhag chen por goms pa mthar bskyal te /
NK031(ki)004:3531: rnal 'byor bzhi pa'i bag la nyal gyi sgrib pa
NK031(ki)004:3532: rang grol nas gzhi sems nyid rang byung gi ye
NK031(ki)004:3533: shes la rang snang la sku lnga lhun gyis grub
NK031(ki)004:3535: rang bzhin skye ba med pa chos kyi sku /
NK031(ki)004:3536: rol pa 'gags pa med pa sprul pa'i sku /
NK031(ki)004:3537: mtshan nyid dbyer med longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku /
NK031(ki)004:3538: thams cad rig pa rang byung gi ye shes las ma g.yos pa ngo bo nyid kyi sku /
NK031(ki)004:3539: 'khrul grol lam gsum du 'pho 'gyur med pa rdo rje'i sku /
NK031(ki)004:3540: sku lnga yongs rdzogs dpal kun tu bzang po mngon du gyur pa'o //
NK031(ki)004:3542: kun sangs kun dngos rdzogs sangs rgyas //
NK031(ki)004:3543: rang byung ye shes mngon byas pas //
NK031(ki)004:3544: spang thob gnyis med de bzhiin nyid //
NK031(ki)004:3545: sku dang gsung thugs yon tan las //
NK031(ki)004:3546: bsam gyis mi khyab ma 'dres rdzogs //
NK031(ki)004:3547: 'bras bu'i klong du shes par gyis //
NK031(ki)004:3548: nyams rtogs sna tshogs snang ba dang //
NK031(ki)004:3549: mthar phyin yon tan kun rdzogs kyang //
NK031(ki)004:3551: gzhi las g.yos pa rdul tsam med //
NK031(ki)004:3553: de ltar sngon 'gro dang dngos gzhi rjes gsum gyis
NK031(ki)004:3554: rdzogs pa chen po nyams su blang ba'i yi ge
NK031(ki)004:3555: 'di ni / rtsa tshig nyams rim bzhi pa dang /
NK031(ki)004:3556: de'i rgyab skyor dga' rab rdo rje nyid kyis mdzad pa'i nyams sgron dang /
NK031(ki)004:3557: rtsa tshig gi rab 'byed 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad par bzhed pa dang /
NK031(ki)004:3558: dam pa bde gshegs pa'i yig chung nyams kyi man ngag gol sgrib sum cu rtsa drug /
NK031(ki)004:3561: chos rje gtsang pas mdzad pa'i don gsal /
NK031(ki)004:3562: rtogs ldan sh+aaka rdor pa'i theg spyi'i nang du rim
NK031(ki)004:3563: skyes pa'i nyams len bzhi'i skabs rnams kyi tshig don
NK031(ki)004:3564: gang mkho skabs su ma nor bar blangs shing /
NK031(ki)004:3565: nyams len gyi rim pa dngos gzhi snyan brgyud thor bur yod pa rnams legs par bsgrigs te /
NK031(ki)004:3566: man ngag gi rgyud gzhan nas kyang lung gis kha
NK031(ki)004:3567: bskangs shing rang gis nyams su myong tshul la brten
NK031(ki)004:3568: nas / nges pa'i don la blo gcig tu gzhol
NK031(ki)004:3569: ba'i sprang po nam mkha' rdo rjes phyi rabs kyi
NK031(ki)004:3570: gang zag gdams ngag nyams su len pa rnams la
NK031(ki)004:3571: nas / phan pa'i blos / chu mo bya lo
NK031(ki)004:3572: zla ba lnga pa'ii yar tshes la bla ma dam
NK031(ki)004:3573: pa'i bzhugs gnas dpal gnam steng ri khrod du sbyar
NK031(ki)004:3574: nas / phan pa'i blos / ba 'dis / sems can thams cad bde blag tu rang grol nas /
NK031(ki)004:3575: sku lnga lhun gyis grub pa dpal kun tu bzang po mngon du byed par gyur cig /
